en-US: It is recommended that you add a filter on the web server that contains stddev_samp | r_to_date | rcmp | ubstring_index | tractvalue | ncrypt and other characters

中文: 在PHP中注入XML的攻击(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: XML injected into the PHP(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测尝试在php代码中注入xml代码的尝试：<?xml
en-US: This rule detects an attempt to inject xml code in php code: <?xml

中文: 在cookies和请求参数和xml中利用<\(?!xml)等字符串，可实施php注入攻击
en-US: In the cookies and request parameters and XML use of <\ (?! xml) and other strings, the implementation of php injection attacks

中文: 建议web服务器把参数名，参数值和cookies和XML中包含匹配<\?(?!xml)正则表达式的请求过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter the parameters, parameter values, cookies, and XML requests that match the regular expression <\? (?! xml).

中文: 多样化数据企图绕过检测(Protocol Violations)
en-US: Data bypass detected

中文: 检测文件或文件名是否包含有' ;=meta-characters，若有该字符，则阻断访问(Protocol Violations)
en-US: Detect whether the file or file name contains ;=meta-characters, if this character is exist, block the access (Protocol Violations)

中文: 如果攻击者上传文件的时候尝试绕过multipart/form-data，上传的文件的名字或者数据中会包含了'\;=等字符。"
en-US: If an attacker tries to bypass multipart / form-data while uploading a file, the uploaded file's name or data will contain the characters' \; =.

中文: 建议web服务器对请求包进行检测，对于上传的文件的名字或者数据中包含了'\;=等字符的请求拒绝访问。"
en-US: Proposed web server to detect the request packet for the name of the uploaded file or data contains' \; = characters such as the request denied access.

中文: 检测请求内容是否违反CSP（内容安全策略）（CSP Enforcement）
en-US: Request content detected

中文: 检测请求体中的内容来判断是否违反CSP（内容安全策略）（CSP Enforcement）
en-US: Detect contents in the request body to determine whether it violates CSP(Content Security Policy) (CSP Enforcement)

中文: 把CSP发送到服务器中的违规报告中请求体中的相关数据内容记录日志下来。
en-US: The CSP sent to the server in the report of violations in the body of the relevant data content log down.

中文: 检测请求是否来自FireFox浏览器（仅记录模式）（CSP Enforcement）
en-US: Request source detected

中文: 根据请求头的User-Agent字段内容检测到该请求来自FireFox浏览器用户，则设置环境参数来通知Apache用哪个CSP头策略（仅记录模式）（CSP Enforcement）
en-US: According to the User-Agent field content of the request header, if detected the request is from the FireFox browser user, set the environment parameter to notify the Apache to use which CSP header policy(recording mode only) (CSP Enforcement)

中文: 检测user-agent头，如果检测到时火狐的用户的话，服务器会根据CSP请求头写明的策略相对应的应答。
en-US: Detect user-agent header, if detected when the user of Firefox, the server will be based on CSP request header corresponding to the response of the strategy.

中文: 检测请求是否来自FireFox浏览器（CSP Enforcement）
en-US: Request source detected

中文: 根据请求头的User-Agent字段内容检测到该请求来自FireFox浏览器用户，则设置环境参数来通知Apache用哪个CSP头策略（CSP Enforcement）
en-US: According to the User-Agent field content of the request header, if detected the request is from the FireFox browser user, set the environment parameter to notify the Apache to use which CSP header policy (CSP Enforcement)

中文: 检测user-agent头，如果检测到时火狐的用户的话，服务器会根据CSP请求头写明的策略相对应的应答。
en-US: Detect user-agent header, if detected when the user of Firefox, the server will be based on CSP request header corresponding to the response of the strategy.

中文: 请求头中的User-Agent的内容为空
en-US: User-Agent content detected

中文: 该规则检测http请求头中的User-Agent字段的内容是否为空，为空则阻断
en-US: This rule detects whether the content of User-Agent field in the http request header is empty, if it is empty, the request would be blocked.

中文: 攻击者通过破坏通信协议进行攻击。这种类型的攻击可以让敌人模仿他人,发现敏感信息,控制会议的结果,或执行其他攻击
en-US: Attackers attack by destroying the communication protocol. This type of attack allows the enemy to imitate others, detect sensitive information, or perform other attacks

中文: 建议web服务器对请求包进行检测，对于User-Agent头内容为空的请求拒绝访问。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server detect the request packet and denied access to the request whose User-Agent header is empty.

中文: 请求头中Host内容为空
en-US: Host content detected

中文: 该规则检测请求头中Host的内容是否未空，为空则阻断
en-US: This rule detects whether the content of Host in the request header is empty, if it is empty, the request would be blocked.

中文: 请求中host的内容不能为空。
en-US: The content of the request host can not be empty.

中文: 建议web服务器对请求包进行检测，对于host的内容为空的请求拒绝访问。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server detect the request packet and denied access to the request whose host content is empty.

中文: 请求头中缺少Host(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: Host Header Detected

中文: 该规则检测用户上传的请求头中是否缺少Host字段，如果缺少，则阻断
en-US: This rule detects whether the request header uploaded by users is missing the Host filed, if it is lacking, the request would be blocked.

中文: 请求中host的内容不能缺少。
en-US: The content of the request host can not be missing.

中文: 建议web服务器对请求包进行检测，对于host的内容缺少的请求拒绝访问。
en-US: Proposed web server to detect the request packet, the lack of content for the host's request denied access.

中文: 请求头中缺少User-Agent头(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: User-Agent Detected

中文: 该规则检测http请求头中是否缺少User-Agent，如缺少将阻断
en-US: This rule detects whether the http request header is missing User-Agent, if it is lacking, the request would be blocked.

中文: 攻击者通过破坏通信协议进行攻击。这种类型的攻击可以让敌人模仿他人,发现敏感信息,控制会议的结果,或执行其他攻击
en-US: Attackers attack by destroying the communication protocol. This type of attack allows the enemy to imitate others, detect sensitive information, or perform other attacks

中文: 建议web服务器对请求包进行检测，对于缺少User-Agent头的请求拒绝访问。
en-US: The proposed web server to detect the request packet, for lack of User-Agent header request denied access.

中文: 检测请求方法及请求内容类型来判断是否符合http策略（Http Policy）
en-US: Http Policy Detected

中文: 如果请求方法及请求内容类型来判断不符合http策略，则阻断访问（Http Policy）
en-US: If use the request method and request content type to determine it not comply with the http policy, block the access (Http Policy)

中文: 当不明格式类型的请求发送到服务器，攻击者会在GET/HEAD/OPTION/PROPFIND等请求方式以外的请求中，不带有content type或者没有内容。
en-US: When an unidentified type of request is sent to the server, the attacker does not have a content type or no content in requests other than GET / HEAD / OPTION / PROPFIND.

中文: 建议拒绝不明格式类型的请求的访问
en-US: We recommend that you denied requests for unknown format types

中文: Get或Head请求不能有请求体
en-US: GET or HEAD Request Content Detected

中文: 按标准规范Get或Head请求可以有请求体，但在实际环境中很少使用这个特性，因为黑客可能利用该特性发送一些请求体到一些不知情的web应用程序，来达到攻击目的
en-US: There may be a request body for a Get or Head request according to the standard specification, but this feature is rarely used in a real environment because an attacker may use this feature to send some request body to some unsuspecting web application to achieve the attack purpose

中文: 攻击者通过破坏通信协议进行攻击。这种类型的攻击可以让敌人模仿他人,发现敏感信息,控制会议的结果,或执行其他攻击
en-US: Attackers attack by destroying the communication protocol. This type of attack allows the enemy to imitate others, detect sensitive information, or perform other attacks

中文: 建议对get或head请求进行检测，是否有请求体，有则拒绝请求
en-US: Proposed get or head request detection, whether there is a request body, there are refused requests

中文: Post请求都要求有Content-Length字段
en-US: POST request missing Content-Length Header.

中文: 该规则检测到如果请求是Post，则要求在请求头中必须有Content-Length字段的内容
en-US: This rule detects that if the request is Post, require that the contents of the Content-Length field must in the request header

中文: 攻击者通过破坏通信协议进行攻击。这种类型的攻击可以让敌人模仿他人,发现敏感信息,控制会议的结果,或执行其他攻击
en-US: Attackers attack by destroying the communication protocol. This type of attack allows the enemy to imitate others, detect sensitive information, or perform other attacks

中文: 建议对post请求进行检测，是否有Content-Length字段，没有则拒绝请求
en-US: It is recommended to post request detection, whether Content-Length field, no request is rejected

中文: 请求头中缺少Accept(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: Request Missing an Accept Header

中文: 该规则检测用户上传的请求头，看是否缺少Accetp头，当动作为非OPTIONS，而又缺少Accept头时将阻断
en-US: This rule detects if the request header uploaded by users is missing Accept header. When the action is non-OPTIONS and the Accept header is missing, the request would be blocked.

中文: 攻击者通过破坏通信协议进行攻击。这种类型的攻击可以让敌人模仿他人,发现敏感信息,控制会议的结果,或执行其他攻击
en-US: Attackers attack by destroying the communication protocol. This type of attack allows the enemy to imitate others, detect sensitive information, or perform other attacks

中文: 建议web服务器拒绝请求头中缺少Accept的请求
en-US: It is recommended that the web server reject requests that lack Accept in the request header

中文: Content-Length的内容只能数字
en-US: Content-Length content Detected

中文: 该规则检测http请求头中Content-Length字段的内容是否是数字，按RFC的要求必须是数字
en-US: This rule detects if the content of the Content-Length field in the http request header is a digit. It must be a digit according to the requirements of RFC.

中文: 请求的content length的内容只能是数字。
en-US: The content of the requested content length can only be a number.

中文: 建议web服务器对content length字段的内容进行检测，出现数字以外的内容则拒绝访问
en-US: It is recommended that the web server detect the content of the content length field and deny access if anything other than numbers

中文: Host的内容是IP地址(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: Host header content Detected

中文: 该规则检测Host的内容是否是数字和.组成的IP地址，或者再带上端口号，如：1.1.1.1：80,是则阻断，因为很多网络蠕虫或自动化程序都是通过IP段扫描来传播的
en-US: This rule detects if the content of Host is an IP address consists of digits and '.', or brings up a port number, for example, 1.1.1.1:80. If it is, the request will be blocked, because many network worms and automated programs are spread via scanning IP segment

中文: 自动化大量的无效请求访问网站，使网站崩溃
en-US: Automate a large number of invalid requests to visit the site, the site crashes

中文: 建议web服务器拒绝Host的内容不是ip地址的请求
en-US: Proposed web server rejected Host's content is not ip address request

中文: 当开通严格限制后，将限制字符范围32-126
en-US: Character range detected

中文: 如果开通了严格限制模式，该规则检测用户的请求数据,包括请求参数、内容或请求头内容等必须是32-126内的可见字符
en-US: If the strict restriction mode is enabled, this rule detects the user's request data, including request parameters, content or request header content, etc. The data must be visible characters within 32-162
If the strict restriction mode is enabled, the rule detects the user's request data, including the request parameters, content or request header content must be visible character 32-126
Filtering request data, including request parameters, content, or requests for header content that contain visible characters other than 32-126

中文: HTTP/1.1要求Pragma和Cache-Control必须成对出现
en-US: Pragma and Cache-Control field detected

中文: RFC规范要求HTTP/1.1中当有Pragma字段的时候必须也有Cache-Control字段，否则本规则将阻断
en-US: The RFC specification requires that the Cache-Control field must also be present when there is a Pragma field in HTTP/1.1, otherwise, the rule will block the request.

中文: 影响网站的缓存，缓存的主要作用是防止用户频繁刷新列表，导致服务器数据负担。
en-US: Affect the site's cache, the main role of the cache is to prevent users from frequent refresh list, resulting in server data burden.

中文: 建议在web服务器对请求包进行检测，是否HTTP/1.1，且参数Pragma跟Cache-Control
en-US: Proposed in the web server to detect the request packet, whether HTTP / 1.1, and parameters Pragma and Cache-Control

中文: 请求头中的Accept的内容为空
en-US: Request Accept Header Detected

中文: 该规则检测当用户Http请求动作为非OPTIONS时，请求头中的Accetp的内容是否为空，为空则阻断
en-US: This rule detects whether the content of Accetp in the request header is empty when the user Http request action is non-OPTIONS. If it is empty, the request will be blocked.

中文: 攻击者通过破坏通信协议进行攻击。这种类型的攻击可以让敌人模仿他人,发现敏感信息,控制会议的结果,或执行其他攻击
en-US: Attackers attack by destroying the communication protocol. This type of attack allows the enemy to imitate others, detect sensitive information, or perform other attacks

中文: 建议web服务器拒绝请求头中的Accept的内容为空的请求
en-US: It is suggested that the web server reject the request that the content of Accept in the request header is empty

中文: Expect只是HTTP/1.1的一个属性
en-US: HTTP attribute detected

中文: Expect只是HTTP/1.1的属性，所以该规则检测请求的http协议版本，如果是HTTP/1.0，但请求头中有Expect字段，该规则将阻断
en-US: Expect is just an HTTP/1.1 attribute, so this rule detects the http protocol version of the request. If the version is HTTP/1.0 but the request field has an Expect field, the rule will block the request.

中文: 自动程序和机器人进行大量访问，造成网站崩溃
en-US: Automated programs and robots make extensive visits, causing the site to crash

中文: 建议检测出现Expect字段的请求是否HTTP/1.1版本，不是则拒绝请求
en-US: It is recommended to check if the request for the Expect field is HTTP / 1.1, otherwise reject the request

中文: 启发式检测(非单词字符检测）
en-US: Non-word character detected

中文: 该规则在http请求的参数中检测连续等于或超过4次的非单词字符的出现
en-US: This rule detects the presence of non-word characters that are consecutively equal to or exceeding 4 times in the parameters of the http request

中文: 攻击者可在参数中出现多重连续的非单词字符实施命令注入
en-US: An attacker could inject multiple consecutive non-word characters in the argument

中文: 建议web服务器把请求参数值为四个以上的非单词字符的请求过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter requests for requests of more than four non-word characters.

中文: 检测请求方法是否符合http策略（Http Policy）
en-US: http policy compliance check

中文: 如果请求方法在http策略中受限，则阻断访问（Http Policy）
en-US: If the request method is restricted in the http policy, the access would be blocked. (Http Policy)

中文: put、delete、post、options、patch等等这些请求能对服务器进行增删改。
en-US: Attacker can use put, delete, post, options, patch and other requests for server additions and deletions.

中文: 建议如果不需要接收以下put、delete、post、options、patch请求方法，请作出相关限制，如拒绝访问
en-US: Refuse HTTP requests for put, delete, post, options, patch

中文: 检测http版本是否符合http策略（Http Policy）
en-US: http policy compliance check

中文: 如果请求数据的http协议版本在http策略中受限，则阻断访问（Http Policy）
en-US: If the http protocol version of the request data is restricted in the http policy, the access would be blocked. (Http Policy)

中文: 攻击者会尝试使用除了HTTP/0.9,HTTP/1.0，HTTP/1.1以外的协议。
en-US: Attackers will try to use protocols other than HTTP / 0.9, HTTP / 1.0, HTTP / 1.1 and may gain sensitive information or initiate attacks.

中文: 建议拒绝HTTP/0.9,HTTP/1.0，HTTP/1.1以外的协议进行访问
en-US: It is recommended that you refuse to access protocols other than HTTP / 0.9, HTTP / 1.0, HTTP / 1.1

中文: 检测请求数据中的文件扩展名是否符合http策略（Http Policy）
en-US: http policy compliance check

中文: 如果请求数据中URL的文件扩展名在http策略受限，则阻断访问（Http Policy）
en-US: If the file extension of the URL in the request data is restricted in the http policy, the access would be blocked. (Http Policy)

中文: 攻击者会在请求uri中的，带有如.asa/ .asax/ .ascx/ .axd/ .backup/ .bak/ .bat/ .cdx/ .cer/ .cfg/ .cmd/ .com/ .config/ .conf/ .cs/ .csproj/ .csr/ .dat/ .db/ .dbf/ .dll/ .dos/ .htr/ .htw/ .ida/ .idc/ .idq/ .inc/ .ini/ .key/ .licx/ .lnk/ .log/ .mdb/ .old/ .pass/ .pdb/ .pol/
en-US: An attacker could have uri a file extension such as .asa / .asax / .ascx / .axd / .backup / .bak / .bat / and launch attacks and gain access

中文: 建议对于uri中带有如.asa/ .asax/ .ascx/ .axd/ .backup/ .bak/ .bat/ .cdx/ .cer/ .cfg/ .cmd/ .com/ .config/ .conf/ .cs/ .csproj/ .csr/ .dat/ .db/ .dbf/ .dll/ .dos/ .htr/ .htw/ .ida/ .idc/ .idq/ .inc/ .ini/ .key/ .licx/ .lnk/ .log/ .mdb/ .old/ .pass/ .pdb/ .pol/ .pri
en-US: Filtering URI requests with .asa / .asax / .ascx / .axd / .backup / .bak / .bat / and other file extensions

中文: 检测请求数据中的http头部是否符合http策略（Http Policy）
en-US: http policy compliance check

中文: 如果请求数据中http头部在http策略中受限，则阻断访问（Http Policy）
en-US: If the http header in the request data is restricted in the http policy, the access would be blocked. (Http Policy)

中文: 攻击者常常会在请求中请求头包含如Proxy-Connection、Lock-Token、Content-Range、Translate、via、if等名字。
en-US: Attackers often request headers that contain names like Proxy-Connection, Lock-Token, Content-Range, Translate, via, if, etc.

中文: 建议web服务器拒绝请求头包含如Proxy-Connection、Lock-Token、Content-Range、Translate、via、if等名字的请求访问
en-US: It is recommended that the web server refuse to request that the request header contain a name such as Proxy-Connection, Lock-Token, Content-Range, Translate, via, if, etc.

中文: 检测请求参数的值长度是否过长(Request Limits)
en-US: Request parameter length check

中文: 如果请求参数的值长度过长，则阻断访问(Request Limits)
en-US: If the value of the request parameter is too long, the access would be blocked. (Request Limits)

中文: 如果请求参数的单个参数值过长，会造成溢出攻击。
en-US: If the request parameters of a single parameter value is too long, will cause overflow attacks.

中文: 建议web服务器限制请求参数值的长度，一般不超过400kb
en-US: Proposed web server limit request parameter value length, generally not more than 400kb

中文: 检测请求参数名的长度是否过长(Request Limits)
en-US: Argument name overflow

中文: 如果请求参数名的长度过长，则阻断访问(Request Limits)
en-US: If the length of the request parameter name is too long, the access would be blocked. (Request Limits)

中文: 如果请求参数的参数名过长，会造成溢出攻击。
en-US: If the request parameter parameter name is too long, will cause overflow attacks.

中文: 建议web服务器限制请求参数名的长度，一般不超过100kb
en-US: Proposed web server limit request parameter name length, generally not more than 100kb

中文: 检测请求参数的个数是否超过限制(Request Limits)
en-US: arguments Number overflow

中文: 如果请求参数的个数超过限制，则阻断访问(Request Limits)
en-US: If the number of request parameter exceeds the limit, the access would be blocked. (Request Limits)

中文: 如果请求参数的参数的个数过多，会造成溢出攻击。
en-US: If the number of arguments to the request parameter is excessive, it can cause an overflow attack.

中文: 建议web服务器限制请求参数的个数，一般不超过255
en-US: Proposed web server limit the number of request parameters, generally not more than 255

中文: 检测请求参数的总长度是否超过限制(Request Limits)
en-US: arguments size exceeded

中文: 如果请求参数的总长度超过限制，则阻断访问(Request Limits)
en-US: If the total length of the request parameter exceeds the limit, the access would be blocked. (Request Limits)

中文: 如果请求参数的参数值总长度过长，会造成溢出攻击。
en-US: If the request parameter parameters total length is too long, it will cause overflow attacks.

中文: 建议web服务器限制请求参数值总长度，一般不超过64000
en-US: Proposed web server limit the total length of the request parameter value, generally not more than 64000

中文: 检测上传数据中单个文件的长度是否超过限制(Request Limits)
en-US: Uploaded file size check

中文: 如果上传数据中单个文件的长度超过限制，则阻断访问(Request Limits)
en-US: If the length of a single file in the upload data exceeds the limit, the access would be blocked. (Request Limits)

中文: 上传文件过大会占用资源，通过大量上传大文件会使得服务器内存饱满
en-US: Uploading files over the Assembly takes up resources, by uploading large files will make the server full memory

中文: 建议web服务器限制上传数据当个文件的大小，一般不超过1048576
en-US: Proposed web server to limit the size of the uploaded data as a file, generally not more than 1048576

中文: 检测上传数据中所有文件的总长度是否超过限制(Request Limits)
en-US: uploaded files size check

中文: 如果上传数据中所有文件的总长度超过限制，则阻断访问(Request Limits)
en-US: If the total length of all files in the upload data exceeds the limit, the access would be blocked. (Request Limits)

中文: 如果上传文件的总大小超出了允许的最大值，会造成溢出攻击。
en-US: If the total size of the uploaded file exceeds the maximum allowed, it can cause an overflow attack.

中文: 建议限制客户上传的文件的大小
en-US: It is recommended to limit the size of files uploaded by customers

中文: 限制请求的参数或内容必须为可打印字符1-255
en-US: Invalid character check

中文: 该规则检测用户的请求数据,包括请求参数、内容或请求头内容等必须是1-255内的可见字符
en-US: This rule detects the user's request data, including request parameters, content or request header content, etc. The data must be visible characters within 1-255

中文: 攻击者通过注入不可打印的字符进行sql注入或xss注入
en-US: An attacker could inject sql or xss by injecting unprintable characters

中文: 建议在web服务器对请求包中包含非1-255的可打印字符的请求进行过滤
en-US: It is recommended to filter requests that contain non-1-255 printable characters in the request packet on the web server

中文: 拒绝请求字段Content-Encoding的内容为Identity
en-US: Content-Encoding field check

中文: identity编码只能用在Accept-Encoding头中，而不能用在Content-Encoding中,如果使用了，该规则将阻断
en-US: The identity encoding can only be used in the Accept-Encoding header. It cannot be used in Content-Encoding, otherwise, the rule will block the request

中文: 攻击者伪造身份编码进行会话劫劫持
en-US: Attacker forged ID code for session robbery

中文: 建议web服务器拒绝请求字段Content-Encoding的内容为Identity的请求
en-US: It is suggested that the web server reject the request that the content of the Content-Encoding field of the request field is Identity

中文: 有请求内容的请求头中缺少Content-Type
en-US: Request header check

中文: 该规则检测当请求头中的Content-Length存在，并且内容不为零的时候，是否在请求头中有Content-Type字段，如没，则web应用程序不知道怎么解析请求数据，阻断
en-US: This rule detects whether there is a Content-Type field in the request header when the Content-Length of the request header exists and its content is not zero. If not, the web application does not know how to parse the request data, the request would be blocked.

中文: 如果一个请求带有请求体，就不能缺失了content type。
en-US: If a request with a request body, you can not be missing the content type.

中文: 建议web服务器对请求包进行检测，对于带请求体却缺少content type字段的请求拒绝访问。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server detect the request packet, denying access to the request body with the request body but lacking the content type field.

中文: URI请求格式验证
en-US: URI request format verification

中文: 该规则规定了RFC规范的URI格式："http:" "//" host [ ":" port ] [ abs_path [ "?" query ]] ,并同时规定了CONNECT、OPTIONS、GET请求时的正确格式
en-US: This rule specifies the URI format of RFC specification: "http:" "//" host [ ":" port ] [ abs_path [ "?" query ]], in the mean time, it specifies the correct format for the CONNECT, OPTIONS, GET requests

中文: 攻击者通过破坏通信协议进行攻击。这种类型的攻击可以让攻击者模仿他人,发现敏感信息,控制会议的结果,或执行其他攻击
en-US: Attackers attack by destroying the communication protocol. This type of attack allows an attacker to imitate another person, discover sensitive information, control the outcome of a conference, or perform other attacks

中文:
建议web服务器对URI的请求格式进行验证，请求格式如"http:" "//" host [ ":" port ] [ abs_path [ "?" query ]] 
#
en-US: It is recommended that the web server validate the URI request format, such as "http: //" host [":" port]

中文: 请求 Body是否正确
en-US: request body check

中文: 该规则确定用户的请求体是否被正确的处理了，如果有错误将被阻断
en-US: This rule determines whether the user's request body has been processed correctly. If there an error, the request would be blocked.
An attacker can construct a malicious request body to attack the server
Filter requests with malicious body

中文: 严格的Multipart数据解析检查
en-US: Multipart data analysis check

中文: 该规则严格检查用户提交的窗体数据（multipart/form-data）,如果该规则对您的环境太严格，可以停用或修改规则动作为仅记录
en-US: This rule strictly checks the windows data(multipart/form-data) submitted by users. If this rule is too strict for your environment, you can disable it or modify the rule action to record only mode

中文: PHP解析multipart/form-datahttp请求的body part请求头时，重复拷贝字符串导致DOS。远程攻击者通过发送恶意构造的multipart/form-data请求，导致服务器CPU资源被耗尽，从而远程DOS服务器
en-US: PHP parsed multipart / form-datahttp request body part request header, duplicate copy string causes DOS. A remote attacker sends out a maliciously constructed multipart / form-data request, causing the server's CPU resources to be exhausted, causing the remote DOS server

中文: 建议在web服务器上设置Multipart白名单
en-US: It is recommended to set Multipart whitelist on web server

中文: 未匹配的Multipart Boundary检查
en-US: Multipart Boundary check

中文: 该规则探测Multipart解析器探测到的可能的未匹配boundary
en-US: This rule detects for a possible unmatched boundary probed by the Multipart parser

中文: PHP解析multipart/form-datahttp请求的body part请求头时，重复拷贝字符串导致DOS。远程攻击者通过发送恶意构造的multipart/form-data请求，导致服务器CPU资源被耗尽，从而远程DOS服务器
en-US: PHP parsed multipart / form-datahttp request body part request header, duplicate copy string causes DOS. A remote attacker sends out a maliciously constructed multipart / form-data request, causing the server's CPU resources to be exhausted, causing the remote DOS server

中文: 建议在web服务器上设置Multipart白名单
en-US: It is recommended to set Multipart whitelist on web server

中文: 统计页面信息泄漏
en-US: Page information leakage statistics

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面中是否会泄漏统计页面中包含一些信息。如：This summary was generated by ***(wwwstat)
en-US: This rule detects whether the server response page will leak some information contained in the statistics page. For example, This summary was generated by ***(wwwstat)

中文: 当发生了信息泄露，响应体中会出现this summary was generated by| webcruncher was produced by |report was generated by weblog|statistics were prodeced等字符。信息泄露会暴露服务器的敏感信息，使攻击者能够通过泄露的信息进行进一步入侵。
en-US: When an information leak occurs, the response body will appear this summary was generated by | webcruncher was produced by | report was generated by weblog | statistics were prodeced and other characters. Information Disclosure exposes server-sensitive information so that attackers can exploit the compromised information for further intrusion.

中文: 建议对含有This is summary was generated by...|... was generated by WebLog |...was produced by等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to limit this response package that contains This is summary was generated by ... | ... was generated by WebLog |.

中文: 数据库错误信息泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: Database error message leakage(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面中是否会泄漏数据库的一些错误信息。如：SQL Server does not exist or access denied,PostgreSQL *** ERROR
en-US: This rule detects whether the server response page will leak some error information of the database. For example, SQL Server does not exist or access denied,PostgreSQL *** ERROR

中文: 当发生了信息泄露，响应体中会出现select list because it is not contained in anagregate function and there is no| GROUP BY upplied argument is not a valid |does not match with a table name or alias name used in the query等字符。数据库信息泄露会让攻击者知道数据库类型甚至分析出数据库存在的漏洞，会降低攻击难度。
en-US: When an information leak occurs, the response body will appear select list because it is not contained in anagregate function and there is no | GROUP BY upplied argument is not a valid | does not match with a table name or alias name used in the query, etc. character. Database information leakage will allow attackers to know the type of database or even analyze the existence of the database vulnerabilities, will reduce the difficulty of the attack.

中文: 建议对含有select list because it is not contained in anagregate function and there is no| GROUP BY upplied argument is not a valid |does not match with a table name or alias name used in the query等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to include select list because it is not contained in anagregate function and there is no | GROUP BY upplied argument is not a valid | does not match with a table name or alias name used in the query and other characters in response packets.

中文: IIS错误信息泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: IIS error information leakage(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面，看在IIS错误信息页面中是否会泄漏信息。如泄漏.net版本信息：Microsoft .NET Framework Version:***
en-US: This rule detects the server response page and checks if some information is leaked in the IIS error information page. For example, leak the .net version information: Microsoft .NET Framework Version:***

中文: 当发生了IIS错误信息泄露，响应体中会出现ADODB.Command  |Application uses a value of the wrong type for the current operation |trappable error occurred in an external object 等字符。信息泄露会暴露服务器的敏感信息，使攻击者能够通过泄露的信息进行进一步入侵；
en-US: The ADODB.Command | Application uses a value of the wrong type for the current operation | trappable error occurred in an external object, etc., when an IIS error message leaks. Information leakage exposes the server's sensitive information so that the attacker can further invade through the leaked information.

中文: 建议对含有ADODB.Command  |Application uses a value of the wrong type for the current operation |trappable error occurred in an external object等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to limit the response packets that contain the characters ADODB.Command | Application uses a value of the wrong type for the current operation | trappable error occurred in an external object.

中文: Zope web服务器信息泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: Zope web server information leak(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面是否泄漏Zope服务器的相关信息，如：Site Error   An error was encountered while publishing this resource ***
en-US: This rule detects whether the server response page will leak some information about the Zope server. For example, Site Error   An error was encountered while publishing this resource ***

中文:
当发生了zope服务器的信息泄露，响应体中会出现

Site Error

|

An error was encountered while publishing this resource.等字符。这可能使得攻击者了解远程系统/服务器类型以便进行下一步的攻击。
en-US:
When a zope server information leak, the response body will appear

Site Error |

An error was encountered while publishing this resource. And other characters. This may allow an attacker to understand the remote system / server type for the next attack.

中文: 建议对含有ADODB.Command  |Application uses a value of the wrong type for the current operation |trappable error occurred in an external object等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to limit the response packets that contain the characters ADODB.Command | Application uses a value of the wrong type for the current operation | trappable error occurred in an external object.

中文: Cold Fusion信息泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: Cold Fusion Information Disclosure(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面是否会泄漏Cold Fusion的相关信息，如：The error occurred in *** : line *** ColdFusion
en-US: This rule detects whether the server response page will leak some information about Cold Fusion. For example, The error occurred in *** : line *** ColdFusion

中文: 当发生了ColdFusion 服务器的信息泄露，响应体中会出现The error occurred in | line |ColdFusion Srack Trace (click to expand)等字符。这可能使得攻击者了解远程系统/服务器类型以便进行下一步的攻击。
en-US: The ColdFusion Srack Trace (click to expand) character appears in the response body when a ColdFusion server leak occurs. This may allow an attacker to understand the remote system / server type for the next attack.

中文: 建议对含有The error occurred in | line |ColdFusion Srack Trace (click to expand)等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended that you limit the response packets that contain characters like The error occurred in | line | ColdFusion Srack Trace (click to expand).

中文: PHP信息泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: PHP information leakage(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面是否会泄漏PHP的相关信息，如：Warning *** :on line
en-US: This rule detects whether the server response page will leak some information about PHP. For example, Warning *** :on line

中文: 当发生了PHP信息泄露，响应体中会出现Warning : on line等字符。信息泄露会暴露服务器的敏感信息，使攻击者能够通过泄露的信息进行进一步入侵。
en-US: When a PHP leak occurs, the <b> Warning </ b>: on line and other characters appear in the response body. Information Disclosure exposes server-sensitive information so that attackers can exploit the compromised information for further intrusion.

中文: 建议对含有Warning : on line等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to limit the response packets that contain characters such as <b> Warning </ b>: on line.

中文: ISA服务器信息泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: ISA Server Information Disclosure(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面是否会泄漏ISA服务器相关的信息，如：403 Forbidden *** Internet Security and Acceleration Server
en-US: This rule detects whether the server response page will leak some information about the ISA server. For example, 403 Forbidden *** Internet Security and Acceleration Server

中文: 当发生了ISA服务器信息泄露，响应体中会出现403 Forbidden Internet Security and Acceleration Server等字符。这可能使得攻击者了解远程系统/服务器类型以便进行下一步的攻击。
en-US: When the ISA server information leak occurs, the response body will appear 403 Forbidden Internet Security and Acceleration Server and other characters. This may allow an attacker to understand the remote system / server type for the next attack.

中文: 建议对含有403 Forbidden Internet Security and Acceleration Server等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended that you limit the response packets that contain characters such as 403 Forbidden Internet Security and Acceleration Server.

中文: 文件或目录名信息泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: File or directory name information leaked(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面内容是否泄漏文件或目录信息。如：herf = 文件路径
en-US: This rule detects whether the content of the server response page will leak file or directory information. For example, herf = file path

中文: 当发生了网站目录结构信息泄露，响应体中会出现href =" A :\x5c"等字符。这种攻击会让攻击者很容易的发现服务器上的敏感文件。
en-US: When the site directory structure information disclosure, the response body will appear href = "A: \ x5c" and other characters. This attack will make it easy for attackers to discover sensitive files on the server.

中文: 建议对含有href =" A :\x5c"等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to limit the response packets that contain characters such as href = "A: \ x5c".

中文: 微软Office文档属性信息泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: Microsoft Office document properties leakage(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面是否泄漏微软Office文档的属性信息，如：通过<o:documentproperties>泄漏
en-US: This rule detects whether the server response page will leak the attribute information of Microsoft Office document. For example, leaking via <o:documentproperties>

中文: 当发生了微软offic文档的内容/属性信息泄露，响应体中会出现<o:documentproperties>。导致了重要的信息（如账号密码、源码、系统用户）的泄漏，进而扩大了威胁。
en-US: <o: documentproperties> appears in the response body when there is a disclosure of the contents of the Microsoft offic document. Resulting in the leakage of important information (such as account password, source code and system user), thereby further increasing the threat.

中文: 建议对含有<o:documentproperties>等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to limit response packets that contain characters such as <o: documentproperties>.

中文: 目录列表泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: Directory Listing leakage(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面中是否泄漏服务端的目录列表。一般目录列表页面可能包含以下信息：[To Parent Directory], 标题一般是Index of等
en-US: This rule detects whether the server response page will leak the directory listing of the server. The general directory listing page may contain the following information: [To Parent Directory], the title is generally Index of, etc

中文: 当发生了目录列表信息泄露，响应体中会出现Index of <title>Index of <h1>Index of|[To parent Directory]</a><br>等字符。这种攻击会让攻击者很容易的发现服务器上的敏感文件。
en-US: When a directory listing leak occurs, characters such as Index of <title> Index of <h1> Index of | [To parent Directory] </a> are displayed in the response body. This attack will make it easy for attackers to discover sensitive files on the server.

中文: 建议对含有<o:documentproperties>等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended that you limit the response packets that contain [To Parent Directory], Index of, and other characters.

中文: ASP/JSP源代码泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: ASP/JSP source code leakage(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面内容是否有JSP/ASP源代码泄漏。如：server.htmlencode,server.execute,<jsp:***等
en-US: This rule detects whether the content of the server response page contains a JSP/ASP source code leak. For example, server.htmlencode,server.execute,<jsp:***, etc

中文: 当发生了ASP/JSP源代码泄漏，响应体中会出现server.htmlencode.filesystemobject|.createtext file <jsp:等字符。如果发生了源码泄露，可能会让攻击者从源码中分析出更多其它的漏洞，如SQL注入，文件上传，代码执行等。
en-US: When an ASP / JSP source code leak occurs, the response body will appear server.htmlencode.filesystemobject | .createtext file <jsp: and other characters. If a source leak occurs, it may allow attackers to analyze more of the other vulnerabilities from source code, such as SQL injection, file upload, code execution, and more.

中文: 建议对含有<o:documentproperties>等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to limit the response package containing characters such as server.htmlencode.filesystemobject | .createtext file <jsp:.

中文: PHP源代码泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: PHP source code leakage(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面内容是否有PHP源代码泄漏。如：fgets ***,fget ***, readdir ***,$_post, $_get, $_session
en-US: This rule detects whether the content of the server response page contains a PHP source code leak. For example, fgets ***,fget ***, readdir ***,$_post, $_get, $_session

中文: 当发生了PHP源代码泄露，响应体中会出现ftp_nb_fget|getsread|readgzfile|move_uploaded_file|bzopen等字符。如果发生了源码泄露，可能会让攻击者从源码中分析出更多其它的漏洞，如SQL注入，文件上传，代码执行等。
en-US: When a PHP source code leak occurs, the response body will appear ftp_nb_fget | getsread | readgzfile | move_uploaded_file | bzopen and other characters. If a source leak occurs, it may allow attackers to analyze more of the other vulnerabilities from source code, such as SQL injection, file upload, code execution, and more.

中文: 建议对含有<o:documentproperties>等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to limit the response packets containing characters such as ftp_nb_fget | getsread | readgzfile | move_uploaded_file | bzopen.

中文: Cold Fusion源代码泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: Cold Fusion source code leakage(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面内容是否有Cold Fusion的源代码泄漏，如：<cf***
en-US: This rule detects whether there the content of the server response page contains a Cold Fusion source code leak. For example, <cf***

中文: 如果当发生了源码泄露，响应体中出现了如<cf等字符，很大可能是发生了ColdFusion的源代码泄露了。攻击者从源码中分析出更多其它的漏洞，如SQL注入，文件上传，代码执行等。
en-US: If characters such as <cf appear in the response body when a source leak occurs, it is quite possible that the source code for ColdFusion has leaked. The attacker analyzed more other vulnerabilities from source code, such as SQL injection, file upload, code execution, and more.

中文: 建议对含有<cf等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to limit response packets that contain characters such as <cf.

中文: IIS缺省安装目录泄漏
en-US: IIS default installation directory leak

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面内容是否泄漏了IIS安装在缺省安装目录，如：c:\inetpub
en-US: This rule detects whether the content of the server response page will leak the information that IIS is installed in the default installation directory. For example, c:\inetpub

中文: 如果当发生了IIS缺省安装目录信息泄露，响应体中出现了如a:\\inetpub等字符，使攻击者能够通过泄露的信息进行进一步入侵；
en-US: If IIS default installation directory information leak occurs, the response body appeared characters such as a: \ inetpub, so that an attacker can further invade through the leaked information;

中文: 建议对含有a:\\inetpub等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended that you limit the response packets that contain characters such as a: \ inetpub.

中文: WebLogic信息泄漏
en-US: WebLogic information disclosure

中文: 该规则检测当服务器返回状态码为500的时候，响应页面是否泄漏WebLogic的信息，如：<title>JSP compile error</title>
en-US: This rule detects whether the response page will leak the WebLogic information when the server returns a status code of 500. For example, <title>JSP compile error</title>

中文: 当发生了Weblogic服务器的信息泄露，响应体中会出现<title>JSP compile error</title>，并且服务器应答状态是500。使得攻击者了解远程系统/服务器类型以便进行下一步的攻击。
en-US: When a Weblogic server leak occurs, <title> JSP compile error </ title> appears in the response body, and the server responds with a status of 500. Makes the attacker aware of the remote system / server type for the next attack.

中文: 建议对含有<title>JSP compile error</title>等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to limit the response packets that contain characters such as <title> JSP compile error </ title>.

中文: Web应用程序不可用信息泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: Web application is not available Information leak(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面内容是否泄漏了相关的web应用程序信息。如：Microsoft OLE DB Provider for SQL Server (0x80040e31) Timeout expired
en-US: This rule detects whether the content of the server response page will leak the related web application information. For example, Microsoft OLE DB Provider for SQL Server (0x80040e31) Timeout expired

中文: 攻击者正使用自动化客户端或者自动化扫描工具对服务器操作的话，响应体出现了服务端数据库连接失败的提示。一旦让攻击者找到后台的弱点，将会进行下一步的攻击。
en-US: The attacker is using the automated client or automated scanning tools to operate the server, the response body appeared server database connection failure tips. Once the attacker has found the weakness in the background, the next attack will take place.

中文: 建议对含有Microsoft OLE DB Provider for SQL Server|part of the server has crashed or it has a configuration error|cannot connect to the server: timed out等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended that you limit the response packets that contain Microsoft OLE DB Provider for SQL Server | part of the server has crashed or it has a configuration error | can not connect to the server: timed out and other characters.

中文: Web应用程序不可用，5XX错误(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: Web application error message leaked(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器返回的状态码，如果是5XX错误码，则表示web应用程序不可用，该规则将阻止5XX错误。
en-US: This rule detects the status code returned by the server. If it is 5XX error code, it means that the web application is not available, and the rule will block the 5XX error.

中文: 如果响应状态是5字头，这类状态码代表了服务器在处理请求的过程中有错误或者异常状态发生，也有可能是服务器意识到以当前的软硬件资源无法完成对请求的处理。除非这是一个HEAD 请求，否则服务器应当包含一个解释当前错误状态以及这个状况是临时的还是永久的解释信息实体。浏览器应当向用户展示任何在当前响应中被包含的实体。
en-US: If the response status is 5 prefix, this status code represents the server in the process of processing errors or abnormal conditions occur, it may be that the server aware of the current hardware and software resources can not complete the request processing. Unless this is a HEAD request, the server should include an interpreter entity that explains the current error status and whether the status is temporary or permanent. The browser should show the user any entities contained in the current response.

中文: 建议对响应状态是5字头的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to limit the response packet whose response status is 5 prefixes.

中文: xml中的PHP源代码泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: PHP source code leakage(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面中的xml内容中是否有PHP源代码泄漏。
en-US: This rule detects whether the xml content in the server response page contains a PHP source code leak.

中文: 如果xml中的PHP源码泄露，应答体中会出现<?xml，并且没有 interplay|hdr|movi|gif|%pdf等字符。攻击者从源码中分析出更多其它的漏洞，如SQL注入，文件上传，代码执行等。
en-US: If xml PHP source leaked, the response will appear <? Xml, and there is no interplay | hdr | movi | gif |% pdf and other characters. The attacker analyzed more other vulnerabilities from source code, such as SQL injection, file upload, code execution, and more.

中文: 建议对含有<?xml，并且没有 interplay|hdr|movi|gif|%pdf等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to limit response packets that contain <? Xml, and no interplay | hdr | movi | gif |% pdf and other characters.

中文: ASP/JSP源代码泄漏(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: ASP/JSP source code leakage(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测服务器响应页面内容是否有ASP/JSP的源代码泄漏，如：<%***
en-US: This rule detects whether the content of the server response page contains a ASP/JSP source code leak. For example, <%***

中文: 如果当发生了ASP/JSP源代码泄漏，响应体中会出现\<\%，并且没有出现如 interplay|mthd|exif|.ra|riff等字符。发生了源码泄露，让攻击者从源码中分析出更多其它的漏洞，如SQL注入，文件上传，代码执行等。
en-US: If there is a leak in the ASP / JSP source code, \ <\% appears in the response body and no characters such as interplay | mthd | exif | .ra | riff appear. A source leak has occurred that allows an attacker to analyze more of the other vulnerabilities from source code, such as SQL injection, file upload, code execution, and more.

中文: 建议对含有\<\%，并且没有出现如 interplay|mthd|exif|.ra|riff等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to limit the response packets that contain \ <\% and do not show characters such as interplay | mthd | exif | .ra | riff.

中文: IIS的404错误页面泄漏信息(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: IIS Information Leakage(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 该规则检测IIS的404错误页面，看是否泄漏信息。如泄漏web应用程序相关的信息：Server Error in *** Application
en-US: This rule detects the 404 error page of IIS, to see if it is leaking information. For example leak the information about the web application: Server Error in *** Application

中文: 如果发生了IIS的错误信息泄露，响应状态将不是404，并且响应体中会出现如Server Error in  | Application等字符。信息泄露会暴露服务器的敏感信息，使攻击者能够通过泄露的信息进行进一步入侵
en-US: If an IIS error message leaks, the response status will not be 404, and the response body will appear as Server Error in | Application and other characters. Information leakage exposes the server's sensitive information so that an attacker can further invade through the compromised information

中文: 建议对含有Server Error in  | Application等字符的响应包进行限制。
en-US: It is recommended to limit the response packets that contain characters such as Server Error in | Application.

中文: xss常规异常检测(OWASP TOP 10)
en-US: xss conventional anomaly detected(OWASP TOP 10)

中文: 通过在请求内容中检测address、applet、area、audioscope、basefront等关键词来检测可能的xss攻击
en-US: Detect possible xss attacks by detecting address, applet, area, audioscope, basefront and etc keywords in the request content

中文: 当cookies或请求参数或xml中出现如<abbr%|<fieldset$|<shadow#等字符的时候，需要注意是否受到了XSS攻击，作为一种经常出现在web应用中最主流的攻击方式，攻击者可利用此攻击将恶意代码植入到提供给其他用户使用的页面中，甚至可化身为网络钓鱼攻击或者获取cookie并利用。
en-US: When cookies or request parameters or characters such as <abbr% | <fieldset $ | <shadow # appear in the xml, you need to be aware of the XSS attack. As a frequent attack on web applications, attacks The attacker can use this attack to embed malicious code into the pages provided to other users, even as a phishing attack or cookie acquisition and utilization.

中文: 建议在web服务器添加对含有<abbr%|<fieldset$|<shadow#等敏感字符的数据进行过滤
en-US: It is advisable to filter the web server for data containing sensitive characters such as <abbr% | <fieldset $ | <shadow #

As an attack that often occurs in web applications, an attacker can use this attack Malicious code is embedded in pages that are available to other users and can even be used as a phishing attack or cookie.

As an attack that often occurs in web applications, an attacker can use this attack Malicious code is embedded in pages that are available to other users and can even be used as a phishing attack or cookie.

中文: 建议在web服务器添加对含有<!(doctype等敏感字符的数据进行过滤
en-US: It is advisable to filter the web server for data that contains sensitive characters such as <!(doctype

中文: xss攻击危害：1、盗取各类用户帐号，如机器登录帐号、用户网银帐号、各类管理员帐号2、控制企业数据，包括读取、篡改、添加、删除企业敏感数据的能力3、盗窃企业重要的具有商业价值的资料4、非法转账5、强制发送电子邮件6、网站挂马7、控制受害者机器向其它网站发起攻击
en-US: xss attack harm: 1, steal all kinds of user accounts, such as machine login account, user online banking account, all kinds of administrator account 2, control of enterprise data, including the ability to read, tamper, add, delete enterprise sensitive data 3 theft Important business value of the information 4, illegal transfer 5, forced to send e-mail 6, the site linked to horses 7, to control the victim machine to attack other sites

中文: 对所有用户提交内容进行可靠的输入验证，包括对URL、查询关键字、HTTP头、POST数据等，仅接受指定长度范围内、采用适当格式、采用所预期的字符的内容提交，对其他的一律过滤。实现Session标记(session tokens)、CAPTCHA系统或者HTTP引用头检查，以防功能被第三方网站所执行。
en-US: All user submitted content for reliable input validation, including the URL, query keywords, HTTP headers, POST data, etc., only accept the specified length range, using the appropriate format, the contents of the expected character submitted, the other one filter. Implement session tokens, CAPTCHA systems, or HTTP header checks to prevent third-party sites from performing functions.

en-US: When PM_XSS_SCORE is detected as 0, part of the XSS attack detection will be skipped, improving the working performance for waf.

en-US: Apache SSL pinger abnormal detected（Common Exceptions）

en-US: Apache internal dummy connection abnormal detected（Common Exceptions）

en-US: Detect Adobe Flash Player Exceptions (Common Exceptions)
The unusual Adobe Flash Player could be caused by an attacker

中文: 检测是否发生了Brute Force Attack 阻断（Brute Force）
en-US: Brute Force Attack Detected-1

中文: 如果发生了Brute Force Attack 阻断，则累计阻断次数，并记录日志（Brute Force）
en-US: If a Brute Force Attack block occurs, accumulate the number of blocking and record the log (Brute Force)

中文: 攻击者通过短时间内频繁的请求或登录，系统地组合所有可能性（例如登录时用到的账户名、密码），尝试所有的可能性破解用户的账户名、密码等敏感信息。攻击者会经常使用自动化脚本组合出正确的用户名和密码。
en-US: The attacker systematically combines all possibilities (for example, the account name and password used when logging in) to make all possible attempts to crack sensitive information, such as the user's account name and password, through frequent requests or logins over a short period of time. Attackers often use automated scripts to combine the correct user name and password.

中文: 建议设立密码验证机制：都会设下试误的可容许次数以应对使用密码穷举法的破解者。当试误次数达到可容许次数时，密码验证系统会自动拒绝继续验证，甚至可以自动启动入侵警报机制。
en-US: Recommend the establishment of password authentication mechanism: will set the allowable number of trial and error to deal with the hacker using the password exhaustive method. When the number of trial and error reaches the allowable number of times, the password verification system will automatically refuse to continue verification, or even automatically activate the intrusion alert mechanism.

中文: 检测是否发生了Brute Force Attack 阻断（无日志）（Brute Force）
en-US: Brute Force Attack Detected-2

中文: 如果发生了Brute Force Attack 阻断，则累计阻断次数，但不记录日志（Brute Force）
en-US: If a Brute Force Attack block occurs, accumulate the number of blocking but do not record the log (Brute Force)

中文: 攻击者通过短时间内频繁的请求或登录，系统地组合所有可能性（例如登录时用到的账户名、密码），尝试所有的可能性破解用户的账户名、密码等敏感信息。攻击者会经常使用自动化脚本组合出正确的用户名和密码。
en-US: The attacker systematically combines all possibilities (for example, the account name and password used when logging in) to make all possible attempts to crack sensitive information, such as the user's account name and password, through frequent requests or logins over a short period of time. Attackers often use automated scripts to combine the correct user name and password.

中文: 建议设立密码验证机制：都会设下试误的可容许次数以应对使用密码穷举法的破解者。当试误次数达到可容许次数时，密码验证系统会自动拒绝继续验证，甚至可以自动启动入侵警报机制。
en-US: Recommend the establishment of password authentication mechanism: will set the allowable number of trial and error to deal with the hacker using the password exhaustive method. When the number of trial and error reaches the allowable number of times, the password verification system will automatically refuse to continue verification, or even automatically activate the intrusion alert mechanism.

中文: 检测用户是否在10个Brute Force Protection配置文件中定义了一些URL（Brute Force）
en-US: Brute Force Protection check-1

中文: 如果用户没有在10个Brute Force Protection配置文件中定义了任何URL，则跳过Brute Force Protection规则检测（Brute Force）
en-US: If a user does not define any URL in 10 Brute Force Protection profiles, skip the Brute Force Protection rule detection

中文: 攻击者通过短时间内频繁的请求或登录，系统地组合所有可能性（例如登录时用到的账户名、密码），尝试所有的可能性破解用户的账户名、密码等敏感信息。攻击者会经常使用自动化脚本组合出正确的用户名和密码。
en-US: The attacker systematically combines all possibilities (for example, the account name and password used when logging in) to make all possible attempts to crack sensitive information, such as the user's account name and password, through frequent requests or logins over a short period of time. Attackers often use automated scripts to combine the correct user name and password.

中文: 建议设立密码验证机制：都会设下试误的可容许次数以应对使用密码穷举法的破解者。当试误次数达到可容许次数时，密码验证系统会自动拒绝继续验证，甚至可以自动启动入侵警报机制。
en-US: Recommend the establishment of password authentication mechanism: will set the allowable number of trial and error to deal with the hacker using the password exhaustive method. When the number of trial and error reaches the allowable number of times, the password verification system will automatically refuse to continue verification, or even automatically activate the intrusion alert mechanism.

en-US: Brute Force Protection check-2

en-US: Brute Force Attack Detected-3

中文: 检测Burst数值（Brute Force）
en-US: Brute Force Attack Detected-4

中文: 如果Burst数值大于或等于2，则设置IP阻断数值为每5分钟阻断一次并发出告警（Brute Force）
en-US: If the Burst value is greater than or equal to 2, set the IP blocking value to block once every 5 minutes and send an alarm (Brute Force)

中文: 检测是否有IP地址被阻断了(Dos Protection)
en-US: Dos Protection check-1

中文: 如果有IP地址被阻断了（Dos Block），则累计阻断数值，并记录日志(Dos Protection)
en-US: If any IP address is blocked(Dos Block), accumulate the number of blocking and record the log (Dos Protection)

中文: DoS攻击是指故意的攻击网络协议实现的缺陷或直接通过野蛮手段残忍地耗尽被攻击对象的资源，目的是让目标计算机或网络无法提供正常的服务或资源访问，使目标系统服务系统停止响应甚至崩溃，而在此攻击中并不包括侵入目标服务器或目标网络设备。这些服务资源包括网络带宽，文件系统空间容量，开放的进程或者允许的连接。这种攻击会导致资源的匮乏，无论计算机的处理速度多快、内存容量多大、网络带宽的速度多快都无法避免这种攻击带来的后果
en-US: DoS attack refers to deliberately attacking the defects of the network protocol or directly exhausting the resource of the attacked object brutely by means of savagery so that the target computer or network can not provide normal service or resource access and the target system service system stops responding Even crashing, but does not include intrusion in the target server or target network equipment in this attack. These service resources include network bandwidth, file system space capacity, open processes, or allowable connections. This type of attack can result in a scarcity of resources and can not avoid the consequences of such an attack, no matter how fast the computer is processed, how large the memory is, and how fast the network bandwidth is

中文: 建议网络管理员要积极谨慎地维护系统，确保无安全隐患和漏洞。同时强烈建议网络管理员应当定期查看安全设备的日志，及时发现对系统的安全威胁行为。
en-US: It is recommended that network administrators actively maintain the system to ensure that there are no security risks and vulnerabilities. At the same time, it is strongly recommended that network administrators should periodically check the logs of security devices and find out the security threats to the system in time.

中文: 检测是否有IP地址被阻断了,无日志(Dos Protection)
en-US: Dos Protection check-2

中文: 如果有IP地址被阻断了（Dos Block），则累计阻断数值，无日志记录(Dos Protection)

中文: 检测公开的代理服务器是否被滥用或捆绑（Proxy Abuse）
en-US: Proxy Abuse check

中文: 如果检测到公开代理服务器被滥用，则阻断访问（Proxy Abuse）
en-US: If a public proxy server is detected to be abused, the access would be blocked (Proxy Abuse)

中文: 开放代理滥用
en-US: Detection of open proxy malicious abuse

中文: 建议web服务器中X-Forwarded-For的地址和请求域名地址处于不同地理位置的请求过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested that the address of the X-Forwarded-For address in the web server and the request for the domain name address be filtered in different geographical locations.

中文: 检测Apache返回的HTTP响应状态码(Slow Dos Protection)
en-US: Response status code detected

中文: 检测Apache返回的HTTP响应状态码是否为408，若为true，则累加ip的slow_dos_counter值(Slow Dos Protection)
en-US: Detect whether the HTTP response status code returned by Apache is 408. If it is true, accumulate the slow_dos_counter value of ip

中文: 慢攻击的原理就是设法让服务器等待，当服务器在保持连接等待时，消耗了服务器的资源。
en-US: The principle of slow attack is to try to make the server wait, when the server is waiting for the connection, consumes the server's resources.

中文: 建议把服务器连接等待的时间减短。
en-US: It is recommended to reduce the server connection waiting time.

中文: 检测slow_dos_counter的数值(Slow Dos Protection)
en-US: slow_dos_counter value Detected

中文: 检测slow_dos_counter的值是否大于5，若符合规则，则drop掉数据包(Slow Dos Protection)
en-US: Detect whether the value of slow_dos_counter is greater than 5. If it meets the rule, drop the packet (Slow Dos Protection)

中文: 慢攻击的原理就是设法让服务器等待，当服务器在保持连接等待时，消耗了服务器的资源。
en-US: The principle of slow attack is to try to make the server wait, when the server is waiting for the connection, consumes the server's resources.

中文: 建议把服务器连接等待的时间减短。
en-US: It is recommended to reduce the server connection waiting time.

中文: 检测请求content-type是否为xml（XML ENABLER）
en-US: content-type content detected

中文: 如果请求content-type是否为xml，则触发一个xml解析器
en-US: If the request content-type is xml, an xml parser would be triggered
Check if the content-type request is xml

中文: 检测提交的会话ID是否有效（Session Hijacking）
en-US: SessionID check

中文: 如果提交的会话ID无效，则阻断访问（Session Hijacking）
en-US: If the submitted session ID is invalid, the access would be blocked (Session Hijacking)

中文: 在请求包发送到服务器的如jsessionid|phpsessid|aspsession-id|cftoken等表示session等参数的唯一ID如果是新的，可劫持会话
en-US: In the request packet sent to the server, such as jsessionid | phpsessid | aspsession-id | cftoken session ID and other parameters that are unique if the new session can be hijacked

中文:
预防措施包括限制入网的连接和设置你的网络拒绝假冒本地地址从互联网上发来的数据包。
加密也是有帮助的。如果你必须要允许来自可信赖的主机的外部连接，你可以使用Kerberos或者IPsec工具。使用更安全的协议，FTP和Telnet协议是最容易受到攻击的。SSH是一种很好的替代方法。SSH在本地和远程主机之间建立一个加密的频道。同时，有些网站也用Https代替Http协议。Https在本地和远程主机之间建立一个加密的频道。通过使用IDS或者IPS系统能够改善检测。交换机、SSH等协议和更随机的初始序列号的使用
en-US:
Preventive measures include limiting the connection to the network and setting up your network to reject fake local addresses from packets sent over the Internet.
Encryption is also helpful. If you have to allow external connections from trusted hosts, you can use Kerberos or IPsec tools. With more secure protocols, the FTP and Telnet protocols are the most vulnerable. SSH is a good alternative. SSH establishes an encrypted channel between local and remote hosts. At the same time, some sites also use Https instead of Http protocol. Https creates an encrypted channel between local and remote hosts. Detection can be improved by using IDS or IPS systems. Switch, ssh and other protocols and the use of more random initial serial numbers

中文: 检测请求输出数据中的请求参数（CC Known）
en-US: request-ARGS detected

中文: 检测请求输出数据中的请求参数，若匹配规则，则跳过输入数据CC部分的检测规则，继续处理（CC Known）
en-US: Detect the request parameters in the request output data. If it meets the rule, skip detection rule for CC part of input data and continue processing (CC Known)

中文: 如果发生银行卡卡号密码盗窃行为，会存在GSA SmartPay,MasterCard,Visa,American Express,Diner Club,Discover,JCB等信用卡卡号信息的输入处理，如果攻击者窃取了这些数据是非常的危险的，甚至会利用一系列信息进行欺诈。
en-US: Detection request output data in the request parameters, if the match rules, then skip the input data CC part of the detection rules, continue processing

中文: 初始化CC访问请求数据的默认行为是"继续处理"（CC Known）
en-US: KNOWN_CC_INBOUND_CHECK

中文: 初始化CC访问请求数据的默认行为是“继续处理”,无日志记录，默认跳过END_KNOWN_CC_INBOUND_CHECK规则（CC Known）
en-US: The default behavior for initializing CC access request data is "continue processing", there is no logging, and skip the END_KNOWN_CC_INBOUND_CHECK rule by default (CC Known)
The default behavior for initializing CC access request data is Resume Processing, no logging, default skip END_KNOWN_CC_INBOUND_CHECK rule

中文: 检测CC响应数据中的参数（CC Known）
en-US: KNOWN_CC_ARGS_CHECK

中文: 检测CC响应数据中的参数，若匹配规则，则跳过响应数据中CC部分的检测规则，继续处理（CC Known）
en-US: Detect the parameters in the CC response data. If it meets the rule, skip the detection rule of the CC part of the response data and continue processing (CC Known)

中文: 如果发生银行卡卡号密码盗窃行为，会存在GSA SmartPay,MasterCard,Visa,American Express,Diner Club,Discover,JCB等信用卡卡号信息的输入处理，如果攻击者窃取了这些数据是非常的危险的，甚至会利用一系列信息进行欺诈。
en-US: Detection of CC response data in the parameters, if the match rules, then skip the response data CC part of the detection rules, continue processing

中文: 初始化CC响应数据的默认行为是"继续处理"（CC Known）
en-US: CC response data processing

中文: 初始化CC访问响应数据的默认行为是“继续处理”,无日志记录，默认跳过END_KNOWN_CC_OUTBOUND_CHECK规则（CC Known）
en-US: The default behavior of initializing CC access response data is "continue processing", there is no logging, and skip the END_KNOWN_CC_OUTBOUND_CHECK rule by default (CC Known)
The default behavior for initializing CC access response data is Resume Processing, no logging, default skip END_KNOWN_CC_OUTBOUND_CHECK rule

中文: 初始化资源收集的默认行为是"继续处理"（AppSensor Detection）
en-US: Initialize resource collection

中文: 初始化资源收集的默认行为是"继续处理"，无日志记录，初始化相关参数（AppSensor Detection）
en-US: The default behavior for initializing resource collection is "continue processing", there is no logging, and initialize related parameters (AppSensor Detection)
The default behavior for initializing a resource collection is to "continue processing", no logging, initializing related parameters

中文: 检测esource.enforce_profile的参数是否为0（AppSensor Detection）
en-US: esource.enforce_profile value check-1

中文: 如果esource.enforce_profile参数为0，则跳过profile enforcement规则检测（AppSensor Detection）
en-US: If the esource.enforce_profile parameter is 0, skip the profile enforcement rule detection (AppSensor Detection)

中文: 攻击者利用请求方法，参数个数，参数名字，参数长度，参数字符等常见的属性违例的请求访问服务器。
en-US: Attackers use requests such as request methods, number of parameters, parameter names, parameter lengths, parameter characters and other common property violations to access the server.

中文: 建议web服务器对请求方法，参数个数，参数名字，参数长度，参数字符等常见的属性违例的请求过滤。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter requests such as request method, number of parameters, parameter name, parameter length, parameter characters and other common property violations.

中文: 检测esource.enforce_profile的参数是否为1（AppSensor Detection）
en-US: esource.enforce_profile value check-2

中文: 如果esource.enforce_profile参数为1，则执行对应文件appsensor_request_exception_enforce.lua（AppSensor Detection）
en-US: If the esource.enforce_profile parameter is 1, execute the corresponding file appsensor_request_exception_enforce.lua (AppSensor Detection)

中文: 攻击者利用请求方法，参数个数，参数名字，参数长度，参数字符等常见的属性违例的请求访问服务器。

中文:
垃圾评论是一种攻击，对象是对博客、论坛、留言板等会接受并显示游客提供的超级链接的交互网页。
这些垃圾评论制造者会专门发送一些自动的、随意的评论，并会携带一个链接到攻击者的站点，然后这些链接就会被人工的提高了在网站的搜索引擎中的排名，从而在网站的搜索结果中更加明显
en-US:
Spam review is an attack on an interactive web page that blogs, forums, message boards, etc., accept and display hyperlinks provided by visitors.
The spam review builders send out some automatic, casual comments and will bring a link to the attacker's site, and those links will be manually raised in the site's search engine rankings, which in the site's More obvious in the search results

中文: 建议使用第三方反垃圾系统。垃圾评论 90% 以上都是由机器人产生的，因此使用验证码也可以过滤掉大部分的垃圾评论。
en-US: It is recommended to use third-party anti-spam system. More than 90% of spam comments are generated by robots, so using captchas can also filter out most of the spam comments.

中文: 检测垃圾评论数据来源是否符合预先黑名单（Comment Spam）
en-US: Blacklist detected

中文: 如果垃圾评论URL来源处于预先的黑名单，则跳过黑名单检测规则END_RBL_CHECK，并记录日志（Comment Spam）
en-US: If the spam comment URL source is in the pre-blacklist, skip the blacklist detection rule END_RBL_CHECK, and record the log (Comment Spam)

中文:
垃圾评论是一种攻击，对象是对博客、论坛、留言板等会接受并显示游客提供的超级链接的交互网页。

The spam review builders send out some automatic, casual comments and will bring a link to the attacker's site, and those links will be manually raised in the site's search engine rankings, which in the site's More obvious in the search results

en-US:
Spam review is an attack on an interactive web page that blogs, forums, message boards, etc., accept and display hyperlinks provided by visitors.
The spam review builders send out some automatic, casual comments and will bring a link to the attacker's site, and those links will be manually raised in the site's search engine rankings, which in the site's More obvious in the search results

中文: 建议使用第三方反垃圾系统。垃圾评论 90% 以上都是由机器人产生的，因此使用验证码也可以过滤掉大部分的垃圾评论。
en-US: It is recommended to use third-party anti-spam system. More than 90% of spam comments are generated by robots, so using captchas can also filter out most of the spam comments.

中文: 检测请求是否为CSP Violation Report Request（CSP Enforcement）
en-US: CSP Violation Report Request Detected

中文: 如果请求为CSP Violation Report Request，则打开功能：forceRequestBodyVariable（CSP Enforcement）
en-US: If the request is CSP Violation Report Request, open the function: forceRequestBodyVariable (CSP Enforcement)

中文: 如果请求是CSP Violation Report，waf会启动请求体检测。因为content-type是json的话，请求体的检测默认是关闭的。
en-US: If the request is a CSP Violation Report, waf will initiate a request body test. Because content-type is json, request body detection is turned off by default.

中文: 检测是否缺少CSRF Token(CSRF Protection)
en-US: CSRF Token check

中文: 如果缺少CSRF Token，则阻断访问(CSRF Protection)
en-US: If CSRF Token is missing, the access would be blocked (CSRF Protection)

中文: 攻击者盗用了你的身份，以你的名义发送恶意请求。CSRF能够做的事情包括：以你名义发送邮件，发消息，盗取你的账号，甚至于购买商品，虚拟货币转账......造成的问题包括：个人隐私泄露以及财产安全。
en-US:
An attacker has stolen your identity and sent a malicious request on your behalf. What CSRF can do: send mail on your behalf, send a message, steal your account, or even purchase goods, virtual currency transfers
Problems caused include: personal privacy leaks and property safety.
Filter requests for missing CSRF Token

中文: 检测是否Token是否有效(CSRF Protection)
en-US: CSRF Attack Detected

中文: 如果Token无效，则阻断访问(CSRF Protection)
en-US: If Token is invalid, the access would be blocked (CSRF Protection)

中文: 攻击者盗用了你的身份，以你的名义发送恶意请求。CSRF能够做的事情包括：以你名义发送邮件，发消息，盗取你的账号，甚至于购买商品，虚拟货币转账......造成的问题包括：个人隐私泄露以及财产安全。
en-US:
An attacker has stolen your identity and sent a malicious request on your behalf. What CSRF can do: send mail on your behalf, send a message, steal your account, or even purchase goods, virtual currency transfers
Problems caused include: personal privacy leaks and property safety.
Filter request with invalid CSRF Token

中文: 检测是否需要内容注入到CSRF Token(CSRF Protection)
en-US: SESSION:CSRF_TOKEN check

中文: 如果需要，则附加相关内容到CSRF Token(CSRF Protection)
en-US: If necessary, attach relevant content to CSRF Token (CSRF Protection)

中文: 攻击者盗用了你的身份，以你的名义发送恶意请求。CSRF能够做的事情包括：以你名义发送邮件，发消息，盗取你的账号，甚至于购买商品，虚拟货币转账......造成的问题包括：个人隐私泄露以及财产安全。
en-US:
An attacker has stolen your identity and sent a malicious request on your behalf. What CSRF can do: send mail on your behalf, send a message, steal your account, or even purchase goods, virtual currency transfers
Problems caused include: personal privacy leaks and property safety.

中文: SQL注入字符的异常使用检测
en-US: SQL injection Detected

中文: 通过探测在COOKIE中出现:#*%$!等字符的次数来判断是否存在注入风险
en-US: To judge if there an injection risk by detecting the number of occurrences of characters in COOKIE, such as #*%$! and etc

中文: 在cookies和请求参数和xml中利用~!@#$%^&*()-+={}|"'[]等字符多于8次，攻击者可尝试利用字符实施SQL注入。一旦注入成功，攻击者可获取数据库的管理用户权限，然后将数据库管理用户权限提升至操作系统管理用户权限，控制服务器操作系统，获取重要信息及机密文件。
en-US: Using more than 8 characters such as ~! @ #%% ^ & * () - + = {} | "[] in cookies and request parameters and xml allows an attacker to try out SQL injection using characters. Once the injection is successful , An attacker can gain administrative user privileges on the database, then elevate database administrative user rights to operating system administrative user rights, control the server operating system, and obtain important information and confidential documents.

中文: 建议在web服务器添加对含有~!@#$%^&*()-+={}|"'[]等字符的数据进行过滤
en-US: It is advisable to filter the web server for data containing characters like ~! @ # $% ^ & * () - + = {} | "[]

中文: SQL注入字符的异常使用检测
en-US: SQL injection Detected

中文: 通过探测URL参数中传递的值是否出现：#*%!等字符超出预期次数，来判断注入风险
en-US: To judge if there an injection risk by detecting whether the value passed in the URL parameter occurs #*%! and etc characters exceed the expected number

中文: 当请求参数和xml中如!~#$%{}:;'><&=+等字符多次出现，攻击者可尝试利用敏感的字符绕过防火墙，攻击者可获取数据库的管理用户权限，然后将数据库管理用户权限提升至操作系统管理用户权限，控制服务器操作系统，获取重要信息及机密文件。
en-US: When request parameters and xml characters such as! ~ # $% {}:;> <& = + Appear multiple times, an attacker can try to use sensitive characters to bypass the firewall. An attacker can obtain database administrative user rights, Then elevate database administration user rights to operating system administration user rights, control the server operating system, and obtain important information and confidential documents.

中文: 建议在web服务器添加对含有多个 !~#$%{}:;'><&=+ 字符的数据进行过滤
en-US: It is recommended to add to the web server to filter the data containing multiple! ~ # $% {}:; '> <& = + Characters

中文: 检测入站数据是否有以开源漏洞数据库（OSVDB）中标记的资源为目标的攻击（Inbound Blocking）
en-US: OSVDB Attack detected

中文: 如果有入站攻击，则拒绝访问，并记录日志（Inbound Blocking）
en-US: If there is an inbound attack, the access would be blocked and the log would be recorded (Inbound block it)

中文: 攻击者以开源漏洞数据库中标记的资源为目标攻击，能快速的找到目标所存在的漏洞
en-US: An attacker targeting a resource tagged in the open source vulnerability database can quickly find the target vulnerability

中文: 建议在web服务器限制访问开源漏洞数据库中标记的资源的请求的次数
en-US: It is recommended that the web server limit the number of requests to access resources tagged in the open source vulnerability database

中文: 检测入站数据异常分数是否溢出（Inbound Blocking）
en-US: Inbound data detected

中文: 如果异常分数溢出，则拒绝访问，并记录日志（Inbound Blocking）
en-US: If the anomaly score overflows, the access would be blocked and the log would be recorded (Inbound block it)

中文: 攻击者使用多次异常的数据对服务器进行试探，通过响应信息得到服务器的敏感信息
en-US: An attacker uses multiple abnormal data to test the server, through the response information to get the server's sensitive information

中文: 建议在web服务器限制异常访问的次数
en-US: It is advisable to limit the number of anomalous accesses on the web server

中文: 检测出站数据是否有Iframe注入攻击（OutBound）
en-US: Iframe injection detected

中文: 检测响应体数据是否含有iframe短语，如果没有，则跳过Iframe规则检测（OutBound）
en-US: Detect whether the response data contains iframe phrase. If not, skip the Iframe detection rule (OutBound)

中文: 当cookies或请求参数或xml中出现如Iframe等字符的时候，需要注意是否受到了XSS攻击，作为一种经常出现在web应用中最主流的攻击方式，攻击者可利用此攻击将恶意代码植入到提供给其他用户使用的页面中，甚至可化身为网络钓鱼攻击或者获取cookie并利用。
en-US: When cookies or request parameters or characters like Iframe appear in xml, you need to be aware of whether XSS is attacked. As an attack that often occurs in web applications, an attacker can use this attack to embed malicious code To the pages provided to other users, even as a phishing attack or access to cookie and use.

中文: 建议在web服务器对含有iframe的信息进行过滤
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter the iframe-containing information

中文: 检测出站数据是否有modsecurity_50_outbound.data文件中列出的短语（OutBound）
en-US: OutBound DATA AGRS check

中文: 如果响应体数据没有modsecurity_50_outbound.data文件中列出的短语，则跳过OutBound规则检测(OutBound)
en-US: If the response data does not have the phrase listed in the modsecurity_50_outbound.data file, skip the OutBound rule detection (OutBound)

中文: 攻击者可以通过服务器返回的信息，进一步获取敏感信息
en-US: Attackers can use the information returned by the server to gain further access to sensitive information

中文: 建议在web服务器对返回信息进行过滤，控制服务器返回的内容
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter the returned information and control what is returned by the server

中文: 检测XSS数据是否在全局变量列表里（Application Defects）
en-US: XSS_LIST_CHECK

中文: 如果XSS数据已经在全局变量列表里，则跳过规则（Application Defects）
en-US: If the XSS data is already in the global variable list, the rule would be skipped (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者向有XSS漏洞的网站中输入(传入)恶意的HTML代码，当其它用户浏览该网站时，这段HTML代码会自动执行，从而达到攻击的目的。如，盗取用户Cookie、破坏页面结构、重定向到其它网站等。
en-US: An attacker could type (pass in) malicious HTML code into sites that have XSS vulnerabilities, and this HTML code will be executed automatically when other users browse the site for the purpose of the attack. For example, steal user Cookie, destroy page structure, redirect to other websites.

中文: 建议在web服务器对用户的输入进行处理，只允许输入合法的值，其它值一概过滤掉，对标签进行转换
en-US: Proposed in the web server to deal with the user's input, allowing only the importation of legitimate values, other values are filtered out, the label conversion

中文: 检测请求数据中的INBOUND_META-CHARACTERS是否匹配规则（Application Defects）
en-US: INBOUND_META-CHARACTERS_CHECK

中文: 如果匹配，则设置global的XSS列表参数（Application Defects）
en-US: If the rule matches, set the XSS list parameter of global (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者向有XSS漏洞的网站中输入(传入)恶意的HTML代码，当其它用户浏览该网站时，这段HTML代码会自动执行，从而达到攻击的目的。如，盗取用户Cookie、破坏页面结构、重定向到其它网站等。
en-US: An attacker could type (pass in) malicious HTML code into sites that have XSS vulnerabilities, and this HTML code will be executed automatically when other users browse the site for the purpose of the attack. For example, steal user Cookie, destroy page structure, redirect to other websites.

中文: 建议在web服务器对用户的输入进行处理，只允许输入合法的值，其它值一概过滤掉，对标签进行转换
en-US: Proposed in the web server to deal with the user's input, allowing only the importation of legitimate values, other values are filtered out, the label conversion

中文: 检测响应数据中是否包含已知的恶意字符（Application Defects）
en-US: Malicious Meta-Characters check

中文: 检测响应数据中是否包含已知的恶意字符，如果有，则记录日志（Application Defects）
en-US: Detect whether the response data contains the known malicious characters. If it is, the log would be recorded (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会利用请求中带有恶意的没有编码说明的元字符的请求访问服务器。
en-US: An attacker can access the server with a request that contains a malicious, uncoded metacharacter.

中文: 建议web服务器带有恶意的没有编码说明的元字符的请求过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter requests with malicious meta-characters that are not encoded.

中文: 检测响应数据中是否缺少Cookie's HttpOnly标志（Application Defects）
en-US: HttpOnly Cookie Flag check

中文: 如果响应数据中缺少Cookie's HttpOnly标志，则记录日志（Application Defects）
en-US: If the Cookie's HttpOnly flag is missing from the response data, the log would be recorded (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会使用缺少http cookie是唯一的标志的请求访问服务器。
en-US: An attacker would use a request that lacks the http cookie that is the only flag to access the server.

中文: 建议web服务器把http cookie不是唯一的标志的请求过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter the request that the http cookie is not the only one.

中文: 检测响应数据中是否缺少Cookie's Secure标志（Application Defects）
en-US: Secure Cookie Flag check

中文: 如果响应数据中缺少Cookie's Secure标志，则记录日志（Application Defects）
en-US: If the Cookie's Secure flag is missing from the response data, the log would be recorded (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会使用缺少http cookie安全的的标志的请求访问服务器。
en-US: An attacker accesses the server using requests that lack the http cookie-safe flag.

中文: 建议web服务器把没有http cookie安全的的标志的请求过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter out requests that do not have http cookie-safe flags.

中文: 通过profile_page_scripts.lua脚本检测响应数据是否匹配规则（Response Profiling）
en-US: profile_page_scripts.lua check

中文: 通过profile_page_scripts.lua脚本检测响应数据是否匹配规则（Response Profiling）
en-US: Detect whether the response data matches the rule via the profile_page_scripts.lua script (Response Profiling)

en-US: The use of

中文: 建议定时对网页、数据库等重要文件经常备份，日常需要多维护。一旦发现入侵，及时还原备份信息。
en-US: It is recommended to periodically back up frequently important files such as web pages and databases, and to maintain them on a daily basis. Once found the invasion, the timely restoration of backup information.
