中文: 建议定时对网页、数据库等重要文件经常备份，日常需要多维护。一旦发现入侵，及时还原备份信息。
en-US: It is recommended to periodically back up frequently important files such as web pages and databases, and to maintain them on a daily basis. Once found the invasion, the timely restoration of backup information.

中文: 检测http状态码及开源漏洞数据库(OSVDB）参数状态（Pvi Checks）
en-US: OSVDB_CHECK

中文: 如果OSVDB的参数OSVDB_CHECK为0且响应状态码为200，则执行osvdb.lua脚本进行规则匹配检测（Pvi Checks）
en-US: If the parameter OSVDB_CHECK of OSVDB is 0 and the response status code is 200, execute the osvdb.lua script to perform the rule matching detection (Pvi Checks)

中文: 当检测到OSVDB_CHECK为0，返回状体是200，将会启动一些相关的检测脚本。
en-US: When OSVDB_CHECK is detected as 0 and the body is returned as 200, some related detection scripts will be started.

中文: 缺少了一个vulnerabilities.txt
en-US: 缺少了一个vulnerabilities.txt

中文: 检测事务集合参数OSVDB_MSG（Pvi Checks）
en-US: Passive Vulnerabilty Check with OSVDB

中文: 如果事务集合参数OSVDB_MSG匹配规则，则表示检测到漏洞，记录日志信息（Pvi Checks）
en-US: If the transaction collection parameter OSVDB_MSG matches the rule, it means that the vulnerability would be detected, and the log information would be recorded (Pvi Checks)

中文: 当检测到OSVDB_MSG不为空。
en-US: Check whether the OSVDB_MSG collection parameter is empty

中文: 检测输出数据的异常分数及异常分数阻断标志参数(Outbound Blocking)
en-US: Outbound Anomaly Score Exceeded Detected-1

中文: 如果输出数据的异常分数大于或等于设定的异常分数水平并且开启了异常分数阻断标志，则拒绝访问，并记录日志(Outbound Blocking)
en-US: If the anomaly score of the output data is greater than or equal to the set anomaly score level, and the anomaly score blocking flag is enabled, the access would be denied and the log would be blocked (Outbound block it)

中文: 攻击者通过足够多的服务器反馈的信息能获得服务器的一些敏感信息
en-US: An attacker can obtain some sensitive information of the server through enough information fed back by the server

中文: 建议在web服务器限制异常信息反馈的次数
en-US: It is recommended to limit the number of web server feedback of anomalies

中文: 检测关联成功的攻击(Correlation)
en-US: Correlated Successful Attack Identified

中文: 如果事务集合中以LEAKAGE及ERRORS开头的参数值大于或等于1，则跳过Correlated Attack 规则检测(Correlation)
en-US: If the value of parameters which begin with LEAKAGE and ERRORS in the transaction collection is greater than or equal to 1, skip the Correlated Attack rule detection (Correlation)

中文: 信息泄露会暴露了服务器的敏感信息，使攻击者能够通过泄露的信息进行进一步入侵。
en-US: Information Disclosure exposes server-sensitive information so that attackers can exploit the compromised information for further intrusion.

中文: 做好对服务器的信息的加密、保护。
en-US: Do a good job on the server's information encryption, protection.

中文: 检测关联尝试的攻击(Correlation)
en-US: Correlated Successful Attack Identified

中文: 如果事务集合中以AVAILABILITY及APP_NOT_AVAIL开头的参数值大于或等于1，则跳过Correlated Attack 规则检测(Correlation)
en-US: If the value of parameters begin with AVAILABILITY and APP_NOT_AVAIL in the transaction collection is greater than or equal to 1, skip the Correlated Attack rule detection (Correlation)

中文: 信息泄露会暴露了服务器的敏感信息，使攻击者能够通过泄露的信息进行进一步入侵。
en-US: Information Disclosure exposes server-sensitive information so that attackers can exploit the compromised information for further intrusion.

中文: 做好对服务器的信息的加密、保护。
en-US: Do a good job on the server's information encryption, protection.

中文: 检测入站数据的异常总分数1(Correlation)
en-US: Inbound Anomaly Score Detected-1

中文: 如果入站数据异常总分数大于0且少于设置的异常分数水平，则跳过Correlated Attack 规则检测(Correlation)
en-US: If the anomaly total score of the inbound data is greater than 0 and less than the set anomaly score level, skip the Correlated Attack rule detection (Correlation)

中文: 攻击者频繁的对服务器进行违规的操作，不加以措施应对，将会引起更为严重的后果。
en-US: Attacker frequent violations of the server operation, without measures to deal with, will lead to more serious consequences.

中文: 建议web服务器设置实时黑名单机制，过滤高频违规操作的请求id。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server set up a real-time blacklist mechanism and filter the request id of the high-frequency violation operation.

中文: 检测入站数据的异常总分数2(Correlation)
en-US: Inbound Anomaly Score Detected-2

中文: 如果入站数据异常总分数大于或等于设置的异常分数水平，则跳过Correlated Attack 规则检测(Correlation)
en-US: If the anomaly total score of the inbound data is greater than or equal to the set anomaly score level, skip the Correlated Attack rule detection (Correlation)

中文: 攻击者频繁的对服务器进行违规的操作，不加以措施应对，将会引起更为严重的后果。
en-US: Attacker frequent violations of the server operation, without measures to deal with, will lead to more serious consequences.

中文: 建议web服务器设置实时黑名单机制，过滤高频违规操作的请求id。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server set up a real-time blacklist mechanism and filter the request id of the high-frequency violation operation.

中文: 检测出站数据的异常总分数(Correlation)
en-US: Outbound Anomaly Score Exceeded Detected-2

中文: 如果出站数据异常总分数大于或等于设置的异常分数水平，则跳过Correlated Attack 规则检测(Correlation)
en-US: If the anomaly total score of the outbound data is greater than or equal to the set anomaly score level, skip the Correlated Attack rule detection (Correlation)

中文: 攻击者让服务器频繁的发送出去敏感的信息，是非常危险的。
en-US: It is very dangerous for an attacker to have the server send out sensitive information frequently.

中文: 做好对服务器的信息的加密、保护。
en-US: Do a good job on the server's information encryption, protection.

中文: 检测GLOBAL集合的参数MISSING_CHARSET是否为0 （Response Profiling）
en-US: MISSING_CHARSET_CHECK

中文: 如果GLOBAL集合的参数MISSING_CHARSET为0 ，则设置参数global.missing_charset=0（Response Profiling）
en-US: If the parameter MISSING_CHARSET of the GLOBAL collection is 0, the parameter global.missing_charset=0 would be set (Response Profiling)

中文: 攻击者会利用缺少Content-Type或者使HTML没有元标签的请求访问服务器。
en-US: An attacker can access the server with a request that lacks Content-Type or HTML does not have a meta-tag.

中文: 建议web服务器对确实或没有明确指明字符编码的请求过滤。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter requests that do or do not explicitly specify a character encoding.

中文: 检测正常返回的xml类型响应数据是否缺少字符集（Application Defects）
en-US: Response data check

中文: MISSING_CHARSET少于等于10，说明正常返回的xml类型响应数据缺少字符（Application Defects）
en-US: MISSING_CHARSET less than or equal to 10 means that the normal returned xml type response data lacks characters (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会利用缺少Content-Type或者使HTML没有元标签的请求访问服务器。
en-US: An attacker can access the server with a request that lacks Content-Type or HTML does not have a meta-tag.

中文: 建议web服务器对确实或没有明确指明字符编码的请求过滤。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter requests that do or do not explicitly specify a character encoding.

中文: 检测GLOBAL集合的参数CHARSET_NOT_UTF8是否为0（Application Defects）
en-US: CHARSET_NOT_UTF8 check

中文: 如果GLOBAL集合的参数CHARSET_NOT_UTF8为0 ，则设置参数global.charset_not_utf8=0（Application Defects）
en-US: If the parameter CHARSET_NOT_UTF8 of GLOBAL collection is 0, set the parameter global.charset_not_utf8=0 (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会利用Content-Type或者使HTML元标签的不指明使用了UTF-8编码的请求访问服务器。
en-US: An attacker could exploit Content-Type or have the HTML meta-tag access the server without specifying UTF-8 encoded requests.

中文: 建议web服务器对确实或没有明确指明字符编码的请求过滤。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter requests that do or do not explicitly specify a character encoding.

中文: 检测正常返回的Html/xml类型响应数据是否明确设置UTF-8（Application Defects）
en-US: Response data check

中文: CHARSET_NOT_UTF8少于等于10，说明正常返回的Html/xml类型响应数据没有明确设置UTF-8（Application Defects）
en-US: CHARSET_NOT_UTF8 less than or equal to 10 means that the normal returned Html/xml type response data does not set UTF-8 explicitly (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会利用Content-Type或者HTML元标签的不指明使用了UTF-8编码的请求访问服务器。
en-US: An attacker could use the Content-Type or HTML meta-tags to access the server without specifying UTF-8 encoded requests.

中文: 建议web服务器对确实或没有明确指明字符编码的请求过滤。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter requests that do or do not explicitly specify a character encoding.

中文: 检测GLOBAL集合的参数CHARSET_MISMATCH是否为0 （Application Defects）
en-US: CHARSET_MISMATCH check

中文: 如果GLOBAL集合的参数CHARSET_MISMATCH为0 ，则设置参数global.charset_mismatch=0（Application Defects）
en-US: If the parameter CHARSET_MISMATCH of GLOBAL collection is 0, set the parameter global.charset_mismatch=0 (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会使Content-Type和HTML元标签的指明编码不一样的请求访问服务器。
en-US: An attacker could make the Content-Type and HTML meta tags indicate that the server code was not the same.

中文: 建议web服务器对Content-Type和HTML元标签的指明编码不一样的请求过滤。
en-US: Proposed web server Content-Type and HTML meta tags indicate the encoding of different requests filtering.

中文: 检测正常返回的Html/xml类型响应数据的头部字符集和Html/xml响应体字符集是否一致（Application Defects）
en-US: Character Set consistency check

中文: CHARSET_MISMATCH少于等于10，说明正常返回的Html/xml类型响应数据的头部字符集和Html/xml响应体字符集不一致（Application Defects）
en-US: CHARSET_MISMATCH less than or equal to 10 means that the header character set of the normal returned Html/xml type response data is different from the Html/xml response body character set (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会使Content-Type和HTML元标签的指明编码不一样的请求访问服务器。
en-US: An attacker could make the Content-Type and HTML meta tags indicate that the server code was not the same.

中文: 建议web服务器对Content-Type和HTML元标签的指明编码不一样的请求过滤。
en-US: Proposed web server Content-Type and HTML meta tags indicate the encoding of different requests filtering.

中文: multipart/form-data内容逃避
en-US: Invalid URI Detected

中文: 该规则检测在请求中利用Content-Disposition:头来偷传multipart/form-data的情况，比如：Content-Disposition: form-data; name="fileRap"; filename="file=.txt"
en-US: This rule detects the situation of using Content-Disposition: header to secretly upload multipart/form-data in a request. eg:Content-Disposition: form-data; name="fileRap"; filename="file=.txt"

中文: 攻击者可以使用multipart/form-data 格式发送payload。对于应用来说，和使用 application/x-www-form-urlencoded 获取到的数据是一致的
en-US: An attacker could send the payload using the multipart / form-data format. For applications, it is consistent with the data obtained using application / x-www-form-urlencoded
Filtering Request-Content-Disposition: The first to steal multipart / form-data data

中文: 探测SQL注释符号
en-US: SQL comment symbol detected

中文: 探测常见的SQL脚本中的注释字符，如-- /**/等
en-US: Detect comment characters in common SQL scripts, such as -- /**/ and so on

中文: 在cookies和请求参数和xml中利用 exec xp_cmdshell|\ ?! \|from%$information_schema#|union select@等字符，这些字符是SQL的注释符号，攻击者可以注释掉一些sql语句，然后让其只执行攻击语句而达到入侵目的。一旦入侵成功，攻击者可获取数据库的管理用户权限，然后将数据库管理用户权限提升至操作系统管理用户权限，控制服务器操作系统，获取重要信息及机密文件。
en-US: Using the characters exec xp_cmdshell | \?! \ | From% $ information_schema # | union select @ in cookies and request parameters and xml, these characters are SQL comment symbols and attackers can comment out some of the sql statements and then let them only Execute the attack statement to achieve the purpose of invasion. Once the intrusion is successful, an attacker can gain administrative user rights to the database, then elevate database administrative user rights to operating system administrative user rights, control the server operating system, obtain important information and confidential documents.

中文: 建议在web服务器添加对含有exec xp_cmdshell|\ ?! \|from%$information_schema#|union select@等字符的数据进行过滤
en-US: It is recommended to add data on the web server that contains characters such as exec xp_cmdshell | \?! \ From% $ information_schema # union select @

中文: 检测全局集合中的MISSING_HTTPONLY参数值是否为0（Application Defects）
en-US: MISSING_HTTPONLY value check

中文: 如果MISSING_HTTPONLY参数值为0，则设置参数global.missing_httponly=0（Application Defects）
en-US: If the value of parameter MISSING_HTTPONLY is 0, set the parameter global.missing_httponly=0 (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会使用缺少http cookie是唯一的标志的请求访问服务器。
en-US: An attacker would use a request that lacks the http cookie that is the only flag to access the server.

中文: 建议web服务器把http cookie不是唯一的标志的请求过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter the request that the http cookie is not the only one.

中文: 检测全局集合中的MISSING_SECURE参数值是否为0（Application Defects）
en-US: MISSING_SECURE value check

中文: 如果MISSING_SECURE参数值为0，则设置参数global.missing_secure=0（Application Defects）
en-US: If the value of parameter MISSING_SECURE is 0, set the parameter global.missing_secure=0 (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会使用缺少http cookie是安全的的标志的请求访问服务器。
en-US: An attacker would use a request that lacks the sign that http http is safe to access the server.

中文: 建议web服务器把没有http cookie安全的的标志的请求过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter out requests that do not have http cookie-safe flags.

中文: 检测全局集合中的LOOSE_DOMAIN_SCOPE参数值是否为0（Application Defects）
en-US: LOOSE_DOMAIN_SCOPE value check

中文: 如果LOOSE_DOMAIN_SCOPE参数值为0，则设置参数global.loose_domain_scope=0（Application Defects）
en-US: If the value of parameter LOOSE_DOMAIN_SCOPE is 0, set the parameter global.loose_domain_scope=0 (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会使用域名和cookie的标志不同的请求访问服务器。
en-US: Attackers use the domain name and cookie flags to request different access to the server.

中文: 建议web服务器把使用域名和cookie标志不同的请求过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter requests that use different domain names and cookie flags.

中文: 检测cookies内容（Application Defects）
en-US: Cookies content Detected

中文: 检测cookies内容（Application Defects）
en-US: Detect content of cookies (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会使用域名和cookie的标志不同的请求访问服务器。
en-US: Attackers use the domain name and cookie flags to request different access to the server.

中文: 建议web服务器把使用域名和cookie标志不同的请求过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter requests that use different domain names and cookie flags.

中文: 检测全局集合中的CHECK_CACHE_CONTROL参数值是否为0（Application Defects）
en-US: CHECK_CACHE_CONTROL value check

中文: 如果CHECK_CACHE_CONTROL参数值为0，则设置参数global.check_cache_control=0（Application Defects）
en-US: If the value of the parameter CHECK_CACHE_CONTROL is 0, set the parameter global.check_cache_control=0 (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会利用使响应头缺失 Cache-Control头的请求访问服务器。
en-US: An attacker accesses the server with a request that causes the response header to miss the Cache-Control header.

中文: 建议web服务器把响应头缺失 Cache-Control头的应答过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter the response to the header missing Cache-Control header.

中文: 使用SQL注释符号，char函数，或其他条件语句等的注入
en-US: SQL injection detected

中文: 探测利用SQL注释符号-- /* #等，或者利用char(数字)函数等伪装的注入，并且检测其他between and ,like，|| &&等组成的条件语句
en-US: Detect injections that disguised by using SQL comment symbol(-- /* #, etc) and char(digital) function. And detect the other conditional statements consisted of between, and, like, ||, && and etc.

中文: 在cookies和请求参数和xml中利用)  when  1244  then|\  #|char   (  234等字符，攻击者可尝试使用注释条件语句或者char函数进行注入。一旦成功绕过防火墙，攻击者可获取数据库的管理用户权限，然后将数据库管理用户权限提升至操作系统管理用户权限，控制服务器操作系统，获取重要信息及机密文件。
en-US: When used in cookies and request parameters and in xml )  when  1244  then|\  #|char (  234 An attacker could try injecting using a conditional statement or a char function. Once the firewall has been successfully bypassed, the attacker can get the database management User rights, then elevate database administration user rights to operating system administration user rights, control the server operating system, obtain important information, and confidential documents.

中文: 建议在web服务器添加对含有)  when  1244  then|\  #|char   (  234等字符的数据进行过滤
en-US: It is recommended to add to the web server to filter the data containing )  when  1244  then|\  #|char   (  234

中文: sql语句条件注入检测
en-US: SQL injection detected

中文: 检测sql语句查询条件语句拼装注入，如like,having等
en-US: Detect the assembly injection of sql statement query conditional statement, such as like, having etc

中文: 在cookies和请求参数和xml中利用(case (|)like (|if (3 =等字符时候，攻击者可尝试数据库的条件语句注入。一旦注入成功，攻击者可获取数据库的管理用户权限，然后将数据库管理用户权限提升至操作系统管理用户权限，控制服务器操作系统，获取重要信息及机密文件。
en-US: An attacker could exploit the case (|) like (| if (3 =) character to try a database conditional statement injection in cookies and request parameters and xml. Once the injection is successful, an attacker can obtain the database administrative user rights, and then the database Manage user privileges Upgrade to operating system administrative user rights, control server operating system, obtain important information and confidential files.

中文: 建议在web服务器添加对含有[$between]|[$size]|[$exists]等字符的数据进行过滤
en-US: It is recommended that you add a filter on the web server to data containing characters such as [$ between] | [$ size] | [$ exists]

中文: 经典sql注入探测之一
en-US: SQL injection detected

中文: 攻击者在找到注入点后往往会尝试从information_schema.table_name来获取数据库的元数据信息
en-US: Attackers will often try to obtain the metadata information of the database from information_schema.table_name after they finding the injection point

中文: 在cookies和请求参数和xml中利用\ xor \2|\\x23|dinformation_schema等字符，攻击者可实行SQL注入点的探测，一旦漏洞被发现，就可实现SQL注入的攻击，攻击者可获取数据库的管理用户权限，然后将数据库管理用户权限提升至操作系统管理用户权限，控制服务器操作系统，获取重要信息及机密文件。
en-US: An attacker could exploit the \ xor \2|\\x23|dinformation_schema character to try a database conditional statement injection in cookies and request parameters and xml. Once the injection is successful, an attacker can obtain the database administrative user rights, and then the database Manage user privileges Upgrade to operating system administrative user rights, control server operating system, obtain important information and confidential files.

中文: 建议在web服务器添加对包含and...、or...、between...、div...、like...、not...、information_schema、table_name内容的数据进行过滤
en-US: It is recommended that you add a filter on the web server to data containing characters such as and...、or...、between...、div...、like...、not...、information_schema、table_name

中文: 经典sql注入探测之二
en-US: Classic sql injection Detected-2

中文: 探测一些攻击者在攻击开始阶段尝试对数据库执行多种不同的查询操作，每次传送不同的查询条件，根据反馈结果来猜测数据库注入点和数据库结构的操作
en-US: Detect that some attackers may try to perform multiple different query operations for the database at the beginning of the attack, each time transmits the different query conditions, guessing the injection point of database and operation of the database structure according to the feedback results

中文: 在cookies和请求参数和xml中利用\ \ like \ |<-^\^|\^\等字符，攻击者可实行SQL注入点的探测，一旦漏洞被发现，就可实现SQL注入的攻击，攻击者可获取数据库的管理用户权限，然后将数据库管理用户权限提升至操作系统管理用户权限，控制服务器操作系统，获取重要信息及机密文件。
en-US: An attacker could exploit the \ \ like \ |<-^\^|\^\ character to try a database conditional statement injection in cookies and request parameters and xml. Once the injection is successful, an attacker can obtain the database administrative user rights, and then the database Manage user privileges Upgrade to operating system administrative user rights, control server operating system, obtain important information and confidential files.

中文: 建议在web服务器添加对含有<=and...、<=or...、<=between...、<=div...、<=like...、<=not...内容的数据进行过滤
en-US: It is recommended that you add a filter on the web server to data containing characters such as <=and...、<=or...、<=between...、<=div...、<=like...、<=not…

中文: SQL基础认证BYPASS之一
en-US: SQL Basic Certification BYPASS-1

中文: 探测企图绕过SQL基础认证的尝试
en-US: Detect the attempts to try to bypass SQL basic authentication

中文: 在cookies和请求参数和xml中利用^admin \|" between = "|where - = 等字符，攻击者可实行SQL认证绕过尝试，攻击者可获取数据库的管理用户权限，然后将数据库管理用户权限提升至操作系统管理用户权限，控制服务器操作系统，获取重要信息及机密文件。
en-US: An attacker could exploit the ^admin \|" between = "|where - = character to try a database conditional statement injection in cookies and request parameters and xml. Once the injection is successful, an attacker can obtain the database administrative user rights, and then the database Manage user privileges Upgrade to operating system administrative user rights, control server operating system, obtain important information and confidential files.

中文: SQL常用注入测试
en-US: Common SQL injection Detected

中文: 识别常见的初始SQL注入探测请求，攻击者尝试在正常的输入位置插入/追加引号字符等，看看web应用程序/数据库如何响应。
en-US: Recognizing common initial SQL injection probe requests, an attacker tries to insert/append a quotation character at the normal input location, and then see how the web application/database responds.

中文: 在cookies和请求参数和xml中利用以\'`;等字符开头或以\";'等字符结尾，攻击者可尝试用简单、常用的注入方法测试服务器，从而进一步的实行攻击，此时防火墙除了把请求拦截意外，还会设置异常分值，准备好应对攻击者可进一步的攻击。"
en-US: In cookies and request parameters and in xml, an attacker can try out the server with a simple, common injection method for exploiting characters such as \ '`; or ending with characters like'; 'to attack further, in which case the firewall Intercept unexpected requests, but also set abnormal scores, ready to deal with further attacks on the attacker

中文: 建议在web服务器添加对以\'`;等字符开头或以\";'等字符结尾的数据进行过滤"
en-US: It is recommended to add to the web server to \ '`; characters such as the beginning or \;' and other characters at the end of the filter data

中文: SQL常见操作符检测
en-US: Common SQL operator detected

中文: 通过检测SQL语句中的常见操作符来判断SQL注入攻击，如常见的：xor|rlike|regexp|isnullnot|between|and|like|in等
en-US: To judge SQL injection attack by detecting the common operators in SQL statements, such as xor|rlike|regexp|isnullnot|between|and|like|in etc

中文: 在cookies和请求参数和xml中利用！=|&&|>>|<<|<=|rlike|isnull等字符，攻击者可尝试用SQL的操作符进行攻击试探，从而进一步的实行攻击。
en-US: Use in cookies and request parameters and xml! = | && | >> | << | <= | rlike | isnull and other characters, an attacker can try to use the SQL operator attacks to further attack.

中文: 建议在web服务器添加对含有=|&&|>>|<<|<=|rlike|isnull等字符的数据进行过滤
en-US: Proposed in the web server add contains = | && | >> | <<< | <= | rlike | isnull and other characters to filter the data

中文: 数据库名字探测
en-US: Database name detected

中文: 检测输入中是否出现一些数据库系统中常见的数据库名，如：master、sysobjects等
en-US: Detect if there are some common database name of the database system in the input, such as master, sysobject, etc

中文: 在cookies和请求参数和xml中利用 msysaccessobjects|mysrelationships|sys darabase_name|sysaux等字符，攻击者可尝试查找数据库的名字。一旦成功便可以对数据库实行进一步的攻击，攻击者可获取数据库的管理用户权限，然后将数据库管理用户权限提升至操作系统管理用户权限，控制服务器操作系统，获取重要信息及机密文件。
en-US: Using the characters msysaccessobjects | mysrelationships | sys darabase_name | sysaux in cookies and request parameters and xml, an attacker could try to find the name of the database. Once successful, the database can be further exploited, allowing attackers to gain administrative user privileges on the database, elevating database administrative user privileges to operating system administrative user rights, controlling the server operating system, obtaining critical information and confidential documents.

中文: 建议在web服务器添加对含有msysaccessobjects|mysrelationships|sys darabase_name|sysaux等字符的数据进行过滤
en-US: It is recommended that you add a filter on the web server to data containing characters such as msysaccessobjects|mysrelationships|sys darabase_name|sysaux

中文: 检测全局集合参数CONTENT_TYPE_HEADER_EXISTS的值（Application Defects）
en-US: CONTENT_TYPE_HEADER_EXISTS value check

中文: 如果全局集合参数CONTENT_TYPE_HEADER_EXISTS的值为0 ，则设置参数global.content_type_header_exists=0（Application Defects）
en-US: If the value of the global collection parameter CONTENT_TYPE_HEADER_EXISTS is 0, setting the parameter global.content_type_header_exists=0 (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会利用使响应头缺失 content-type头的请求访问服务器。
en-US: An attacker accesses the server with a request that leaves the response header missing the content-type header.

中文: 建议web服务器把响应头缺失content-type头的应答过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter the response of the response header to the missing content-type header.

中文: 检测http响应头是否含有Content-Type字段内容（Application Defects）
en-US: http response header check

中文: CONTENT_TYPE_HEADER_EXISTS参数值少于或等于10，说明http响应头没有Content-Type字段或者该字段内容为空（Application Defects）
en-US: The parameter value of CONTENT_TYPE_HEADER_EXISTS being less than or equal to 10 means that the http response header does not have a Content-Type field or the field content is empty (Application Defects)

中文: 浏览器是根据Content-Type字段的内容来判断怎么处理响应信息，如果Content-Type字段内容为空，浏览器会强迫性的嗅探信息内容进行决断。强迫浏览器进入这种状态是不可取的,因为它会导致可利用的条件。
en-US: The browser determines how to process the response message according to the content of the Content-Type field. If the content field of the Content-Type field is empty, the browser forcibly determines the content of the message to be sniffed. Forcing browsers to enter this state is not advisable because it leads to conditions that are available.

中文: 建议web服务器在响应信息中添加Content-Type字段内容
en-US: It is recommended that the web server add the Content-Type field content to the response message

中文: 检测全局集合参数X_XSS_PROTECTION_DISABLED的值（Application Defects）
en-US: X_XSS_PROTECTION_DISABLED value check

中文: 如果全局集合参数CONTENT_TYPE_HEADER_EXISTS的值为0 ，则设置参数global.x_xss_protection_disabled=0（Application Defects）
en-US: If the value of the global collection parameter CONTENT_TYPE_HEADER_EXISTS is 0, set the parameter global.x_xss_protection_disabled=0 (Application Defects)

中文: IE8浏览器中XSS防护过滤器没使能是很危险的。
en-US: It is dangerous to disable XSS protection filters in IE8 browsers.

中文: 建议web服务器把IE8浏览器中XSS防护过滤器没使能的请求过滤了。
en-US: Proposed web server IE8 browser XSS filter protection filter is not enabled to filter the request.

中文: 检测IE浏览器的XSS防护过滤功能是否启用（Application Defects）
en-US: XSS protection filter is enabled

中文: X_XSS_PROTECTION_DISABLED参数值少于或等于10，说明IE浏览器的XSS防护过滤功能没有启用（Application Defects）
en-US: The parameter value of X_XSS_PROTECTION_DISABLED being less than or equal to 10 means that the XSS protection filtering function of IE browser is not enabled (Application Defects)

中文: IE8浏览器中XSS防护过滤器没使能是很危险的。
en-US: It is dangerous to disable XSS protection filters in IE8 browsers.

中文: 建议web服务器把IE8浏览器中XSS防护过滤器没使能的请求过滤了。
en-US: Proposed web server IE8 browser XSS filter protection filter is not enabled to filter the request.

中文: 检测全局集合参数X_FRAME_OPTIONS的值（Application Defects）
en-US: X_FRAME_OPTIONS value check

中文: 如果全局集合参数X_FRAME_OPTIONS的值为0 ，则设置参数global.x_frame_options=0（Application Defects）
en-US: If the value of the global collection parameter X_FRAME_OPTIONS is 0, set the parameter global.x_frame_options=0 (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会利用使响应头缺失 FRAME-OPTIONS头或者被设置成deny的请求访问服务器。
en-US: Attackers access the server by making the response header missing the FRAME-OPTIONS header or the request set to deny.

中文: 建议web服务器响应头缺失 FRAME-OPTIONS头或者被设置成deny的响应体过滤了。
en-US: Proposed web server response header missing FRAME-OPTIONS header or set to deny response body filtered.

中文: 检测http响应头是否含有X-FRAME-OPTIONS字段内容（Application Defects）
en-US: http response header check

中文: X_FRAME_OPTIONS参数值少于或等于10，说明http响应头没有X-FRAME-OPTIONS字段或者该字段内容为空（Application Defects）
en-US: The parameter value of X_FRAME_OPTIONS being less than or equal to 10 means that the http response header does not have a X-FRAME-OPTIONS field or the field content is empty (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会利用使响应头缺失 FRAME-OPTIONS头或者被设置成deny的请求访问服务器。
en-US: Attackers access the server by making the response header missing the FRAME-OPTIONS header or the request set to deny.

中文: 建议web服务器响应头缺失 FRAME-OPTIONS头或者被设置成deny的响应体过滤了。
en-US: Proposed web server response header missing FRAME-OPTIONS header or set to deny response body filtered.

中文: 检测全局集合参数X_CONTENT_TYPE_OPTIONS的值（Application Defects）
en-US: X_CONTENT_TYPE_OPTIONS value check

中文: 如果全局集合参数X_CONTENT_TYPE_OPTIONS的值为0 ，则设置参数global.x_content_type_options=0（Application Defects）
en-US: If the value of the global collection parameter X_CONTENT_TYPE_OPTIONS is 0, set the parameter global.x_content_type_options=0 (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会利用使响应头缺失 content-type头或者X-Content-Type-Options同样缺失或被设置成'nosniff'的请求访问服务器。
en-US: Attackers access the server with requests that also make the response headers missing the content-type header or the X-Content-Type-Options that are also missing or set to 'nosniff'.

中文: 建议web服务器缺失 content-type头或者X-Content-Type-Options同样缺失或被设置成'nosniff'的响应体过滤了。
en-US: Proposed web server missing content-type header or X-Content-Type-Options also missing or set to 'nosniff' response body filter.

中文: 检测http响应头的Content-Type字段内容及X_CONTENT_TYPE_OPTIONS是否缺少（Application Defects）
en-US: http response header check

中文: 如果匹配规则，则说明响应头部缺少Content-Type字段并且缺少X-Content-Type-Options字段或该字段没有设置成nosniff（Application Defects）
en-US: If the rule is matched, it means that the response header does not have a Content-Type field and lacks of the X-Content-Type-Options field or the field is not set to nosniff (Application Defects)

中文: 攻击者会利用使响应头缺失 content-type头或者X-Content-Type-Options同样缺失或被设置成'nosniff'的请求访问服务器。
en-US: Attackers access the server with requests that also make the response headers missing the content-type header or the X-Content-Type-Options that are also missing or set to 'nosniff'.

中文: 建议web服务器缺失 content-type头或者X-Content-Type-Options同样缺失或被设置成'nosniff'的响应体过滤了。
en-US: Proposed web server missing content-type header or X-Content-Type-Options also missing or set to 'nosniff' response body filter.

中文: 检测请求头中的User-Agent字段内容1(Bat Robots)
en-US: User-Agent field content check-1

中文: 检测请求头中的User-Agent字段内容是否与modsecurity_35_scanners.data列表的短语匹配,如果匹配，则阻断访问，并设置相关参数值(Bat Robots)
en-US: Detect whether the User-Agent field content of the request header is matched with the phrase of modsecurity_35_scanners.data list. If they match, block the access and set the related parameter values (Bat Robots)

中文: 如果攻击者利用安全漏洞扫描工具浏览网页，请求的user agent中会包含了某些如arachni、absinthe、nikto等字段，当给工具找到了网页上面的漏洞，会进一步的实施攻击。
en-US: If an attacker browses a web page using a vulnerability scanning tool, the requested user agent may include fields such as arachni, absinthe, nikto. When the tool finds a web page above the vulnerability, further attacks will be performed.

中文: 建议在web服务器对请求头中的User-Agent字段进行检测，是否包含了某些如arachni、absinthe、nikto等字段，是则进行阻拦
en-US: Proposed in the web server request header User-Agent field detection, whether it contains some such as arachni, absinthe, nikto other fields, it is blocked

中文: 检测请求头中的User-Agent字段内容2(Bat Robots)
en-US: User-Agent field content check-2

中文: 检测请求头中的User-Agent字段内容是否与modsecurity_35_bad_robots.data列表的短语匹配,如果匹配，则阻断访问，并设置相关参数值(Bat Robots)
en-US: Detect whether the User-Agent field content of the request header is matched with the phrase of modsecurity_35_bad_robots.data list. If they match, block the access and set the related parameter values (Bat Robots)

中文: 如果请求是网络蠕虫，请求的user agent 中会包含了某些如missigua、floodgate、webaltbot等字段，并且有contentsmartz|errypicker|emailextract|harvest等字段，，它会扫描和攻击网络上存在系统漏洞。
en-US: If the request is a web worm, the requesting user agent will include fields such as missigua, floodgate, webaltbot, and fields like contentsmartz | errypicker | emailextract | harvest, which scans and attacks for vulnerabilities on the network.

中文: 建议在web服务器对请求头中的User-Agent字段进行检测，识别是否bad_robot，如已知的有wisenutbot、prowebwalker等，可在网上查找
en-US: It is suggested that the web server detect the User-Agent field in the request header to identify whether it is a bad_robot, such as wisenutbot or prowebwalker, which can be searched online

中文: 检测请求头名称(Bat Robots)
en-US: Request header check

中文: 如果匹配，则阻断访问，并设置相关参数值(Bat Robots)
en-US: If they match, block the access and set the related parameter values (Bat Robots)

中文: 攻击者利用安全漏洞扫描工具浏览网页，会在请求头中包含了acunetix-product，该工具会找到网页上面的漏洞，进而进一步的攻击。
en-US: An attacker who exploits the vulnerability scanning tool to browse the web will include acunetix-product in the header of the request, which will find the vulnerability above the web page for further attacks.

中文: 建议web服务器拒绝请求头中包含了acunetix-product的请求访问
en-US: It is recommended that the web server refuse the request header that contains acunetix-product's request access

中文: 检测请求文件名(Bat Robots)
en-US: Request file name check

中文: 如果请求文件名是nessustest或appscan_fingerprint，则阻断访问，并设置相关参数值(Bat Robots)
en-US: If the requested file name is nessustest or appscan_fingerprint, block the access and set the related parameter values (Bat Robots)

中文: 攻击者利用安全漏洞扫描工具浏览网页，请求uri中文件名字会是nessustest 或者appscan_fingerprint，该工具会找到网页上面的漏洞，进而进一步的攻击。
en-US: The attacker uses the vulnerability scanning tool to browse the webpage. The name of the file in the request uri will be nessustest or appscan_fingerprint. The tool will find the webpage above the vulnerability and further attack.

中文: 建议web服务器拒绝请求uri中文件名字会是nessustes的请求访问
en-US: Proposed web server refused to request uri file name will be nessustes request access

中文: 检测XSS是否攻击已知的XSS弱点参数(Scanner Integration)
en-US: XSS Attack Against Known Vulnerable Parameter.

中文: 如果匹配规则，说明XSS攻击已知的弱点参数(Scanner Integration)
en-US: If the rule is matched, it means that XSS attacks the known weakness parameters (Scanner Integration)

中文: 攻击者如果对已知的弱点参数实行了攻击，此规则会记录下来。
en-US: An attacker who attacks an attacker with a known weakness parameter records this rule.

中文: 检测SQL是否攻击已知的SQL弱点参数(Scanner Integration)
en-US: SQLi Attack Against Known Vulnerable Parameter.

中文: 如果匹配规则，说明SQL攻击已知的弱点参数(Scanner Integration)
en-US: If the rule is matched, it means that SQL attacks the known weakness parameters (Scanner Integration)

中文: 在请求中利用select show top distinct from dual where group by order having limit offset union rownum as (case等敏感字符攻击者可进行SQL注入攻击。一旦注入成功，攻击者可获取数据库的管理用户权限，然后将数据库管理用户权限提升至操作系统管理用户权限，控制服务器操作系统，获取重要信息及机密文件。
en-US: An attacker who attacks an attacker with a known weakness parameter records this rule.

中文: 建议在web服务器添加对含有select show top distinct from dual where group by order having limit offset union rownum as (case等敏感字符的数据进行过滤
en-US: 建议在web服务器添加对含有select show top distinct from dual where group by order having limit offset union rownum as (case等敏感字符的数据进行过滤

中文: 检测请求文件类型是否是html（Ignore Static）
en-US: FILEtype_CHECK

中文: 如果匹配规则，则说明是html文件（Ignore Static）
en-US: If the rule is matched, it means that is an html file (Ignore Static)

中文: 攻击者会利用媒体文件以外的一切文件上传到服务器，实施攻击。
en-US: Attackers will use the media files to upload all the files to the server, the implementation of the attack.

中文: 检测请求文件类型是否是Media（Ignore Static）
en-US: FILEtype_CHECK

中文: 如果匹配规则，则说明是Media文件（Ignore Static）
en-US: If the rule is matched, it means that is a Media file (Ignore Static)

中文: 攻击者会利用媒体文件以外的一切文件上传到服务器，实施攻击。
en-US: Attackers will use the media files to upload all the files to the server, the implementation of the attack.

中文: 检测是否要跳过关于没有参数的文本内容请求数据的检查（Skip Outbound Checks）
en-US: Skip Outbound Checks

中文: 如果匹配规则，则跳过关于没有参数的文本内容请求数据的检查（Skip Outbound Checks）
en-US: If the rule is matched, skip the check about text content request data without parameters (Skip Outbound Checks)
If the rule is matched, the check of the text content request data with no parameters is skipped

中文: 检测请求参数或参数名是否有http（Comment Spam）
en-US: request_agrs detected

中文: 如果请求参数或参数名中有http，则跳过下一个规则（Comment Spam）
en-US: If there is a http in the request parameter or parameter name, skip the next rule (Comment Spam)

中文:
垃圾评论是一种攻击，对象是对博客、论坛、留言板等会接受并显示游客提供的超级链接的交互网页。
这些垃圾评论制造者会专门发送一些自动的、随意的评论，并会携带一个链接到攻击者的站点，然后这些链接就会被人工的提高了在网站的搜索引擎中的排名，从而在网站的搜索结果中更加明显
en-US:
Spam review is an attack on an interactive web page that blogs, forums, message boards, etc., accept and display hyperlinks provided by visitors.
The spam review builders send out some automatic, casual comments and will bring a link to the attacker's site, and those links will be manually raised in the site's search engine rankings, which in the site's More obvious in the search results

中文: 建议使用第三方反垃圾系统。垃圾评论 90% 以上都是由机器人产生的，因此使用验证码也可以过滤掉大部分的垃圾评论。
en-US: It is recommended to use third-party anti-spam system. More than 90% of spam comments are generated by robots, so using captchas can also filter out most of the spam comments.

中文: 初始化CommentSpam处理行为是“继续处理”（Comment Spam）
en-US: Common SPAM/Email Harvester crawler

中文: 初始化Comment Spam处理行为是“继续处理”，并跳过Comment Spam检测规则（Comment Spam）
en-US: The initialize Comment Spam processing behavior is "continue processing", and skip the Comment Spam detection rule (Comment Spam)
Initializing the Comment Spam processing behavior is "Resume Processing" and skipping the Comment Spam detection rules

中文: 检测Content-Type长度异常
en-US: Content-Type length check

中文: 攻击者可在上传文件时通过修改HTTP请求头中的Content-Type值来触发该漏洞，进而执行系统命令
en-US: The attacker can trigger the vulnerability by modifying the Content-Type value in the HTTP request header when uploading the file, and then execute the system command

中文: Apache Structs2的Jakarta Multipart parser插件存在远程代码执行漏洞，漏洞编号为CVE-2    017-5638。攻击者可以在使用该插件上传文件时，修改HTTP请求头中的Content-Type值来触发该漏洞，导致远程执行代码。
en-US: Jakarta Multipart parser plugin for Apache Structs2 has a remote code execution vulnerability, Vulnerability CVE-2017-5638. An attacker could use the plug-in to upload a file by modifying the Content-Type value in the HTTP request header to trigger the vulnerability, causing remote code execution.

中文: 修复Jakarta文件上传插件或者是存在漏洞的Struts 2版本请升级至St    ruts2安全版本
en-US: Repair Jakarta file upload plug-in or there is a flaw Struts 2 version Please upgrade to the Struts2 security version

中文: 检测PHPNuke general XSS 攻击
en-US: PHPNuke general XSS attempt Detected

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/modules.php且带有可XSS攻击的参数name则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /modules.php and the 'name' parameter being vulnerable to XSS attack are found in the request line, it means the rule is matched. Block the request and set parameter.

中文: PHP-Nuke 7.8中的modules.php存在多个SQL注入漏洞，当禁用了magic_quotes_gpc时，远程攻击者可以通过在POST请求中的(1)名字，(2) sid和(3)pid参数来执行任意SQL命令。这种请求绕过了为GET请求而执行的安全检查。
en-US: There are multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in modules.php in PHP-Nuke 7.8, and remote attackers can execute arbitrary (1) names, (2) sid and (3) pid parameters in POST requests when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled SQL command. This request bypasses the security checks that are performed for GET requests.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问modules.php且存在name参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: Proposed to visit the web server modules.php and there are keywords such as name parameters are requested to filter

中文: Generic phpbb 任意命令尝试
en-US: Generic phpbb arbitrary command attempt Detected

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有.php和phpbb_root_path  变量的中是否包含phpbb_root_path=(ftps?|https?|php):/。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request method is Get and if the .php is in the request line. Whether the phpbb_root_path variable contains phpbb_root_path=(ftps?|https?|php):/. If the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameter.

中文: lcxBBportal 0.1 Alpha 2版本中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助对(1) portal/includes/portal_block.php和(2) includes/acp/acp_lcxbbportal.php的phpbb_root_path参数中的一个URL，执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: Multiple PHP Remote File Inclusions vulnerability exists in lcxBBportal 0.1 Alpha 2 release. A remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code with a URL to the phpbb_root_path parameter to (1) portal / includes / portal_block.php and (2) includes / acp / acp_lcxbbportal.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似.php?phpbb_root_path=phpbb_root_path= ftp、http、php的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Proposed in the web server to contain similar. Php? Phpbb_root_path = phpbb_root_path = ftp, http, php uri request to filter

中文: PHP PHPNuke远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: PHP PHPNuke Remote File Inclusion Attempt Detected

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有          /DB_adodb.class.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数PHPOF_INCLUDE_PATH。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request method is Get and if the /DB_adodb.class.php is in the request line. Check if there is a parameter PHPOF_INCLUDE_PATH with remote file inclusion. If the rule is matched, block the request and set the related parameter.

中文: PHP-NUKE iFrame模块的iframe.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助文件参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability exists in iframe.php in PHP-NUKE iFrame module. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code with a URL in the file parameters.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/iframe.php且存在file参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: Proposed in the web server to visit /iframe.php file parameters and the existence of the request to be filtered

中文: GeekLog存在远程文件捆绑漏洞
en-US: GeekLog Remote File Include Vulnerability

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /acopia/manager/DiagLogListActionBody.do。  logFile的变量是否包含../。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request method is Get and if the /acopia/manager/DiagLogListActionBody.do is in the request line. Check if the variable of logFile contains ../. If the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameter.

中文: Geeklog 1.4.0到1.4.0sr1版以及1.3.11到1.3.11sr4版的lib-common.php中存在多个未明漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1)未明参数中的绝对路径和(2)language cookie包含任意本地文件并执行任意代码，如使用error.log执行代码所演示的那样。
en-US: There are several unidentified vulnerabilities in lib-common.php in Geeklog 1.4.0 to 1.4.0sr1 and 1.3.11 to 1.3.11sr4. Remote attackers can leverage (1) the absolute path in the unknown parameter and (2) the language cookie to include any local file and execute arbitrary code, as demonstrated by executing the code with error.log.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含.php和请求参数中带有一个URL的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter requests that include .php and a URL with the request parameters.

中文: 检测 tikiwiki featured link XSS攻击
en-US: tikiwiki featured link XSS attempt Detected

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/tiki-featured_link.php和/iframe>且带有参数type则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the tiki-featured_link.php, /iframe> and the 'type' parameter are found in the request line. It means that the rule is matched, block the request and set relevant parameter.

中文: Tikiwiki中tiki-featured_link.php存在跨站脚本攻击(XSS)漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过可逃避过滤的url参数来注入任意Web脚本或HTML，如使用一个含有有缺陷的内嵌SCRIPT元素的参数值。
en-US: There is a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in tiki-featured_link.php in Tikiwiki in which remote attackers can inject arbitrary Web scripts or HTML via URL-avoidable parameters such as using a parameter value that contains a flawed embedded SCRIPT element .

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问tiki-featured_link.php且存在type参数名与 /iframe标签有关等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: Proposed in the web server to visit tiki-featured_link.php and there is type parameter name and / iframe tags and other keywords are requested to filter

中文: PHP Gnopaster Common.php存在参数与远程文件捆绑
en-US: PHP Gnopaster Common.php remote file include Vulnerability

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /includes/common.php。 QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY的变量是否包含root_path=(ftps?|https?|php):/。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request method is Get and if the /includes/common.php is in the request line. Check if the variable of QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY contains root_path=(ftps?|https?|php):/. If the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameter.

中文:
NitroTech是一个完全定制的网页系统。 
        NitroTech 0.0.3a版本的includes/common.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助根参数中的一个URL，执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability exists in includes / common.php for NitroTech 0.0.3a version. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code with a URL in the root parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/includes/common.php，请求参数带有一个URL的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter requests that contain /includes/common.php, request parameters with a URL.

中文: Wordpress wp-login.php redirect_to 盗窃认证信息尝试
en-US: Wordpress wp-login.php redirect_to credentials stealing attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含  /wp-login.php和QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY中是否包含redirect_to=(ht|f)tps?:/。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request line contains /wp-login.php and if QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY contains redirect_to=(ht|f)tps?:/. If the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameter.

中文: WordPress中的wp-login.php文件允许远程攻击者借助redirect_to参数，重定向认证过的用户到其他网站和潜在的获得敏感信息。
en-US: The wp-login.php file in WordPress allows remote attackers to redirect authenticated users to other websites and potentially obtain sensitive information using the redirect_to parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似rss/show_webfeed.php?redirect_to=http/ftp的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Proposed in the web server to contain similar rss / show_webfeed.php? Redirect_to = http / ftp uri request to be filtered

中文: iPhotoAlbum header.php存在参数与远程文件捆绑
en-US: iPhotoAlbum header.php remote file include

en-US: Detect if the request line contains GET and /wp-login.php, and check if there is a parameter 'set_menu' with remote file inclusion. If the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameter.

en-US: iPhotoAlbum Multiple Remote File Inclusions Vulnerability - iPhotoAlbum is a web album system developed with PHP. Multiple PHP Remote File Inclusions in iPhotoAlbum 1.1. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via the set_menu argument to lib / static / header.php

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/header.php且存在set_menu参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: Proposed in the web server to visit /header.php and set_menu parameters of the request to be filtered

中文: PMECMS 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试 -- mod_image_index.php config pathMod
en-US: PMECMS Remote Inclusion Attempt -- mod_image_index.php config pathMod

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有           /mod/image/index.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数config[pathMod]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request method is GET and if the /mod/image/index.php is in the request line. Check if there is a parameter 'config[pathMod]' with remote file inclusion. If the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameter.

中文: PMECMS 中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到(1)mod/image/,(2)mod/liens/,(3)mod/liste/,(4)mod/special/, 或(5)mod/texte/中的index.php的config[pathMod]参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities exist in PMECMS. Remote attackers can rely on the index (1) mod / image /, (2) mod / liens /, (3) mod / liste /, (4) mod / special /, or (5) mod / texte / One of the .php config [pathMod] parameters in a URL that executes arbitrary PHP code.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/mod/image/index.php且存在config[pathMod]参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: Proposed in the web server to visit / mod / image / index.php and the existence of config [pathMod] parameters to the request

中文: PHP Turbulence 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试 -- turbulence.php GLOBALS tcore

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有          /user/turbulence.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数GLOBALS[tcore]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request method is GET and is the /user/turbulence.php is in the request line. Check if there is a parameter 'GLOBALS[tcore]' with remote file inclusion. If the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameter.

中文: PHP Turbulence 0.0.1 alpha的user/turbulence.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助GLOBALS[tcore]参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability exists in user / turbulence.php in PHP Turbulence 0.0.1 alpha. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code with the help of a URL in the GLOBALS [tcore] parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/user/turbulence.php且存在GLOBALS[tcore]参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter the request to access /user/turbulence.php with the GLOBALS [tcore] parameter

en-US: Detect if the request line contains GET and /faq.php and check if there is a parameter 'cmd' with remote file inclusion. If the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameter.

中文: mxBB FAQ & RULES的faq.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助module_root_path参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability exists in faq.php for mxBB FAQ & RULES. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code with the help of one of the module_root_path parameters.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/faq.php且存在cmd参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: Proposed in the web server to visit /faq.php cmd parameters and the existence of the request to filter

中文: Wordpress存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试 -- wptable-button.php wpPATH
en-US: Wordpress Remote Inclusion Attempt -- wptable-button.php wpPATH

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含  /js/wptable-button.php和 wpPATH中是否包含(https?|ftps?|php):/)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request line contains /js/wptable-button.php and check if wpPATH contains (https?|ftps?|php):/). If the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameter

The wp-Table plugin's js / wptable-button.php file does not validate the wpPATH parameter input, allowing an attacker to execute arbitrary commands through any file containing local or external resources.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似js/wptable-button.php?wpPATH=http/ftp的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Proposed in the web server to contain similar js / wptable-button.php? WpPATH = http / ftp uri request to be filtered

en-US: There are multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in the telltarget CMS. 中文: LaVague 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试 -- printbar.php views_path
en-US: LaVague Remote Inclusion Attempt -- printbar.php views_path

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /views/print/printbar.php。 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数views_path。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request method is GET and if the /views/print/printbar.php is in the request line. And check if there is a parameter 'views_path' with remote file inclusion. If the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameter.

中文: LaVague 的views/print/printbar.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助views_path参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: A PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability exists in LaVague's views / print / printbar.php. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code with the help of one of the views_path parameters.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含 /views/print/printbar.php，views_path参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter the requests that contain the /views/print/printbar.php ,views_path parameters with ../.

en-US: Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities exist in gnuedu. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code with a URL from the ETCDIR parameter submitted to libs / lom.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/libs/lom.php且存在ETCDIR参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: Proposed in the web server to visit / libs / lom.php ETCDIR parameters exist and the request has been filtered

en-US: PHPChess Remote Inclusion Attempt -- layout_admin_cfg.php Root_Path

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有         /layout_admin_cfg.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数Root_Path。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request method is GET and if /layout_admin_cfg.php is in the request line. And check if there is a parameter 'Root_Path' with remote file inclusion. If the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameter.

中文: phpChess Community Edition 中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到includes/language.php的(1)config参数、到skins/phpchess/中的(2)layout_admin_cfg.php、(3)layout_cfg.php或(4)layout_t_top.php的Root_Path参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities exist in phpChess Community Edition. Remote attackers can use the (1) config parameter submitted to includes / language.php to the Root_Path parameter in (2) layout_admin_cfg.php, (3) layout_cfg.php or (4) layout_t_top.php in skins / phpchess / A URL, execute arbitrary PHP code.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/layout_admin_cfg.php且存在Root_Path参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: Proposed in the web server to access /layout_admin_cfg.php and the existence of the config parameter request to be filtered

en-US: Detect if the request method is GET and if the /layout_cfg.php is in the request line. And check if there is a parameter 'Root_Path' with remote file inclusion. If the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameter.

en-US: Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities exist in phpChess Community Edition. Remote attackers can use the (1) config parameter submitted to includes / language.php to the Root_Path parameter in (2) layout_admin_cfg.php, (3) layout_cfg.php or (4) layout_t_top.php in skins / phpchess / A URL, execute arbitrary PHP code.

中文: Simple PHP脚本Gallery存在远程文件捆绑 index.php gallery
en-US: Simple PHP Script Gallery Remote Inclusion index.php gallery

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含和         /index.php 。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数gallery。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request line contains /index.php and check if there is a parameter 'gallery' with remote file inclusion. If the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameter.

中文: Simple PHP Scripts gallery中的index.php存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助the gallery参数注入任意的web脚本或HTML。
en-US: There is a cross-site scripting attack on index.php in the Simple PHP Scripts gallery, allowing remote attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts or HTML with the gallery parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/index.php且存在gallery参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: Proposed in the web server to visit / index.php and there gallery parameter request to be filtered

中文: gnuedu 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试 -- lom.php ETCDIR
en-US: gnuedu Remote Inclusion Attempt -- lom.php ETCDIR

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和       /web/lom.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数ETCDIR。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request line contains GET as well as /web/lom.php and check if there is a parameter 'ETCDIR' with remote file inclusion. If the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameter.
Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities exist in gnuedu. A remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code with a URL from the ETCDIR parameter submitted to web / lom.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/web/lom.php且存在ETCDIR参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter the request to access /web/lom.php with ETCDIR parameters

中文: telltarget CMS 中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到site_conf.php的(1)ordnertiefe参数、到functionen/中的(a)class.csv.php,(b)produkte_nach_serie.php或(c)ref_kd_rubrik.php文件、module/中的(d)hg_referenz_jobgalerie.php,(e)surfer_anmeldung_NWL.php,(f)produkte_nach_serie_alle.php,(g)surfer_aendern.php,(h)ref_kd_rubrik.php或(i)referenz.php文件或standard/中的(j)1/lay.php或(k)3/lay.php文件的(2)tt_docroot参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: There are multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in the telltarget CMS. Remote attackers can rely on the (1) ordnertiefe parameter submitted to site_conf.php to (a) class.csv.php in functionen / (b) the produkte_nach_serie.php or (c) ref_kd_rubrik.php file in module / (d) hg_referenz_jobgalerie.php, (e) surfer_anmeldung_NWL.php, (f) produkte_nach_serie_alle.php, (g) surfer_aendern.php, (h) ref_kd_rubrik.php or (i) referenz.php files or standard / in (j) a URL (2) tt_docroot parameter 1 / lay.php or (k) 3 / lay.php file and execute arbitrary PHP code.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问right_file且存在ARGS_NAMES=tt_docroot参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter access right_file and exist ARGS_NAMES=tt_docroot parameters's requests.

en-US: If the de/pda/dev_logon.asp and a 'username' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Nokia Intellisync Mobile Suite 可能涉及Novell Groupwise Mobile Server和Nokia Intellisync Wireless Email Express，中存在多个跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到de/pda/dev_logon.asp的用户名参数和(a)usrmgr/registerAccount.asp,(b)de/create_account.asp以及其他文件中的多个未明向量，注入任意的web脚本或HTML。
en-US: Nokia Intellisync Mobile Suite may have multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities in Novell Groupwise Mobile Server and Nokia Intellisync Wireless Email Express. Remote attackers can inject arbitrary webs with username parameters submitted to de/pda/dev_logon.asp and (a) usrmgr/registerAccount.asp, (b) de/create_account.asp, and multiple unidentified vectors in other files Script or HTML.

en-US: Suggest web server to filter access /de/pda/dev_logon.asp and exist username and other keywords parameters's requests.

A remote attacker can go to form (mods) [] or (3) form of search/list/action_search/index.php with the form (mail) argument submitted to contact/contact/index.php search_term] parameter to the (5) form [cat] parameter in news/list/index.php to the specific news/details/id _ */action_create/index (6) form [cat], (7) form [name] or (8) form [message] parameters for the .php file or the form [mail] parameter to newsletter/create/index.php, web script or html.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/newsletter/create/index.php且存在form[mail]参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter access /newsletter/create/index.php and exist form[mail] parameters's requests.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?cookie=INSERT INTO的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?cookie=INSERT INTO requests.

中文: WordPress SQL注入尝试 -- admin-ajax.php cookie DELETE
en-US: WordPress SQL Injection Attempt -- admin-ajax.php cookie DELETE

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含  /wp-admin/admin-ajax.php和cookie参数中是否带有SQL语句(DELETE FROM)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request line contains /wp-admin/admin-ajax.php and check if the cookie parameter contains a SQL statement (DELETE FROM). If the rule is matched, block the request and set the related parameter

中文: WordPress中的admin-ajax.php文件中存在sql注入漏洞，攻击者可利用cookie参数执行任意的sql指令
en-US: An sql injection vulnerability exists in the admin-ajax.php file in WordPress. An attacker could use cookie parameters to execute arbitrary sql commands

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?cookie=DELETE FROM的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?cookie=DELETE FROM requests.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?cookie=ASCII SELECT的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?cookie=ASCII SELECT requests.

中文: 检测 AlstraSoft E-Friends SQL注入攻击
en-US: AlstraSoft E-Friends SQL Injection Attempt -- index.php pack UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/index.php并带有可SQL注入的参数pack则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /index.php and a 'pack' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: AlstraSoft E-Friends 的paypal.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助对index.php文件的paypal操作中的pack参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: SQL injection vulnerability exists in paypal.php for AlstraSoft E-Friends. A remote attacker can execute arbitrary SQL commands by virtue of the pack parameter in the paypal operation on the index.php file.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php并带有pack参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /index.php and exist pack parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 CubeCart SQL注入攻击
en-US: CubeCart SQL Injection Attempt -- cart.inc.php UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /cart.inc.php且满足于 QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配SQL语句（UPDATE SET）则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /cart.inc.php and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matching a SQL statement (UPDATE SET) are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: CubeCart 中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到包含目录中的cart.inc.php和其他文件的未明参数，执行任意的SQL指令。此漏洞与缺少对$option变量的净化和cookie修改有关。
en-US: Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities in CubeCart. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands with unknown parameters submitted to cart.inc.php and other files in the directory. This vulnerability is related to the lack of cleanup and cookie modification of the $ option variable.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/cart.inc.php并带有关键字UPDATE和SET的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /cart.inc.php and exist UPDATE and SET requests.

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/admincp/attachment.php且满足于QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配SQL语句（UPDATE SET）则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /admincp/attachment.php and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matching to a SQL statement (UPDATE SET) are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Jelsoft vBulletin 3.6.5版本的admincp/attachment.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程认证管理员可以借助"Attached Before"执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: SQL Injection Vulnerability exists in admincp / attachment.php in version 3.6.5 of Jelsoft vBulletin. Remote Authentication Administrators can execute arbitrary SQL commands with "Attached Before".

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/admincp/attachment.php并带有关键词UPDATE和SET数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /admincp/attachment.php and exist UPDATE and SET keywords's parameters requests.

中文: 检测 JGBBS SQL注入攻击
en-US: JGBBS SQL Injection Attempt -- search.asp title UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/search.asp并带有可SQL注入的参数title则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /search.php and a 'title' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: JGBBS 3.0 Beta 1及之前版本的search.asp中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助title参数，执行任意的SQL指令。此漏洞不同于CVE-2007-1440。
en-US: SQL Injection Vulnerability exists in search.asp for JGBBS 3.0 Beta 1 and earlier. Remote attackers can use the title parameter to execute arbitrary SQL commands. The vulnerability differs from CVE-2007-1440.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/search.asp并带有title参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /search.asp and exist title parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 NetVIOS Portal SQL注入攻击
en-US: NetVIOS Portal SQL Injection Attempt -- page.asp NewsID UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/News/page.asp并带有可SQL注入的参数NewsID则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /News/page.asp and a 'NewsID' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: NetVIOS Portal的News/page.asp中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助NewsID参数，执行任意的SQL指令。注意：此漏洞可能与CVE-2006-5954相同。
en-US: SQL Injection Vulnerability in News / page.asp on NetVIOS Portal. Remote attackers can rely on NewsID parameters to execute arbitrary SQL commands. Note: This vulnerability may be the same as CVE-2006-5954.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含News/page.asp并带有NewsID参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains News/page.asp and exist NewsID parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 Minerva mod SQL注入攻击
en-US: Minerva mod SQL Injection Attempt -- forum.php c UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/forum.php并带有可SQL注入的参数c则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /forum.php and a 'c' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: phpBB Minerva mod 2.0.21 build 238a及之前版本的forum.php文件中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助c参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: SQL Injection Vulnerability in phpBB Minerva mod 2.0.21 build 238a and previous version of forum.php file. Remote attackers can use c parameters to execute arbitrary SQL commands.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/forum.php并带有c参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /forum.php and exist c parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 phpx SQL注入攻击
en-US: phpx SQL Injection Attempt -- gallery.php image_id UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /gallery.php并带有可SQL注入的参数image_id则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /gallery.php and a 'image_id' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: phpx 3.5.15版本中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到(a)gallery.php的(1)image_id或(2)cat_id参数、到(b)news.php或(c)print.php的(3)news_id参数、到news.php的(4)news_cat_id 参数、到(d)forums.php的(5)cat_id,(6)topic_id或(7)post_id参数、到(e)users.php的(8)user_id参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities exist in phpx version 3.5.15. Remote attackers can rely on the (3) news_id parameter of (a) gallery.php (1) image_id or (2) cat_id to (b) news.php or (c) print.php to news.php (4) news_cat_id parameter to (d) forums.php (5) cat_id, (6) topic_id or (7) post_id parameter to (e) user.id parameter of user.php, execute any SQL instruction .

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含gallery.php并带有image_id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains gallery.php and exist image_id parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 Web Wiz Forums SQL注入攻击
en-US: Web Wiz Forums SQL Injection Attempt -- functions_filters.asp UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/functions/functions_filters.asp且满足于 QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配（UPDATE SET）则规则匹配，拦截并设置参
en-US: If the /functions/functions_filters.asp and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matching to a SQL statement (UPDATE SET) are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Web Wiz Forums 8.05a之前版本(MySQL版本n)的functions/functions_filters.asp中存在SQL注入漏洞。它没有正确的过滤SQL指令中的特定字符，这使得远程攻击者可以借助\'序列，执行任意的SQL指令。"
en-US: SQL Injection Vulnerability exists in functions / functions_filters.asp of versions prior to Web Wiz Forums 8.05a (MySQL Version n). It does not properly filter certain characters in SQL instructions, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands with the help of the 'sequence'. "

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含functions/functions_filters.asp并带有UPDATE SET参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains functions/functions_filters.asp and exist UPDATE and SET parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 PHP-Stats SQL注入攻击
en-US: PHP-Stats SQL Injection Attempt -- php-stats.recphp.php ip UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/php-stats.recphp.php并带有可SQL注入的参数ip则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /php-stats.recphp.php and a 'ip' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: PHP-Stats 0.1.9.1b及之前版本的php-stats.recphp.php中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1)PC-REMOTE-ADDR HTTP头中的第一个dotted-quad IP地址字符串，执行任意代码。该字符串会被注入到$_SERVER['HTTP_PC_REMOTE_ADDR']或(2)ip参数中。
en-US: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities exist in php-stat 0.1.9.1b and prior versions of php-stats.recphp.php. A remote attacker can execute arbitrary code with the help of (1) the first dotted-quad IP address string in the PC-REMOTE-ADDR HTTP header. The string will be injected into the $ _SERVER ['HTTP_PC_REMOTE_ADDR'] or (2) ip parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含php-stats.recphp.php并带有ip参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains php-stats.recphp.php and exist ip parameters's requests.

中文: Woltlab Burning Board (wBB) 2.x版本的usergroups.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助applicationids数组的数组索引，执行任意的SQL指令。

中文: WordPress SQL注入尝试 -- admin-functions.php SELECT
en-US: WordPress SQL Injection Attempt -- admin-functions.php SELECT

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含  /wp-admin/admin-functions.php和QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY中是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request line contains /wp-admin/admin-functions.php and check if QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY contains a SQL statement (SELECT FROM). If the rule is matched, block the request and set the related parameter

中文: WordPress中的admin-functions.php文件中存在sql注入漏洞，攻击者可利用请求行或请求体注入任意的sql指令
en-US: There is a sql injection vulnerability in the admin-functions.php file in WordPress. An attacker could use the request line or request body to inject arbitrary sql commands.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似wp-admin/admin-functions.php?cookie=SELECT FROM的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains wp-admin/admin-functions.php?cookie=SELECT FROM requests.

中文: WordPress SQL注入尝试 -- admin-functions.php UNION SELECT
en-US: WordPress SQL Injection Attempt -- admin-functions.php UNION SELECT

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含  /wp-admin/admin-functions.php和QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY中是否包含SQL语句（UNION SELECT）。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request line contains /wp-admin/admin-functions.php and check if QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY contains a SQL statement (UNION SELECT). If the rule is matched, block the request and set the related parameter

中文: WordPress中的admin-functions.php文件中存在sql注入漏洞，攻击者可利用请求行或请求体注入任意的sql指令
en-US: There is a sql injection vulnerability in the admin-functions.php file in WordPress. An attacker could use the request line or request body to inject arbitrary sql commands.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似wp-admin/admin-functions.php?cookie=UNION SELECT的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains wp-admin/admin-functions.php?cookie=UNION SELECT requests.

中文: WordPress SQL注入尝试 -- admin-functions.php INSERT
en-US: WordPress SQL Injection Attempt -- admin-functions.php INSERT

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含  /wp-admin/admin-functions.php和QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY中是否包含SQL语句（INSERT INTO)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request line contains /wp-admin/admin-functions.php and check if QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY contains a SQL statement (INSERT INTO). If the rule is matched, block the request and set the related parameter

中文: WordPress中的admin-functions.php文件中存在sql注入漏洞，攻击者可利用请求行或请求体注入任意的sql指令
en-US: There is a sql injection vulnerability in the admin-functions.php file in WordPress. An attacker could use the request line or request body to inject arbitrary sql commands.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似wp-admin/admin-functions.php?cookie=INSERT INTO的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains wp-admin/admin-functions.php?cookie=INSERT INTO requests.

中文: WordPress SQL注入尝试 -- admin-functions.php DELETE
en-US: WordPress SQL Injection Attempt -- admin-functions.php DELETE

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含  /wp-admin/admin-functions.php和QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY中是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）DELETE.+FROM并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request line contains /wp-admin/admin-functions.php and check if QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY contains a SQL statement (SELECT FROM). DELETE.+FROM and set the related parameter

中文: WordPress中的admin-functions.php文件中存在sql注入漏洞，攻击者可利用请求行或请求体注入任意的sql指令
en-US: There is a sql injection vulnerability in the admin-functions.php file in WordPress. An attacker could use the request line or request body to inject arbitrary sql commands.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似wp-admin/admin-functions.php?cookie=DELETE FROM的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains wp-admin/admin-functions.php?cookie=DELETE FROM requests.

中文: WordPress SQL注入尝试 -- admin-functions.php ASCII
en-US: WordPress SQL Injection Attempt -- admin-functions.php ASCII

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含  /wp-admin/admin-functions.php和QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY参数中是否带有SQL语句(ASCII SELECT)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request line contains /wp-admin/admin-functions.php and check if QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY parameter contains a SQL statement (ASCII SELECT). If the rule is matched, block the request and set the related parameter

中文: WordPress中的admin-functions.php文件中存在sql注入漏洞，攻击者可利用请求行或请求体注入任意的sql指令
en-US: There is a sql injection vulnerability in the admin-functions.php file in WordPress. An attacker could use the request line or request body to inject arbitrary sql commands.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似wp-admin/admin-functions.php?cookie=ASCII SELECT的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains wp-admin/admin-functions.php?cookie=ASCII SELECT requests.

中文: WordPress SQL注入尝试 -- admin-functions.php UPDATE
en-US: WordPress SQL Injection Attempt -- admin-functions.php UPDATE

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含  /wp-admin/admin-functions.php和QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY参数中是否带有SQL语句(UPDATE SET)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Detect if the request line contains /wp-admin/admin-functions.php and check if QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY parameter contains a SQL statement (UPDATE SET). If the rule is matched, block the request and set the related parameter

中文: WordPress中的admin-functions.php文件中存在sql注入漏洞，攻击者可利用请求行或请求体注入任意的sql指令
en-US: There is a sql injection vulnerability in the admin-functions.php file in WordPress. An attacker could use the request line or request body to inject arbitrary sql commands.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似wp-admin/admin-functions.php?cookie=UPDATE SET的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains wp-admin/admin-functions.php?cookie=UPDATE SET requests.

中文: 检测  Links Management Application SQL注入攻击
en-US: Links Management Application SQL Injection Attempt -- index.php lcnt UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/index.php并带有可SQL注入的参数lcnt则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /index.php and a 'lcnt' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Links Management应用程序1.0版本中的index.php存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助lcnt参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: SQL Injection Vulnerability exists in index.php in the Links Management application version 1.0. Remote attackers can use lcnt parameters to execute arbitrary SQL commands.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php并带有lcnt参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /index.php and exist lcnt parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 Serendipity SQL注入攻击
en-US: Serendipity SQL Injection Attempt -- index.php serendipity UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/index.php和serendipity[multiCat][且满足于且满足于QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配（UPDATE SET）则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /index.php, serendipity[multiCat][ and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matching to (UPDATE SET) are found in the request line. It means the rule is matched, block the request and set the related parameters.

中文: Serendipity 1.1.1版本的index.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助serendipity[multiCat][]参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: SQL injection vulnerability exists in index.php for Serendipity version 1.1.1. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands with the serendipity [multiCat] [] parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含index.php并带有serendipity[multiCat][参数UPDATE SET关键字的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains index.php and exist serendipity[multiCat][ parameters UPDATE SET keywords's requests.

中文: 检测 Hazir Site SQL注入攻击
en-US: Hazir Site SQL Injection Attempt -- giris_yap.asp sifre UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/giris_yap.asp并带有可SQL注入的参数sifre则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /giris_yap.asp and a 'sifre' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Hazir Site 2.0版本的giris_yap.asp中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助sifre参数，绕过身份认证。
en-US: SQL injection vulnerability exists in giris_yap.asp for Hazir Site version 2.0. Remote attackers can bypass identity authentication with sifre parameters.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/giris_yap.asp并带有id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /giris_yap.asp and exist id parameters's requests.

中文: 检测  Mambo SQL注入攻击
en-US: Mambo SQL Injection Attempt -- moscomment.php mcname UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/moscomment.php并带有可SQL注入的参数mcname则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /moscomment.php and a 'mcname' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Mambo 4.6.x中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到moscomment.php的mcname参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities in Mambo 4.6.x. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands with the mcname parameter submitted to moscomment.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含 /moscomment.php并带有mcname参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /moscomment.php and exist mcname parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 Omegasoft SQL注入攻击
en-US: Omegasoft SQL Injection Attempt -- OmegaMw7.asp UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/OmegaMw7.asp且满足于 QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配（UPDATE SET）则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /OmegaMw7.asp and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matching to (UPDATE SET) are found in the request line. It means the rule is matched, block the request and set the related parameters.

中文: OMEGA(又称Omegasoft)INterneSErvicesLosungen (INSEL)的OmegaMw7.asp中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1)用户创建的文本字段、(2)F05003,(3)F05005和(4)F05015字段以及其他未明的标准字段，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities in OmegaMw7.asp for OMEGA (aka Omegasoft) INterneServicesLosungen (INSEL). A remote attacker can execute arbitrary SQL commands with the help of (1) user-created text fields, (2) F05003, (3) F05005, and (4) F05015 fields, and other unknown standard fields.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含OmegaMw7.asp并带有:UPDATE.+SET关键字的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains OmegaMw7.asp and exist :UPDATE.+SET keywords's parameters requests.

中文: 检测 DGNews SQL注入攻击
en-US: DGNews SQL Injection Attempt -- news.php newsid UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/news.php并带有可SQL注入的参数newsid则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /news.php and a 'newsid' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: DGNews 2.1版本的news.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助fullnews操作中的newsid参数，执行任意的SQL指令。此漏洞不同于CVE-2007-0693。
en-US: SQL Injection Vulnerability exists in newsNeeds version 2.1 of DGNews. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands with the newsid parameter in the fullnews operation. The vulnerability differs from CVE-2007-0693.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/news.php并带有newsid参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /news.php and exist newsid parameters's requests.

en-US: If the /cgi-bin/reorder2.asp and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matching to (UPDATE SET) are found in the request line. It means the rule is matched, block the request and set related parameters.

中文: SalesCart Shopping Cart的cgi-bin/reorder2.asp中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助密码字段和其他未明向量，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities in cgi-bin / reorder2.asp in SalesCart Shopping Cart. Remote attackers can resort to password fields and other unknown vectors to execute arbitrary SQL commands.

中文: 检测  myBloggie SQL注入攻击
en-US: myBloggie SQL Injection Attempt -- index.php cat_id UNION SELECT

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /index.php并带有可SQL注入的参数cat_id则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /index.php and a 'cat_id' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: myBloggie 2.1.1中存在多个SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过(1)在search.php中的keyword参数，(2)在viewdate模式中的date_no参数，(3)在viewcat模式中的cat_id参数，在viewmonth模式中的(4)month_no或(5)year参数，或(6)在viewid模式中的post_id参数，执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: There are multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in myBloggie 2.1.1 that remote attackers can pass through (1) the keyword parameter in search.php, (2) the date_no parameter in viewdate mode, and (3) the cat_id parameter in viewcat mode , (4) month_no or (5) year parameters in viewmonth mode, or (6) post_id parameters in viewid mode, execute any SQL command.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含index.php并带有cat_id 参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains index.php and exist cat_id parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 myBloggie SQL注入攻击
en-US: myBloggie SQL Injection Attempt -- index.php cat_id UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /index.php并带有可SQL注入的参数cat_id则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /index.php and a 'cat_id' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: myBloggie 2.1.6及之前版本中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到查看用户操作中的index.php的(1)cat_id或(2)年份参数，执行任意的SQL指令。此漏洞不同于CVE-2005-1500和CVE-2005-4225。
en-US: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities exist in myBloggie 2.1.6 and earlier. A remote attacker can execute arbitrary SQL commands with the (1) cat_id or (2) year parameter submitted to index.php in the view user action. The vulnerability differs from CVE-2005-1500 and CVE-2005-4225.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含index.php并带有cat_id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains index.php and exist cat_id parameters's requests.

en-US: If the /index.php is found in the request line. It means the rule is matched, block the request and set the related parameters.

中文: 检测 Savas Guestbook SQL注入攻击
en-US: Savas Guestbook SQL Injection Attempt -- add2.php name UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /add2.php并带有可SQL注入的参数name则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /add2.php and a 'name' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Sava's Guestbook 23.11.2006版本的add2.php中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。当magic_quotes_gpc被禁用时，远程攻击者可以借助(1)姓名、(2)国家、(3)电子邮件、(4)网站和(5)信息参数，执行任意的SQL指令
en-US: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities exist in add2.php version of Sava's Guestbook 23.11.2006. When magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands with the help of (1) name, (2) country, (3) email, (4) website and (5) informational parameters.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/add2.php并带有name参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /add2.php and exist name parameters's requests.

en-US: If the index.php and a 'login' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Jetbox CMS 的index.php中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助sendpwd任务中的登录参数，注入任意的web脚本或HTML。
en-US: Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability in index.php in Jetbox CMS. Remote attackers can use the login parameters in the sendpwd task to inject arbitrary web scripts or HTML.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问index.php且存在login参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains index.php and exist login and other keywords's parameters requests.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问main/inc/lib/fckeditor/editor/plugins/ImageManager/editor.php且存在img等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter main/inc/lib/fckeditor/editor/plugins/ImageManager/editor.php and exist img and other keywords's requests.

中文: 检测网页中ASP-Nuke XSS攻击
en-US: ASP-Nuke XSS Attempt -- news.asp id

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/news.asp且带有可XSS攻击的参数id则规则匹配，拦截。
en-US: If the /news.asp and a 'id' parameter being vulnerable to XSS attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request.

中文: ASP-Nuke 的news.asp中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助id参数，注入任意的web脚本或HTML
en-US: Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability in ASP-Nuke news.asp. Remote attackers can use id parameters to inject arbitrary web scripts or HTML.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/news.asp且存在id参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter contains /news.asp and exist id and other parameters's requests.
