中文: 检测  RevokeSoft RevokeBB SQL注入攻击
en-US: RevokeSoft RevokeBB SQL Injection Attempt -- class_users.php UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/inc/class_users.php且满足于 QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配（UPDATE SET）则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /inc/class_users.php and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matching to （UPDATE SET） are found in the request line, it means the rule matching. Block the request and set relevant parameter.

中文: RevokeSoft RevokeBB 的inc/class_users.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助cookie，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: SQL injection vulnerability exists in inc/class_users.php for RevokeSoft RevokeBB. Remote attackers can use cookies to execute arbitrary SQL commands.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/inc/class_users.php并带有UPDATE.+SET关键字的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /inc/class_users.php and exist UPDATE.+SET and other keywords's requests.

中文: PNphpBB2 SQL注入尝试-- index.php c SELECT
en-US: PNphpBB2 SQL Injection Attempt -- index.php c SELECT

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有         /index.php和 c 变量的中是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET, if the request line contains /index.php and if the 'c' variable includes SQL statement(SELECT FROM). When the rule matches, the request will be blocked and relevant parameter will be set.

中文: PhpBB Plus 1.52以及较早的版本中存在多个跨站脚本(XSS)漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过(1)groupcp.php，(2)index.php，(3)portal.php，(4)viewforum.php或(5)viewtopic.php的bsid参数，(6)index.php的c参数，或者(7)portal.php的article参数来注入任意Web脚本或HTML
en-US: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities exist in PhpBB Plus 1.52 and earlier versions that remote attackers can access by (1) groupcp.php, (2) index.php, (3) portal.php, (4) viewforum .php or (5) viewtopic.php's bsid parameter, (6) index.php's c parameter, or (7) portal.php's article parameter to inject any web script or HTML.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似/index.php?c=SELECT FROM的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /index.php?c=SELECT FROM requests.

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含  /wp-admin/admin-functions.php和QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY参数中是否带有SQL语句(ASCII SELECT)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request line contains /wp-admin/admin-functions.php and whether the QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY parameter includes SQL statement(ASCII SELECT). When the rule matches, the request will be blocked and relevant parameter will be set.

中文: WordPress中的xmlrpc.php文件中存在sql注入漏洞，攻击者可利用请求行或请求体注入任意的sql指令
en-US: SQL injection vulnerability in the xmlrpc.php file in WordPress. An attacker could use the request line or request body to inject arbitrary sql commands.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似/xmlrpc.php?xxx=ASCII SELECT的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /xmlrpc.php?xxx=ASCII SELECT requests.

中文: Wordpress 2.2 SQL注入尝试 -- xmlrpc.php UPDATE
en-US: Wordpress 2.2 SQL Injection Attempt -- xmlrpc.php UPDATE

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含  /wp-admin/admin-functions.php和QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY参数中是否带有SQL语句(UPDATE SET)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request line contains /wp-admin/admin-functions.php and whether the QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY parameter includes SQL statement(UPDATE SET). When the rule matches, the request will be blocked and relevant parameter will be set.

中文: WordPress中的xmlrpc.php文件中存在sql注入漏洞，攻击者可利用请求行或请求体注入任意的sql指令
en-US: SQL injection vulnerability in the xmlrpc.php file in WordPress. An attacker could use the request line or request body to inject arbitrary sql commands.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似/xmlrpc.php?xxx=UPDATE SET的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /xmlrpc.php?xxx=UPDATE SET requests.

中文: 检测 Rigter Portal System (RPS) SQL注入攻击
en-US: Rigter Portal System (RPS) SQL Injection Attempt -- index.php categoria UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/index.php并带有可SQL注入的参数categoria则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /index.php and a 'categoria' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Rigter Portal System (RPS) 6.2版本中存在SQL注入漏洞。当magic_quotes_gpc被禁用时，远程攻击者可以借助提交到最高级别的URI(index.php)的categoria参数，执行任意的SQL指令。它可能与ver_descarga.php有关。
en-US: SQL Injection Vulnerability exists in Version 6.2 of the Rigter Portal System (RPS). When magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands using the categoria parameter submitted to the highest-level URI (index.php). It may be related to ver_descarga.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php并带有categoria参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /index.php and exist categoria parameters's requests.

en-US: If the /inlinemod.php and a 'postids' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Jelsoft vBulletin 3.5.8之前版本和3.6.x系列中3.6.5之前版本的inlinemod.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程认证用户可以借助postids参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: SQL Injection Vulnerability exists in versions of inlinemod.php prior to 3.6.0 in Jelsoft vBulletin pre-3.5.8 and in 3.6.x series. Remote Authentication Users can use the postids parameter to execute arbitrary SQL commands.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/inlinemod.php并带有postids参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /inlinemod.php and exist postids parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 Connectix Boards SQL注入攻击
en-US: Connectix Boards SQL Injection Attempt -- admin.php uploadimage UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/admin.php并带有可SQL注入的参数uploadimage则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /admin.php and a 'uploadimage' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Connectix Boards 0.7及之前版本的admin.bbcode.php中存在未限制文件上传漏洞。远程认证管理员可以通过提交上传图像参数到admin.php，来上传一个带有.php扩展名的特制的GIF微笑图像，从而实现任意的PHP代码执行。以后借助对smileys/中的文件的一个直接请求，可以访问该图像。注意：远程未认证攻击者可以利用它进行SQL注入攻击。
en-US: There is an unrestricted file upload vulnerability in Connectix Boards 0.7 and earlier admin.bbcode.php. Remote Authentication Administrators can upload a specially crafted GIF smile image with a .php extension by submitting upload image parameters to admin.php for arbitrary PHP code execution. Later, with a direct request to the file in smileys/, you can access the image. Note: Remote unauthenticated attacker can use it for SQL injection attacks.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/admin.php并带有uploadimage参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /admin.php and exist uploadimage parameters's requests.

en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains index.php and exist p_skin parameters's requests.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/classes/class_session.php并带有CLIENT_IP参数的请求给过滤了。

中文: 检测 Mathis Dirksen-Thedens ZephyrSoft Toolbox Address Book Continued (ABC) SQL注入攻击

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /functions.php并带有可SQL注入的参数id则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数

中文: Mathis Dirksen-Thedens ZephyrSoft Toolbox Address Book Continued (ABC)1.00和1.01版本中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以通过提交functions.php中的(1)updateRow和(2)deleteRow函数的id参数，执行任意的SQL指令。它们是在1.01版本中被修复的SQL注入漏洞的变体。
en-US: Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerability in Mathis Dirksen-Thedens ZephyrSoft Toolbox Address Book Continued (ABC) Version 1.00 and 1.01. A remote attacker can execute arbitrary SQL commands by submitting the (1) updateRow and (2) deleteRow id arguments in functions.php. They are a variation of the SQL injection vulnerability that was fixed in version 1.01.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含functions.php并带有id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains functions.php and exist id parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 PollMentor SQL注入攻击

中文:
PollMentor对用户提交给的参数缺少正确充分的过滤，远程攻击者可以利用此漏洞非授权操作数据库，获得对应用的完全控制。

PollMentor's pollmentorres.asp script lacks adequate filtering of user-supplied id parameter data, preventing remote attackers from gaining access to the database by inserting specific SQL commands into the input data.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/pollmentorres.asp并带有id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /pollmentorres.asp and exist id parameters's requests.

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/ogretmenkontrol.asp并带有可SQL注入的参数pass则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /ogretmenkontrol.asp and a 'pass' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Zindizayn Okul Web Sistemi中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到(a)mezungiris.asp或(b)ogretmenkontrol.asp的(1)id或(2)pass参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities in Zindizayn Okul Web Sistemi. A remote attacker can execute arbitrary SQL instructions with the (1) id or (2) pass parameters submitted to (a) mezungiris.asp or (b) ogretmenkontrol.asp.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含ogretmenkontrol.asp并带有pass参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains ogretmenkontrol.asp and exist pass parameters's requests.

中文: Joomla! SQL注入尝试（1）
en-US: Joomla! SQL Injection Attempt -- category.php catid SELECT

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含/models/category.php并且catid 参数中是否带有 SQL语句（select from）如果是，则判断为  Joomla! SQL注入尝试。将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request line contains /models/category.php and if the 'catid' parameter has a SQL statement (select from). If so, it is determined as Joomla! SQL injection attempt and the request will be blocked as well as set relevant parameter.

中文: Joomla! SVN 20070118 (com_weblinks)的Weblinks组件中的models/category.php存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助catid参数，执行SQL指令。
en-US: SQL Injection Vulnerability exists in models / category.php in Weblinks component of Joomla! SVN 20070118 (com_weblinks). Remote attackers can use the catid parameter to execute SQL commands.

中文: 版本3.4.7对该sql注入进行修复，建议使用3.4.7及之后的版本
en-US: Version 3.4.7 to repair the sql injection, it is recommended to use 3.4.7 and later versions

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含/letterman.class.php并且请求parameter 参数中是否带有 SQL语句（UNION SELECT）。如果是，则判断为  Joomla! SQL注入尝试，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request line contains /letterman.class.php and if the request parameter has a SQL statement (UNION SELECT). If so, it is determined as Joomla! SQL injection attempt and the request will be blocked as well as set relevant parameter.

中文: Joomla! Letterman 1.2.3(com_letterman)组件的letterman.class.php中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助id参数，执行任意的SQL指令。这些漏洞与(1)lm_sendMail,(2)saveNewsletter和(3)cancelNewsletter函数有关。
en-US: Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities in the letterman.class.php for the Joomla! Letterman 1.2.3 (com_letterman) component. Remote attackers can use the id parameter to execute arbitrary SQL commands. These vulnerabilities are related to (1) lm_sendMail, (2) saveNewsletter, and (3) cancelNewsletter functions.

中文: 建议使用1.0.12之后的版本
en-US: It is recommended to use version after 1.0.12

Remote attackers can use the id parameter to execute arbitrary SQL commands. These vulnerabilities are related to (1) lm_sendMail, (2) saveNewsletter, and (3) cancelNewsletter functions.

中文: 检测  W2B Online Banking SQL注入攻击
en-US: W2B Online Banking SQL Injection Attempt -- mailer.w2b draft UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/mailer.w2b并带有可SQL注入的参数draft则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /mailer.w2b and a 'draft' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: W2B Online Banking中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到mailer.w2b的(1)draft参数或到DocPay.w2b的(2)listDocPay参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities in W2B Online Banking. A remote attacker can execute arbitrary SQL commands with the (1) draft parameter submitted to mailer.w2b or the (2) listDocPay parameter to DocPay.w2b.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含mailer.w2b并带有draft参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains mailer.w2b and exist draft parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 bbPress SQL注入攻击
en-US: bbPress SQL Injection Attempt -- formatting-functions.php UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/bb-includes/formatting-functions.php且满足于QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配（UPDATE SET）则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /bb-includes/formatting-functions.php and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matching to （UPDATE SET）are found in request line, it means rule matching. Block the request and set relevant parameter.

中文: bbPress的bb-includes/formatting-functions.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到forums/bb-edit.php的未明参数，执行任意的SQL指令。此漏洞又称"quircky slashes bug"。
en-US: There is a SQL Injection vulnerability in bbPress's bb-includes / formatting-functions.php. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands with unknown parameters submitted to forums / bb-edit.php. This vulnerability is also known as "quircky slashes bug."

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含bb-includes/formatting-functions.php并带有UPDATE SET参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains bb-includes/formatting-functions.php and exist UPDATE SET parameters's requests.

en-US: Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities in Xoops 2.0.16. A remote attacker can execute arbitrary SQL commands with the help of the id parameter in kernel / group.php in the kernel and the lid parameter in class / table_broken.php in the Weblinks module and other unknown parameters.

中文: Joomla! SQL注入尝试（13）
en-US: Joomla! SQL Injection Attempt -- example.php SELECT

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含/plugins/user/example.php 并且请求parameter 参数中是否带有 SQL语句（select from）如果是，则判断为  Joomla! SQL注入尝试，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request line contains /plugins/user/example.php and if the request parameter has a SQL statement (select from). If so, it is determined as Joomla! SQL injection attempt and the request will be blocked as well as set relevant parameter.

中文: Joomla!允许远程攻击者可以借助一个对plugins/authentication/中的plugins/user/example.php请求，获得敏感信息。该请求会在不同的出错信息中显示路径，该漏洞与每个脚本开始时的jimport函数呼叫有关。
en-US: Joomla! Allows remote attackers to get sensitive information with a plugins/user/example.php request from plugins/authentication/. The request displays the path in a different error message that relates to the jimport function call at the beginning of each script.

中文: 建议使用 version 1.5.7 之后的版本
en-US: It is recommended to use version 1.5.7 or later

中文: 检测  Francisco Burzi PHP-Nuke SQL注入攻击
en-US: Francisco Burzi PHP-Nuke SQL Injection Attempt -- modules.php active UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/admin/modules/modules.php并带有可SQL注入的参数active则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /admin/modules/modules.php and a 'active' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Francisco Burzi PHP-Nuke 7.9中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助admin/modules/modules.php中的active参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Francisco Burzi Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities in PHP-Nuke 7.9. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands with the active parameter in admin/modules/modules.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/admin/modules/modules.php并带有active参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /admin/modules/modules.php and exist active parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 Francisco Burzi PHP-Nuke SQL注入攻击
en-US: Francisco Burzi PHP-Nuke SQL Injection Attempt -- index.php ad_class UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/modules/Advertising/admin/index.php并带有可SQL注入的参数ad_class则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /modules/Advertising/admin/index.php and a 'ad_class' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Francisco Burzi PHP-Nuke 7.9中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助modules/Advertising/admin/index.php中的ad_class参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Francisco Burzi Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities in PHP-Nuke 7.9. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands with the ad_class parameter in modules/Advertising/admin/index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含modules/Advertising/admin/index.php并带有ad_class参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains modules/Advertising/admin/index.php and exist ad_class parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 Francisco Burzi PHP-Nuke SQL注入攻击
en-US: Francisco Burzi PHP-Nuke SQL Injection Attempt -- index.php imageurl UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/modules/Advertising/admin/index.php并带有可SQL注入的参数imageurl则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /modules/Advertising/admin/index.php and a 'imageurl' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Francisco Burzi PHP-Nuke 7.9中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助modules/Advertising/admin/index.php中的imageurl参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Francisco Burzi Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities in PHP-Nuke 7.9. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands with the imageurl parameter in modules/Advertising/admin/index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含modules/Advertising/admin/index.php并带有imageurl参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains modules/Advertising/admin/index.php and exist imageurl parameters's requests.

中文: 检测  Virtuemart SQL注入攻击

en-US: If the /virtuemart_parser.php and a 'Itemid' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Virtuemart 1.0.7版本中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助未明向量，执行任意的SQL指令。这些漏洞可能与在virtuemart_parser.php中被处理的(1)Itemid,(2)product_id和category_id参数有关。
en-US: SQL Injection Vulnerability in Virtuemart 1.0.7. Remote attackers can use arbitrary vectors to execute arbitrary SQL commands. These vulnerabilities may be related to (1) Itemid, (2) product_id, and category_id parameters that are processed in virtuemart_parser.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含virtuemart_parser.php并带有Itemid参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains virtuemart_parser.php and exist Itemid parameters's requests.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含index.php并带有board[、UPDATE SET参数的请求给过滤了。

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含etkinlikbak.asp并带有id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains etkinlikbak.asp and exist id parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 MiNT Haber Sistemi SQL注入攻击

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /duyuru.asp并带有可SQL注入的参数id则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /duyuru.asp and a 'id' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: MiNT Haber Sistemi 'duyuru.asp' SQL注入漏洞--MiNT Haber Sistemi 2.7版本的duyuru.asp中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助id参数，执行任意的SQL指令。

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/duyuru.asp并带有id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /duyuru.asp and exist id parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 Portix-PHP SQL注入攻击
en-US: Portix-PHP SQL Injection Attempt -- archive.php blogid UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/simplog/archive.php并带有可SQL注入的参数blogid则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /simplog/archive.php and a 'blogid' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文:
Simplog是一款简单易用的Blog程序，用PHP编写，兼容很多数据库。 
        Simplog中存在多个安全漏洞，恶意用户可以利用这些漏洞收集系统信息、执行跨站脚本和SQL注入攻击、执行任意SQL代码或完全入侵系统。 
        1) 在包含文件前没有正确验证"doc/index.php"中的"s"参数，导致可以包含任意外部或本地资源的文件。 
        2) 在SQL查询中使用之前没有正确过滤对"index.php"中"blogid"参数以及"archive.php"中"blogid"、"m"和"y"参数的输入，导致可以通过注入任意SQL代码操控SQL查询。 
        3) 没有对"adodb/server.php"和"adodb/tests/tmssql.php"脚本执行安全的测试，导致可以执行任意SQL代码或调用任意PHP函数。 
         
        4) 在返回用户之前没有正确的过滤对"login.php"中"btag"参数的输入，导致可以在用户浏览器会话中以受影响站点的权限执行任意HTML和脚本代码。
en-US: Simplog is a simple to use Blog program, written in PHP, compatible with many databases. There are several security holes in Simplog that malicious users can exploit to gather system information, perform cross-site scripting and SQL injection attacks, execute arbitrary SQL code, or fully compromise systems. 1) The "s" parameter in "doc / index.php" was incorrectly validated before including the file, resulting in a file that can contain arbitrary external or local resources. 2) Not properly filtered before use in SQL queries The input to the "blogid" parameter in "index.php" and the "blogid", "m" and "y" parameters in "archive.php" can be changed by injecting arbitrary SQL Code manipulation SQL query. 3) No secure testing of "adodb / server.php" and "adodb / tests / tmssql.php" scripts resulted in the ability to execute arbitrary SQL code or call arbitrary PHP functions. 4) Incorrectly filtering input to the "btag" parameter in "login.php" before returning to the user resulted in arbitrary HTML and script code being executed in the user's browser session with permissions of the affected site.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/simplog/archive.php并带有blogid参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /simplog/archive.php and exist blogid parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 Portix-PHP SQL注入攻击
en-US: Portix-PHP SQL Injection Attempt -- archive.php pid UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/simplog/archive.php并带有可SQL注入的参数pid则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /simplog/archive.php and a 'pid' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Jeremy Ashcraft Simplog 0.9.3及之前的版本中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。这使得远程攻击者可以借助于(a) preview.php中的(1) tid参数，(b) archive.php中的(2) id、(3)pid和(4)eid参数，以及(c) comments.php中的(5) pid参数执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities in Jeremy Ashcraft Simplog 0.9.3 and earlier. This allows remote attackers to rely on the (1) tid parameters in (a) preview.php, (b) the (2) id, (3) pid and (4) eid parameters in archive.php and (c) The pid parameter in comments.php executes any SQL command.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/simplog/archive.php并带有pid参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /simplog/archive.php and exist pid parameters's requests.

en-US: WordPress SQL Injection Attempt -- wp-trackback.php SELECT

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含  /wp-trackback.php和QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY中是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if there are a /wp-trackback.php and a 'QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY' parameter including SQL statement (SELECT FROM) in the request line. When the rule matches, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

en-US: WordPress wp-trackback.php file exists sql injection vulnerability, an attacker can use the request line or request body into any sql command.

中文: 检测 VP-ASP Shopping Cart SQL注入攻击
en-US: VP-ASP Shopping Cart SQL Injection Attempt -- shopgiftregsearch.asp LoginLastname UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/shopgiftregsearch.asp且满足于/shopgiftregsearch.asp&TX:'/SQL_INJECTION.*LoginLastname则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /shopgiftregsearch.asp and /shopgiftregsearch.asp&TX:'/SQL_INJECTION.*LoginLastname are found in request line, it means rule matching. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文:
Virtual Programming VP-ASP是一款商业性质的电子购物应用系统，由ASP脚本编写。 
        Virtual Programming VP-ASP的处理用户请求时存在输入验证漏洞，远程攻击者可以利用这个漏洞获得敏感信息或非授权操作数据库。 
        VP-ASP的shopgiftregsearch.asp和shopcustadmin.asp脚本没有对用户提交的LoginLastname和msg参数数据做充分的检查过滤，攻击者可以通过插入特定的SQL语名或脚本代码，可能获得其他用户浏览器相关的敏感信息，也可对数据库进行更改。
en-US: Virtual Programming VP-ASP is a commercial e-shopping application written by ASP script. Virtual Programming VP-ASP has an input validation vulnerability when handling user requests. Remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information or to manipulate databases without authorization. VP-ASP's shopgiftregsearch.asp and shopcustadmin.asp scripts do not adequately check and filter the LoginLastname and msg parameter data submitted by the user. An attacker could gain access to other user browsers by inserting a specific SQL language name or script code Sensitive information, but also the database can be changed.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含shopgiftregsearch.asp并带有LoginLastname参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains shopgiftregsearch.asp and exist LoginLastname parameters's requests.

中文: 检测 Rialto SQL注入攻击
en-US: Rialto SQL Injection Attempt -- listfull.asp ID UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/listfull.asp并带有可SQL注入的参数ID则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /listfull.asp and a 'ID' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules matching. Block the request and set revelant parameter.

中文: Rialto 1.6版本中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(a)admin/default.asp中的(1)用户名和(2)密码字段，提交到(b)listfull.asp或(c)printmain.asp的(3)ID参数，到(d)listmain.asp,(e)searchoption.asp或(f)searchmain.asp的(4)cat参数，到(g)searchkey.asp的(5)关键词参数，到searchmain.asp或searchoption.asp的(6)area参数，到searchkey.asp的(7)searchin参数或到searchoption.asp的(8)cost1,(9)cost2,(10)acreage1或(11)squarefeet1参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities in Rialto 1.6. Remote attackers can submit (3) ID parameters to (b) listfull.asp or (c) printmain.asp with (1) username and password field in admin / default.asp to d) the (4) cat parameter of listmain.asp, (e) searchoption.asp or (f) searchmain.asp to (g) the keyword parameter of searchkey.asp, to searchmain.asp or searchoption.asp (7) searchin parameter to searchkey.asp, or (8) cost1, (9) cost2, (10) acreage1, or (11) squarefeet1 parameters to searchoption.asp to execute arbitrary SQL instructions.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/listfull.asp并带有cat参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /listfull.asp and exist cat parameters's requests.

en-US: If the /newsletters/edition.php and a 'tk' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules matching. Block the request and set revelant parameter.

中文: bitweaver 1.3.1及之前版本的newsletters/edition.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助tk参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: SQL injection vulnerability exists in newsletters / edition.php for bitweaver 1.3.1 and earlier. Remote attackers can use the tk parameter to execute arbitrary SQL commands.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含newsletters/edition.php并带有tk参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains newsletters/edition.php and exist tk parameters's requests.

en-US: @lex Guestbook SQL Injection Attempt -- index.php lang UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/index.php并带有可SQL注入的参数lang则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /index.php and a 'lang' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules matching. Block the request and set revelant parameter.

中文: lex Guestbook 4.0.2及之前版本的index.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。当magic_quotes_gpc被禁用时，远程攻击者可以借助lang参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: SQL injection vulnerability exists in index.php for lex guestbook 4.0.2 and earlier. When magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands using the lang parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php并带有lang参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains /index.php and exist lang parameters's requests.

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含  /wp-trackback.php和QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY中是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if there are a /wp-trackback.php with a 'QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY' parameter including SQL statement (SELECT FROM) in the request line. When the rule matches, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似wp-trackback.php?xxx=SELECT FROM的uri的请求给过滤了

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/default.asp并带有id参数的请求给过滤了。

中文: 检测 The Address Book SQL注入攻击

中文: The Address Book 1.04e存在多个SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过在(a)user.php内的(1)lastname，(2)firstname，(3)passwordOld，(4)passwordNew，(5)id，(6)language，(7)defaultLetter，(8)newuserPass，(9)newuserType，(10)newuserEmail参数；在(b)search.php内的(11)goTo和(12)search参数；和在(c)save.php内的(13)groupAddName参数来执行任意SQL命令。

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/user.php并带有lastname参数的请求给过滤了。

中文: 检测 DMXReady Secure Login Manager SQL注入攻击
en-US: DMXReady Secure Login Manager SQL Injection Attempt -- set_preferences.asp UPDATE

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/set_preferences.asp且满足于 QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配SQL语句（UPDATE SET）则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /set_preferences.asp and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matching to SQL statement (UPDATE SET) are found in request line, it means rule matching. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Secure Login Manager中的set_preferences.asp存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以通过在输入数据中插入特定的SQL语句恶意操作数据库。
en-US: There are multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in set_preferences.asp in Secure Login Manager. A remote attacker can maliciously manipulate a database by inserting specific SQL statements in the input data.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含set_preferences.asp并带有关键字UPDATE和SET的请求给过滤了。
en-US: Suggest web server to filter uri contains set_preferences.asp and exist UPDATE and SET keywords's requests.

中文: 检测 DMXReady Secure Login Manager SQL注入攻击

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /login.asp并带有可SQL注入的参数sent则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /login.asp and a 'sent' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules matching. Block the request and set revelant parameter.

中文: Secure Login Manager中的login.asp存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以通过借助参数sent在输入数据中插入特定的SQL语句恶意操作数据库。
en-US: There are multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in login.asp in Secure Login Manager. A remote attacker can maliciously manipulate a database by inserting a specific SQL statement into the input data using the parameter sent.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/login.asp并带有sent参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /login.asp and the sent parameter in uri.

中文: Xoops 2.0.16版本中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助内核中的kernel/group.php里的id参数和Weblinks模块的class/table_broken.php中的lid参数以及其他未明参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Xoops 2.0.16 is prone to multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter in kernel/group.php in the kernel, the lid parameter in class/table_broken.php in the Weblinks module and other unknown parameters.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含print.php并带有id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain print.php and the id parameter in uri.

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/sendarticle.asp且满足于 QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配（UPDATE SET）则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /sendarticle.asp and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matching to （UPDATE SET）are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Superfreaker Studios UPublisher 1.0存在多个SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者可通过在(a)sendarticle.asp和(b)printarticle.asp的未明向量和传给(c)index.asp和(d)preferences.asp的ID参数来执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: Superfreaker Studios UPublisher 1.0 is prone to multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unknown vectors in (a)sendarticle.asp and (b)printarticle.asp and the ID parameter to (c)index.asp and (d)preferences.asp.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/sendarticle.asp并带有UPDATE SET关键字的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /sendarticle.asp and the keywords UPDATE SET in uri.

中文: 检测 Invision Gallery SQL注入攻击
en-US: Invision Gallery SQL Injection Attempt Detection

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/forum/modules/gallery/post.php并带有可SQL注入的参数img则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /forum/modules/gallery/post.php and a 'img' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules matching. Block the request and set revelant parameter.

中文: Invision Gallery 2.0.7中的forum/modules/gallery/post.php存在SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者可发起拒绝服务攻击并可能具有其他影响，如通过使用在index.php内的doaddcomment操作中的img参数内的"SELECT BENCHMARK"语句。
en-US: The forum/modules/gallery/post.php in Invision Gallery 2.0.7 is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial of service or possibly other impacts, such as by using the "SELECT BENCHMARK" statement in the img parameter in doaddcomment action in index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/forum/modules/gallery/post.php并带有img参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /forum/modules/gallery/post.php and the img parameter in uri.

en-US: If the /articles.asp and a 'ex' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules matching. Block the request and set revelant parameter.

中文: Expinion.net iNews (1) Publisher (iNP)(2)News Manager中的articles.asp存在SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者可通过ex参数来执行任意SQL命令。注意：早期报告此问题为XSS，但这是不对。初始报告是针对News Manager，但是有明显证明正确的产品是Publisher。

en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /articles.asp and the ex parameter in uri.

中文: 检测 Neocrome Land Down Under (LDU) SQL注入攻击

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/users.php并带有可SQL注入的参数id则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /users.php and a 'id' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules matching. Block the request and set revelant parameter.

中文: Neocrome Land Down Under (LDU)中的system/core/profile/profile.inc.php存在SQL注入漏洞，远程认证用户可以通过一个传给users.php的以有效文件名开始的url编码id参数来执行任意SQL命令，如通过在"default.gif"之后跟随一个双编码NULL和' (单引号)(%2500%2527)。
en-US: The system/core/profile/profile.inc.php in Neocrome Land Down Under (LDU) is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Remote authentication users can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary SQL commands via an url encoding id parameter that beginning with a valid filename to users.php, such as by following a double-encoded NULL and '(single quotes) after "default.gif"(%2500%2527).

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含users.php并带有id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain users.php and the id parameter in uri.

中文: dev4u CMS中的index.php存在多个SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过(1)seite_id，(2)gruppe_id.php和(3)go_target参数来执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: The index.php in dev4u CMS is prone to multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1)seite_id parameter, (2)gruppe_id and the (3)go_target parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含index.php并带有gruppe_id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain index.php and the gruppe_id parameter in uri.

中文: phpBB SQL注入尝试-- admin_hacks_list.php hack_id SELECT
en-US: phpBB SQL Injection Attempt -- admin_hacks_list.php hack_id SELECT

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有         /admin_hacks_list.php和hack_id变量的中是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET, if request line contains /admin_hacks_list.php and whether the 'hack_id' variable includs SQL statement(SELECT FROM). When the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文: Nivisec Hacks List的phpBB模块中的admin_hacks_list.php存在SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者可通过hack_id参数来执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: The admin_hacks_list.php in phpBB module in Nivisec Hacks List is prone to SQL injection vulnerability.  Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the hack_id parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似admin_hacks_list.php?hack_id=SELECT FROM的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain uri like admin_hacks_list.php?hack_id=SELECT FROM.

中文: 检测 Wallpaper Complete Website SQL注入攻击
en-US: Wallpaper Complete Website SQL Injection Attempt Detection

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/process.php并带有可SQL注入的参数login则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /process.php and a 'login' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: Wallpaper Website (Wallpaper Complete Website)存在多个SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过传给(a)process.php的(1)login或(2)password 参数或者传给(b)dlwallpaper.php的(3)wallpaperid参数来执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: Wallpaper Website (Wallpaper Complete Website) is prone to multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1)login or (2)password parameter to (a)process.php, or the (3)wallpaperid parameter to (b)dlwallpaper.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/process.php并带有login参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /process.php and the login parameter in uri.

中文: 检测 Evolve shopping cart SQL注入攻击
en-US: Evolve shopping cart SQL Injection Attempt Detection

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/products.asp并带有可SQL注入的参数partno则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /products.asp and a 'partno' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: ** 争议 ** Evolve shopping cart(又称Evolve Merchant)中的products.asp存在SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过partno参数来执行任意SQL命令。注: 厂商对此问题有争议，称这是一个强迫的SQL错误。
en-US: The products.asp in Evolve shopping cart(aka Evolve Merchant) is prone to SQL injection vulnerability.  Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the partno parameter. NOTE: The vendor is disputed on this issue, saying it is a forced SQL error.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/products.asp并带有partno参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /products.asp and the partno parameter in uri.

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/search.asp并带有可SQL注入的参数order则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the /search.asp and a 'order' parameter being vulnerable to SQL attack are found in the request line, it means rules mathcing. Block the request and set relevant parameters.

中文: vSpin.net Classified System 2004中存在多个SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过传给(a)cat.asp的(1)cat参数，或者传给(b)search.asp的(2)keyword，(3)order，(4)sort，(5)menuSelect或(6)state参数来执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: vSpin.net Classified System 2004 is prone to multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1)cat parameter to (a)cat.asp, or the (2)keyword, (3)order, (4)sort, (5)menuSelect, or (6)state parameter to (b)search.asp.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含search.asp并带有order参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain search.asp and the order parameter in uri.

中文: JMweb MP3 src Multiple 与本地文件捆绑
en-US: JMweb MP3 src Multiple Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /acopia/sat/ViewSatReport.do。 和是否包含带有目录遍历的参数src。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /acopia/sat/ViewSatReport.do . Whether there is a  'src ' parameter with directory travesal vulnerability. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in JMweb MP3 Music Audio search and download scripts allow remote attackers to include and execute arbitrary local files by using one of the src parameters for listen.php and download.php .. (dot dot).

中文: 建议web服务器把包含listen.php和download.php的src参数中的包含.. 的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain listen.php and download.php and the src parameter which with ...

中文: ScriptsEz Easy Image Downloader id 文件披露
en-US: ScriptsEz Easy Image Downloader id File Disclosure

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     main.php?action=download和是否包含带有目录遍历的参数id。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains main.php?action=download . Whether there is a  'id ' parameter with directory travesal vulnerability. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文:
Easy Image Downloader是ScriptsEz公司开发的图像下载工具。 
        Easy Image Downloader中的main.php存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助下载操作中的id参数中的".."(参数中包含'..')，读取任意文件。
en-US: Easy Image Downloader is an image download tool developed by ScriptsEz. The main.php in Easy Image Downloader is prone to Directory Traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to read arbitrary files via ".." within the id parameter in download action(the parameter contains '..').

中文: 建议web服务器把包含 main.php?action=download，&id参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain main.php?action=download and the &id parameter which with ../.

中文: Joomla DS-Syndicate部分 feed_id SQL注入尝试
en-US: Joomla DS-Syndicate Component feed_id SQL Injection

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含GET,/index2.php?option=ds-syndicate,version=1,并且feed_id是否包含SQL语句（UNION SELECT）
en-US: Check if the request line contains GET, /index2.php?option=ds-syndicate and version=1, and whether the feed_id includes SQL statements(UNION SELECT).

中文: Joomla DS-Syndicate(com_ds-syndicate)组件存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助到index2.php的feed_id参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Joomla DS-Syndicate(com_ds-syndicate) component is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the feed_id parameter to index2.php.

中文: 建议使用V1.1.0之后版本
en-US: It is recommended to use the version after V1.1.0.

中文: PassWiki site_id参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: PassWiki site_id Parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /passwiki.php和是否包含带有目录遍历的参数site_id。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /passwiki.php . Whether there is a  'site_id ' parameter including directory travesal.If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文: PassWiki 0.9.16 RC3及其早期版本的passwiki.php中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助site_id参数中的一个..,读取任意本地文件。
en-US: The passwiki.php in PassWiki 0.9.16 RC3 and earlier is prone to Directory Traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to read arbitrary local files via a .. in the site_id parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/passwiki.php，site_id参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /passwiki.php and the site_id parameter which with ../.

中文: WordPress Newsletter 插件newsletter参数 SQL注入
en-US: WordPress Newsletter Plugin newsletter Parameter SQL Injection

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有  newsletter中是否包含SQL语句（UNION SELECT）。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains newsletter including SQL statement(UNION SELECT). If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文: WordPress中的Newsletter插件中存在sql注入漏洞，攻击者可利用newsletter参数注入任意的sql指令
en-US: The Newsletter plugin in WordPress is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary sql commands via the newsletter parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似newsletter=UNION SELECT的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain uri like newsletter=UNION SELECT.

中文: Joomla Pro Desk部分包含文件
en-US: Joomla Pro Desk Component include_file Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含/index.php，GET,option=com_pro_desk,规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request line contains /index.php，GET and option=com_pro_deskmethod.When it is matched, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文: Joomla! Pro Desk Support Center (com_pro_desk)组件1.0版本和1.2版本中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助对index.php的include_file参数中的一个..，读取任意文件。
en-US: Joomla! Pro Desk Support Center (com_pro_desk) component 1.0 and 1.2 are prone to Directory Traversal Vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to read arbitrary files via a .. in the include_file parameter in index.php.

中文: 1.0版本和1.2版本中存在目录遍历漏洞，建议使用其他版本
en-US: Version 1.0 and 1.2 are prone to Directory Traversal Vulnerability. It is recommended that you should use others version.

中文: Way Of The Warrior crea.php plancia存在参数与远程文件捆绑
en-US: Way Of The Warrior crea.php plancia Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和  crea.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数plancia。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains crea.php . Whether there is a  'plancia ' parameter with remote file inclusion. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文:
Enthusiast是一个成员列表集中管理脚本。
        Indiscripts Enthusiast 3.1.4及早期版本中的show_joined.php 存在php远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过路径参数中的URL执行任意的php代码。
en-US: Enthusiast is a member list centralized management script. The show_joined.php in Indiscripts Enthusiast 3.1.4 and earlier is prone to php remote file inclusion vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary php code via URLs in the path parameter.

中文: 更新到3.1.5版本
en-US: Update to 3.1.5 version.

中文: Enthusiast path参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Enthusiast path parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /show_joined.php。 和是否包含带有目录遍历的参数path。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /show_joined.php . Whether there is a  'path ' parameter with directory travesal vulnerability. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文:
Enthusiast是一个成员列表集中管理脚本。
        Indiscripts Enthusiast 3.1.4及早期版本中的show_joined.php 存在php本地文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过路径参数中的URL执行任意的php代码。
en-US: Enthusiast is a member list centralized management script. The show_joined.php in Indiscripts Enthusiast 3.1.4 and earlier is prone to php local file inclusion vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary php code via URLs in the path parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/show_joined.php，path参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /show_joined.php and the path parameter which with ../.

en-US: Enthusiast path parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /show_joined.php。  是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数path。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /show_joined.php . Whether there is a  'path ' parameter with directory travesal vulnerability. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

en-US: Enthusiast is a member list centralized management script. The show_joined.php in Indiscripts Enthusiast 3.1.4 and earlier is prone to php remote file inclusion vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary php code via URLs in the path parameter.

中文: evision 内容管理系统 add3rdparty.php module参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: evision cms add3rdparty.php module parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /modules/3rdparty/adminpart/add3rdparty.php和是否包含带有目录遍历的参数module。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /modules/3rdparty/adminpart/add3rdparty.php . Whether there is a  'module ' parameter with directory travesal vulnerability. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文:
e-Vision CM是一款用PHP编写Mysql作为后台数据库的内容管理系统(CMS)。 
        Se-Vision CMS 2.0.2及之前版本存在多个目录遍历漏洞。当magic_quotes_gpc被禁用时，远程攻击者可以借助..序列，包含和运行任意的本地文件。该序列在(1)到admin/ind_ex.php的adminlang cookie或到modules/中(2)3rdparty/adminpart/add3rdparty.php,(3)polling/adminpart/addpolling.php,(4)contact/adminpart/addcontact.php,(5)brandnews/adminpart/addbrandnews.php,(6)newsletter/adminpart/addnewsletter.php,(7)game/adminpart/addgame.php,(8)tour/adminpart/addtour.php,(9)articles/adminpart/addarticles.php,(10) product/adminpart/addproduct.php, 或(11)plain/adminpart/addplain.php的模块参数中。
en-US: e-Vision CM is a Content Management System(CMS) writing Mysql as a backend database by PHP. Se-Vision CMS 2.0.2 and earlier is prone to multiple Directory Traversal Vulnerability. When magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, remote attackers can include and run arbitrary local files via the .. sequence. This sequence is in adminlang cookie to (1)admin/ind_ex.php, or the module parameter in (2)3rdparty/adminpart/add3rdparty.php, (3)polling/adminpart/addpolling.php, (4)contact/adminpart/addcontact.php, (5)brandnews/adminpart/addbrandnews.php,  (6)newsletter/adminpart/addnewsletter.php, (7)game/adminpart/addgame.php, (8)tour/adminpart/addtour.php, (9)articles/adminpart/addarticles.php, (10)product/adminpart/addproduct.php, or (11)plain/adminpart/addplain.php in modules/.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/modules/3rdparty/adminpart/add3rdparty.php，module参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /modules/3rdparty/adminpart/add3rdparty.php and the module parameter which with ../.

中文: evision 内容管理系统 addpolling.php module参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: evision cms addpolling.php module parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /modules/polling/adminpart/addpolling.php和是否包含带有目录遍历的参数module。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /modules/polling/adminpart/addpolling.php . Whether there is a  'module ' parameter with directory travesal vulnerability. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文:
e-Vision CM是一款用PHP编写Mysql作为后台数据库的内容管理系统(CMS)。 
        Se-Vision CMS 2.0.2及之前版本存在多个目录遍历漏洞。当magic_quotes_gpc被禁用时，远程攻击者可以借助..序列，包含和运行任意的本地文件。该序列在(1)到admin/ind_ex.php的adminlang cookie或到modules/中(2)3rdparty/adminpart/add3rdparty.php,(3)polling/adminpart/addpolling.php,(4)contact/adminpart/addcontact.php,(5)brandnews/adminpart/addbrandnews.php,(6)newsletter/adminpart/addnewsletter.php,(7)game/adminpart/addgame.php,(8)tour/adminpart/addtour.php,(9)articles/adminpart/addarticles.php,(10) product/adminpart/addproduct.php, 或(11)plain/adminpart/addplain.php的模块参数中。
en-US: e-Vision CM is a Content Management System(CMS) writing Mysql as a backend database by PHP. Se-Vision CMS 2.0.2 and earlier is prone to multiple Directory Traversal Vulnerability. When magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, remote attackers can include and run arbitrary local files via the .. sequence. This sequence is in adminlang cookie to (1)admin/ind_ex.php, or the module parameter in (2)3rdparty/adminpart/add3rdparty.php, (3)polling/adminpart/addpolling.php, (4)contact/adminpart/addcontact.php, (5)brandnews/adminpart/addbrandnews.php,  (6)newsletter/adminpart/addnewsletter.php, (7)game/adminpart/addgame.php, (8)tour/adminpart/addtour.php, (9)articles/adminpart/addarticles.php, (10)product/adminpart/addproduct.php, or (11)plain/adminpart/addplain.php in modules/.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/modules/articles/adminpart/addarticles.php，module参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /modules/articles/adminpart/addarticles.php and the module parameter which with ../.

中文: evision 内容管理系统 addarticles.php module参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: evision cms addarticles.php module parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /modules/articles/adminpart/addarticles.php和是否包含带有目录遍历的参数module。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /modules/articles/adminpart/addarticles.php . Whether there is a  'module ' parameter with directory travesal vulnerability. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文: phpFan 3.3.4版本的includes/init.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助includepath参数的一个URL,执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: The includes/init.php in phpFan 3.3.4 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL for the includepath parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/includes/init.php且includepath参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /includes/init.php and contain the includepath parameter.

中文: phpFan init.php存在参数与远程文件捆绑
en-US: phpFan init.php Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有          /includes/init.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数includepath。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /includes/init.php . Whether there is a  'includepath ' parameter with remote file inclusion. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文:
Free Directory Script是一个基于PHP开发的功能丰富的免费目录脚本。 
        Free Directory Script 1.1.1版本的init.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞,当register_globals被激活时,远程攻击者可以借助API_HOME_DIR参数中的一个URL,执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: Free Directory Script is a feature-rich free directory script developed on PHP. The init.php in Free Directory Script 1.1.1 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. When register_globals is activated, remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the API_HOME_DIR parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/init.php，API_HOME_DIR参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /init.php and the API_HOME_DIR parameter which with ../.

中文: Free Directory脚本1.1.1 API_HOME_DIR 与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Free Directory Script 1.1.1 API_HOME_DIR Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /init.php。 和是否包含带有目录遍历的参数API_HOME_DIR。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /init.php . Whether there is a  'API_HOME_DIR ' parameter with directory travesal vulnerability. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文:
PunBB Private Messaging System (PMS)是轻量论坛程序PunBB的一个个人消息组件。 
        Private Messaging System (PMS) 1.2.3版本及其早期版本中存在多个目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助对(1)functions_navlinks.php,(2)header_new_messages.php,(3)profile_send.php,以及(4)include/pms/中的viewtopic_PM-link.php的pun_user[language]参数中的一个..,包含和运行任意文件
en-US: PunBB Private Messaging System (PMS) is a  personal message component for the light forum program PunBB. Private Messaging System (PMS) 1.2.3 and earlier is prone to multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can include and run arbitrary files via a .. in the pun_user[language] parameter in (1)functions_navlinks.php, (2)header_new_messages.php, (3)profile_send.php and (4)viewtopic_PM-link.php in include/pms/.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含functions_navlinks.php，pun_user[language]参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain functions_navlinks.php and the pun_user[language] parameter which with ../.

中文: PunBB Functions_navlinks.php pun_user language参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: PunBB Functions_navlinks.php pun_user language Parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     functions_navlinks.php和和是否包含带有目录遍历的参数pun_user[language]。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains functions_navlinks.php . Whether there is a  'pun_user[language] ' parameter with directory travesal vulnerability. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文:
MODx 是一个开源的 PHP 应用框架，可以帮助使用者控制自己的网上内容。它是开发人员和高级用户理想的控制系统，任何人都可以使用 MODx 发布、更新、维护动态网站，或 html 静态页面的网站内容。 
        MODx CMS 0.9.6.2及之前版本中的assets/snippets/reflect/snippet.reflect.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。当magic_quotes_gpc被中止时，远程攻击者可以借助reflect_base参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: MODx is an open source PP application framework, it can help users to control their own online content. It is an ideal control system for developers and advanced users, anyone can use MODx to publish, update and maintain the website content for dynamic websites or html static pages. The assets/snippets/reflect/snippet.reflect.php in MODx CMS 0.9.6.2 and earlier is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. When  magic_quotes_gpc is aborted, remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the reflect_base parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/snippet.reflect.php，reflect_base参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /snippet.reflect.php and the reflect_base parameter which with ../.

中文: MODx CMS snippet.reflect.php reflect_base存在参数与远程文件捆绑
en-US: MODx CMS snippet.reflect.php reflect_base Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /snippet.reflect.php。 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数reflect_base。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /snippet.reflect.php . Whether there is a  'reflect_base ' parameter with remote file inclusion. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /lib/action/rss.php and the lib parameter.

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有           /lib/action/rss.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数lib。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数

中文: ModernBill存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助到include/scripts/中的(1)export_batch.inc.php,(2)run_auto_suspend.cron.php和(3)send_email_cache.php；以及(4)include/misc/mod_2checkout/2checkout_return.inc.php和(5)include/html/nettools.popup.php的DIR参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。此漏洞不同于CVE-2006-4034和CVE-2005-1054。
en-US: ModernBill is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via (1)export_batch.inc.php, (2)run_auto_suspend.cron.php and (3)send_email_cache.php to include/scripts/; and a URL in the DIR parameter in (4)include/misc/mod_2checkout/2checkout_return.inc.php and (4)include/misc/mod_2checkout/2checkout_return.inc.php. These vulnerabilities are different from CVE-2006-4034 and CVE-2005-1054.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/export_batch.inc.php，DIR参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /export_batch.inc.php and the DIR parameter which with ../.

en-US: ModernBill export_batch.inc.php DIR Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /export_batch.inc.php。 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数DIR。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /export_batch.inc.php . Whether there is a  'DIR ' parameter with remote file inclusion. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文: phpAddEdit 1.3版本的addedit-render.php中存在目录遍历漏洞,当magic_quotes_gpc被中止时,远程攻击者可以借助editform参数中的一个URL，包含和运行任意本地文件。注意: PHP远程文件包含攻击也可能发生。
en-US: The addedit-render.php in phpAddEdit 1.3 is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. When magic_quotes_gpc is aborted, remote attackers can include and run arbitrary local file via a URL in the editform parameter. NOTE: Possibly cause PHP remote file inclusion attack.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/addedit-render.php，editform参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /addedit-render.php and the editform parameter which with ../.

中文: phpAddEdit editform参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: phpAddEdit editform parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /addedit-render.php和和是否包含带有目录遍历的参数editform。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /addedit-render.php . Whether there is a  'editform ' parameter with remote file inclusion. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

PHP Remote File Inclusion Vulnerability exists in slogin_lib.inc.php in the 1.0.6 version of Simple Text-File Login Script (SiTeFiLo). Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code with the help of a URL in the slogin_path parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问slogin_lib.inc.php且存在slogin_path参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting slogin_lib.inc.php and contain the slogin_path parameter.

中文: Simple Text-File Login脚本slogin_path 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Simple Text-File Login script slogin_path parameter remote file inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有           /slogin_lib.inc.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数slogin_path。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /slogin_lib.inc.php . Whether there is a  'slogin_path ' parameter with remote file inclusion. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文: Wordpress 的Page Flip Image Gallery插件的books/getConfig.php文件中没有正确地过滤用户所提供的book_id参数，远程攻击者可以通过提交恶意请求执行目录遍历攻击，读取任意系统文件。成功攻击要求打开了magic_quotes_gpc。
en-US: The books/getConfig.php in Page Flip Image Gallery plugin in Wordpress has not properly sanitized the book_id parameter supplied by the user. Remote attackers can execute directory traversal attack and read arbitrary system files via submitting a malicious request. A successful attack requires opening magic_quotes_gpc.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似/books/getConfig.php?book_id=../的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain uri like /books/getConfig.php?book_id=../.

中文: Wordpress插件Page Flip Image Gallery getConfig.php book_id参数远程文件披露
en-US: Wordpress Plugin Page Flip Image Gallery getConfig.php book_id parameter Remote File Disclosure

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /books/getConfig.php。QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY中是否包含book_id=变量中包含(../){1,}。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /books/getConfig.php . Whether the 'QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY' variable includes '../'. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文:
Text Lines Rearrange Script是一个文本行重新排列脚本，该脚本允许你重新排列文本文件中的行，可以选择删除重复的行并实现从A到Z或从Z到A排序。 
        1.0版本的download.php中存在目录遍历漏洞,当register_globals被激活时,远程攻击者可以借助文件名参数中的目录遍历序列，读取任意本地文件。
en-US: Text Lines Rearrange Script is a text line rearrange script that allows you to rearrange lines in a text file and you can choose to delete the duplicate lines and sort from A to Z or from Z to A. The download.php in Text Lines Rearrange Script 1.0 is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. When register_globals is activated, remote attackers can read arbitrary files via the directory traversal sequence in the filename parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/download.php，filename参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /download.php and the filename parameter which with ../.

中文: Text Lines Rearrange脚本filename参数披露文件
en-US: Text Lines Rearrange Script filename parameter File Disclosure

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /download.php和是否包含带有目录遍历的参数filename。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /download.php . Whether there is a  'filename ' parameter with remote file inclusion. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文: PHPOF 20040226版本及其早期版本的db模数s/DB_adodb.class.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助PHPOF_INCLUDE_PATH参数中的一个URL执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: The db modulo s/DB_adodb.class.php in PHPOF 20040226 and earlier is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the PHPOF_INCLUDE_PATH parameter.

en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /DB_adodb.class.php . Whether there is a  'PHPOF_INCLUDE_PATH ' parameter with remote file inclusion. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文: PNphpBB2 1.2i版本及其早期版本中存在多个目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助对(1)admin_words.php,(2)admin_groups_reapir.php, (3)admin_smilies.php,(4)admin_ranks.php,(5)admin_styles.php,和(6)admin/中的admin_users.php的ModName参数中的一个..，包含和运行任意本地文件

en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /admin/admin_words.php . Whether the 'ModName' variable includes '../'. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文:
Anton Raharja PlaySMS是SMS网关应用处理用于处理单个或广播SMS消息。
        playSMS 0.9.3版本中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助
        (1)对plugin/gateway/gnokii/init.php的apps_path[plug]参数
        (2)对plugin/themes/default/init.php的apps_path[themes]参数
        (3)对lib/function.php的apps_path[libs]参数中的一个URL
        执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: Anton Raharja PlaySMS is an SMS gateway application process that designed to handle single or broadcast SMS messages. playSMS 0.9.3 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via (1)the apps_path[plug] parameter to plugin/gateway/gnokii/init.php, (2)the apps_path[themes] to plugin/themes/default/init.php, (3)a URL in the apps_path[libs] parameter to lib/function.php的apps_path[libs].

中文: 建议web服务器把包含 /plugin/gateway/gnokii/init.php，apps_path[plug]参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /plugin/gateway/gnokii/init.php and the apps_path[plug] parameter which with ../.

中文: playSMS init.php apps_path plug参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: playSMS init.php apps_path plug parameter local file inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /plugin/gateway/gnokii/init.php和apps_path[plug]变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /plugin/gateway/gnokii/init.php . Whether the 'apps_path[plug]' variable includes '../'. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /lib/function.php . Whether the 'apps_path[libs]' variable includes '../'. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文:
BoonEx Dolphin 是一款社交构建平台软件。 
        BoonEx Dolphin 6.1.2存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。在register_globals被中止时, 远程攻击者通过(1)对 (a) HTMLSax3.php 和 (b) plugins/safehtml/的safehtml.php的 dir[plugins] 参数 以及 (2) 对 (c) ray/modules/global/inc/content.inc.php的sIncPath parameter的一个URL来执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: BoonEx Dolphin is a social building platform software. BoonEx Dolphin 6.1.2 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. When register_globals is aborted, remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in (1)the dir[plugins] parameter to (a)HTMLSax3.php and (b)safehtml.php in plugins/safehtml/ and (2)the sIncPath parameter to (c)ray/modules/global/inc/content.inc.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/header.php，theme_directory参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /header.php and the theme_directory parameter which with../.

中文: Acute Control Panel header.php theme_directory 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Acute Control Panel header.php theme_directory parameter remote file inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有    /header.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数theme_directory。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /header.php. Whether there is a  'theme_directory' parameter with remote file inclusion. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文: Acute Control Panel 1.0.0版本存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助对themes/中的(1)container.php和(2)header.php的theme_directory参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: Acute Control Panel 1.0.0 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the theme_directory parameter to (1)container.php and (2)header.php in themes/.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/header.php，theme_directory参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /header.php and the theme_directory parameter which with../.

中文: Acute Control Panel header.php theme_directory参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Acute Control Panel header.php theme_directory parameter local file inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /header.php。 theme_directory参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /header.php. Whether the 'theme_directory' variable includes '../'. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文: Interact Learning Community Environment Interact 2.4.1版本存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。当register_globals被激活时，远程攻击者可以借助到modules/forum/embedforum.php的CONFIG[LANGUAGE_CPATH]参数和到modules/scorm/lib.inc.php的CONFIG[BASE_PATH]参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: Interact Learning Community Environment Interact 2.4.1 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. When register_globals is activated, remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the CONFIG[LANGUAGE_CPATH] parameter to modules/forum/embedforum.php and the CONFIG[BASE_PATH] parameter to modules/scorm/lib.inc.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/embedforum.php，CONFIG[LANGUAGE_CPATH]/参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /embedforum.php and the CONFIG[LANGUAGE_CPATH]/ parameter which with../.

中文: Interact embedforum.php存在参数与远程文件捆绑
en-US: Interact embedforum.php Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /embedforum.php。 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数CONFIG[LANGUAGE_CPATH]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /embedforum.php. Whether there is a  'CONFIG[LANGUAGE_CPATH]' parameter with remote file inclusion. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文: Joomla Dada Mail Manager部分 config.dadamail.php GLOBALS参数远程文件捆绑
en-US: Joomla Dada Mail Manager Component config.dadamail.php GLOBALS Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有  /config.dadamail.php。 GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path] 参数的值是否包含GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path]=(ftps?|https?|php):/。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数

YouTube Blog是包含有有关YouTube新闻及社区内容的网络博客。 
        cuenta/cuerpo.php文件中没有正确地验证对base_archivo参数的输入便用于包含文件，允许远程攻击者包含本地或外部资源的任意文件。成功利用这个漏洞要求打开了register_globals。
en-US: YouTube Blog is a weblog contains information about YouTube news and community content. The cuenta/cuerpo.php file used to include files without adequately validate the input to the base_archivo parameter. Allow remote attackers to include arbitrary files of local or external resources. Successful attack is required open register_globals.

en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /com_ongumatimesheet20/lib/onguma.class.php. Whether the 'GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path]' parameter includes 'GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path]=(ftps?|https?|php):/'. Blogplus 1.0版本存在多个目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助到includes/block_center_down.php的(1)row_mysql_blocks_center_down[file]参数、到block_center_top.php的(2)row_mysql_blocks_center_top[file] includes/参数、到includes/block_left.php的(3)row_mysql_blocks_left[file]参数、到includes/block_right.php的(4)row_mysql_blocks_right[file]参数以及到(5)includes/window_down.php和

Remote attackers can include and run arbitrary local files via (1)the row_mysql_blocks_center_down[file] parameter to includes/block_center_down.php, (2)the row_mysql_blocks_center_top[file] includes/ to block_center_top.php, (3)the row_mysql_blocks_left[file] parameter to includes/block_left.php, (4)the row_mysql_blocks_right[file] parameter to includes/block_right.php, (5)the row_mysql_bloginfo[theme] parameter to includes/window_down.php and (6)includes/window_top.php(parameter value is set to '..').

en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /block_center_down.php and the row_mysql_blocks_center_down[file] parameter which with ../.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/block_left.php，row_mysql_blocks_left[file]参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /block_left.php and the row_mysql_blocks_left[file] parameter which with ../.

中文: Blogplus block_center_top.php 与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Blogplus block_center_top.php Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /block_center_top.php。 row_mysql_blocks_center_top[file]参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /block_center_top.php. Whether the 'row_mysql_blocks_center_top[file]' parameter includes '../'. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

en-US: The modules/threadstop/threadstop.php in ExBB Italia 0.22 and earlier is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. When register_globals is enabled and magic_quotes_gpc setting is disabled, remote attackers can attack and run arbitrary local files via the fuzzy query in the exbb[default_lang] parameter.

en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /stage4.php and GLOBALS[preloc] parameter which with ../.

中文: Orlando 内容管理系统 stage1.php GLOBALS参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Orlando CMS stage1.php GLOBALS Parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /stage1.php和GLOBALS[preloc]变量中包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /stage1.php. Whether the 'GLOBALS[preloc]' variable includes '../'. If the rules match, the request will be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

XenCenterWeb's multiple modules do not properly validate user-supplied input, and remote attackers can execute cross-site scripting by submitting malicious requests to the server. 中文:
quickteam是一款功能强大的网站成员管理系统。 
        Qt quickteam 2中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1)对qte_web.php的qte_web_path参数和(2)对bin/qte_init.php的qte_root参数中的一个URL，执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: quickteam is a powerful website membership management system. Qt quickteam 2 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in (1)the qte_web_path parameter to qte_web.php and (2)the qte_root parameter to bin/qte_init.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/qte_web.php，qte_web_path参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /qte_web.php and the qte_web_path parameter which with ../.

中文: Flatchat pmscript.php with参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Flatchat pmscript.php with Parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /pmscript.php。 with参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /pmscript.php. Whether the 'with' parameter includes '../'. If the rules match, the request be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文:
Joomla!是一套采用PHP+MySQL数据库开发，可跨平台运行的内容管理系统。
        Joomla! Clickheat - Heatmap stats(com_clickheat)组件1.0.1版本中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助对Recly/Clickheat/中的(a)install.clickheat.php,(b)Cache.php和(c)Clickheat_Heatmap.php的GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path]参数和对includes/heatmap中的(e)_main.php和(f)main.php以及(g)includes/overview/main.php的mosConfig_absolute_path参数中的一个URL，来执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: Joomla! is a cross-platform content management system that using PHP + MySQL database development. Joomla! Clickheat - Heatmap stats(com_clickheat) component 1.0.1 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path] parameter to (a)install.clickheat.php, (b)Cache.php, and (c)Clickheat_Heatmap.php in Recly/Clickheat/ and the mosConfig_absolute_path parameter to (e)_main.php, (f)main.php, and (g)includes/overview/main.php in includes/heatmap.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/install.clickheat.php，GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path]参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /install.clickheat.php and the GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path] parameter which with ../.

中文: QuickTeam qte_web.php qte_web_path参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: QuickTeam qte_web.php qte_web_path Parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /qte_web.php和qte_web_path 变量中包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request method is GET and if the request line contains /qte_web.php. Whether the 'qte_web_path' variable includes '../'. If the rules match, the request be blocked and relevant parameters will be set.

中文: Clickheat install.clickheat.php mosConfig_absolute_path存在参数与远程文件捆绑
en-US: Clickheat install.clickheat.php mosConfig_absolute_path Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /install.clickheat.php。  是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数

中文: Linux Web Shop (LWS) php User Base 1.3beta版本的include/unverified.inc.php中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助模块参数，包括和执行任意本地文件。
en-US: The include/unverified.inc.php in Linux Web Shop (LWS) php User Base 1.3beta is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can include and execute arbitrary local files via the module parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/include/unverified.inc.php，template参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /include/unverified.inc.php and the template parameter which with ../.

中文: Cyberfolio 7.12.2版本及其早期版本的portfolio/css.php中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助主体参数中的一个..，包含和运行任意本地文件。
en-US: The portfolio/css.php in Cyberfolio 7.12.2 and earlier is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can include and run arbitrary local files via a .. in the body parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/portfolio/css.php，theme参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /portfolio/css.php and the theme parameter which with ../.

en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /include/unverified.inc.php, and if the variable "template" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.
The PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability exists in the RSS-aggregator display.php and remote attackers execute arbitrary PHP code through a URL in the path parameter

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/display.php且存在path参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /display.php and contain the path parameter.

en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /portfolio/css.php, and if the variable "theme" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
TinyButStrong是一个库，可以动态地创建XML / HTML页面和任何其他基于文本的文件。 
        inyButStrong 3.4.0版本的examples/tbs_us_examples_0view.php中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助脚本参数中的一个..，读取任意文件。
en-US: TinyButStrong is a library that can dynamically create XML/HTML pages and any text-based file. The examples/tbs_us_examples_0view.php in TinyButStrong 3.4.0 is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can read arbitrary files via a .. in the script parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/examples/tbs_us_examples_0view.php，script参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /examples/tbs_us_examples_0view.php and the script parameter which with ../.

en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /display.php, and if the parameter "path" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: The arch.php in beLive 0.2.3 is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can read arbitrary files via a .. in the arch parameter.

en-US: The footer.php in PHP-Crawler 0.8 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in footer_file.

en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /footer.php and the footer_file parameter which with ../.
