中文: Joomla! Artetics.com Art Portal(com_artportal)组件1.0中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以提交portalid参数到index.php，来执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Joomla! Artetics.com Art Portal(com_artportal) component 1.0 is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute SQL commands via the portalid parameter to index.php.

中文: 建议使用（com_artportal）组件1.0之后版本
en-US: It is recommended to use (com_artportal) component after 1.0 version.

中文: PHP Crawler footer.php footer_file 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: PHP Crawler footer.php footer_file Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /footer.php。  是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数footer_file。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /footer.php, and if the parameter "footer_file" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla! Artetics.com Art Portal(com_artportal)组件1.1中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以提交portalid参数到index.php，来执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Joomla! Artetics.com Art Portal(com_artportal) component 1.1 is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute SQL commands via the portalid parameter to index.php.

中文: 建议使用（com_artportal）组件1.0之后版本
en-US: It is recommended to use (com_artportal) component after 1.0 version.

中文: Joomla portalid部分 UNION SELECT SQL注入
en-US: Joomla portalid Component UNION SELECT SQL Injection

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含/index.php，GET,option=com_artportal&portalid中是否包含UNION SELETE,规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains /index.php and GET, and if option=com_artportal&portalid contains UNION SELETE. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla! Artetics.com Art Portal(com_artportal)组件1.2中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以提交portalid参数到index.php，来执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: Joomla! Artetics.com Art Portal(com_artportal) component 1.2 is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute SQL commands via the portalid parameter to index.php.

中文: 建议使用（com_artportal）组件1.0之后版本
en-US: It is recommended to use (com_artportal) component after 1.0 version.

中文: Joomla portalid部分 SELECT FROM SQL注入
en-US: Joomla portalid Component SELECT FROM SQL Injection

中文: 检测请求行是否包含/index.php还有option=com_artportal&portalid 中是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果是，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains /index.php, and if option=com_artportal&portalid contains SQL statement (SELECT FROM). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: WB News 2.0.1版本中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。当register_globals被激活时，远程攻击者可以借助对base/中的search.php的config[installdir]参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码
en-US: WB News 2.0.1 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. When register_globals is activated, remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the config[installdir] parameter to search.php in base/.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/search.php且存在config[installdir]参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /search.php and contain the config[installdir] parameter.

中文: Joomla portalid部分 DELETE FROM SQL注入
en-US: Joomla portalid Component DELETE FROM SQL Injection

中文: 检测请求行是否包含/index.php还有option=com_artportal&portalid 中是否包含SQL语句(DELETE FROM)。如果是，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains /index.php, and if option=com_artportal&portalid contains SQL statement (DELETE FROM). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities exist in WB News 2.0.1. When register_globals is activated, a remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code with a URL to the config [installdir] parameter in base / archive.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/archive.php且存在config[installdir]参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /archive.php and contain the config[installdir] parameter.

中文: WB News search.php config 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: WB News search.php config Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和 /search.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数config[installdir]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /search.php, and if the parameter "config[installdir]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities exist in WB News 2.0.1. When register_globals is activated, remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code with the help of a URL to the config [installdir] parameter in Archive.php in base /.

en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /base/Archive.php and contain the config[installdir] parameter.

Activities / workflow-activities.php in XRMS CRM version 1.99.2 There is a PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code with the include_directory parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/activities/workflow-activities.php且存在include_directory参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /activities/workflow-activities.php and contain the include_directory parameter.

en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /includes/header.inc.php, and if the parameter "root" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: cpCommerce 1.2.x版本以及可能包含的1.2.9版本中的_functions.php发送一个当它被直接调用时并不存在的重定向，这会允许远程攻击者可以借助GLOBALS[prefix]参数，绕过一个保护机制并执行远程文件包含和目录遍历攻击，同时执行人以PHP代码或读取任意文件。
en-US: The _functions.php in cpCommerce 1.2.x and possibly contains 1.2.9 version sends a redirect that does not exist when it is called directly, which allows remote attackers bypass a protection mechanism and perform remote file inclusion and directory traversal attacks while executing arbitrary PHP code or reading arbitrary files.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/_functions.php且存在GLOBALS[prefix]参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /_functions.php and contain the GLOBALS[prefix] parameter.

中文: PHPauction GPL settings.inc.php include_path 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: PHPauction GPL settings.inc.php include_path Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有        /includes/settings.inc.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数include_path。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /includes/settings.inc.php, and if the parameter "include_path" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: cpCommerce 1.2.x版本以及可能包含的1.2.9版本中的_functions.php发送一个当它被直接调用时并不存在的重定向，这会允许远程攻击者可以借助GLOBALS[prefix]参数，绕过一个保护机制并执行远程文件包含和目录遍历攻击，同时执行人以PHP代码或读取任意文件。
en-US: The _functions.php in cpCommerce 1.2.x and possibly contains 1.2.9 version sends a redirect that does not exist when it is called directly, which allows remote attackers bypass a protection mechanism and perform remote file inclusion and directory traversal attacks while executing arbitrary PHP code or reading arbitrary files.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/_functions.php，GLOBALS[prefix] 参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /_functions.php and the GLOBALS[prefix] parameter which with ../.

中文: cpCommerce _functions.php GLOBALS 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: cpCommerce _functions.php GLOBALS Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和      /_functions.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数GLOBALS[prefix]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /_functions.php, and if the parameter "GLOBALS[prefix]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: DokuWiki 2009-02-14,rc2009-02-06以及rc2009-01-30的inc/init.php,当register_globals被激活时,远程攻击者可以借助对doku.php的config_cascade[main][default][]参数，包含和允许执行任意本地文件。注意：PHP远程文件包含漏洞可能会出现在运行ftp:// URLs的PHP5中。
en-US: The inc/init.php in DokuWiki 2009-02-14, rc2009-02-06 and rc2009-01-30, when register_globals is activated, remote attackers can include and execute arbitrary local files via the config_cascade[main][default][] parameter to doku.php. NOTE: PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability may appear in PHP5 running ftp:// URLs.

中文: 更新到20140929后的版本
en-US: Update to the version after 20140929.

中文: cpCommerce _functions.php GLOBALS参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: cpCommerce _functions.php GLOBALS Parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /_functions.php和GLOBALS[prefix]变量中包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /_functions.php, and if the variable "GLOBALS[prefix]" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla! Ecom Solutions VirtueMart Google Base (又称com_googlebase或Froogle)组件1.1版本的admin.googlebase.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助mosConfig_absolute_path参数中的一个URL，执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: The admin.googlebase.php Joomla! Ecom Solutions VirtueMart Google Base(aka com_googlebase or Froogle) component 1.1 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the mosConfig_absolute_path parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/admin.googlebase.php且存在mosConfig_absolute_path参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /admin.googlebase.php and contain the mosConfig_absolute_path parameter.

中文: Dokuwiki doku.php config_cascade 与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Dokuwiki doku.php config_cascade Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /block_center_top.php。 row_mysql_blocks_center_top[file]参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /block_center_top.php, and if the parameter "row_mysql_blocks_center_top[file]" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomlub (com_joomlub)组件中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助一个对index.php的拍卖编辑操作中的aid参数，执行任意SQL指令。

It is recommended that the web server filter requests that contain index.php, aid parameters with malicious characters

en-US: VirtueMart Google Base Component admin.googlebase.php Remote File Inclusion

en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /admin.googlebase.php, and if the parameter "mosConfig_absolute_path" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: MaxCMS 3.11.20b版本中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞,当register_globals被激活时,远程攻击者借助(1)对includes/InstantSite/inc.is_root.php的is_projectPath参数;对(2)classes/class.Tree.php,(3)includes/inc.thcms_admin_mediamanager.php,和(4)modul/mod.rssreader.php的GLOBALS[thCMS_root]参数;对(5)class.tasklist.php,(6)class.thcms.php,(7)class.thcms_content.php,(8)class.thcms_modul_parent.php,(9) class.thcms_page.php,和(10)classes/中的class.thcsm_user.php的is_path参数;和(11)includes/InstantSite/class.Tree.php;以及对(12)classes/class.thcms_modul.php;(13)inc.page_edit_tasklist.php,(14)inc.thcms_admin_overview_backup.php,和(15)inc.thcms_edit_content.php in includes/的thCMS_root参数;以及(16)class.thcms_modul_parent_xml.php,(17)mod.cmstranslator.php,(18)mod.download.php,(19)mod.faq.php,(20)mod.guestbook.php,(21)mod.html.php,(22)mod.menu.php,(23)mod.news.php,(24)mod.newsticker.php,(25)mod.rss.php,(26)mod.search.php,(27)mod.sendtofriend.php,(28)mod.sitemap.php,(29)mod.tagdoc.php,(30)mod.template.php,(31)mod.test.php,(32)mod.text.php,(33)mod.upload.php,和(34)modul/中的mod.users.php以上中的一个URL，执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: MaxCMS 3.11.20b is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. When register_globals is activated, remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the is_projectPath parameter to (1)includes/InstantSite/inc.is_root.php; the GLOBALS[thCMS_root] parameter to (2)classes/class.Tree.php, (3)includes/inc.thcms_admin_mediamanager.php, and (4)modul/mod.rssreader.php; the is_path parameter to (5)class.tasklist.php, (6)class.thcms.php, (7)class.thcms_content.php, (8)class.thcms_modul_parent.php, (9) class.thcms_page.php, and (10)class.thcsm_user.php in classes/; and the thCMS_root parameter to (11)includes/InstantSite/class.Tree.php; and (12)classes/class.thcms_modul.php; (13)inc.page_edit_tasklist.php, (14)inc.thcms_admin_overview_backup.php, (15)inc.thcms_edit_content.php in includes/; and (16)class.thcms_modul_parent_xml.php, (17)mod.cmstranslator.php, (18)mod.download.php, (19)mod.faq.php, (20)mod.guestbook.php, (21)mod.html.php, (22)mod.menu.php, (23)mod.news.php, (24)mod.newsticker.php, (25)mod.rss.php, (26)mod.search.php, (27)mod.sendtofriend.php, (28)mod.sitemap.php, (29)mod.tagdoc.php, (30)mod.template.php, (31)mod.test.php, (32)mod.text.php, (33)mod.upload.php, and (34)mod.users.php in modul/.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/includes/InstantSite/inc.is_root.php?is_projectPath=http|3a|的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /includes/InstantSite/inc.is_root.php?is_projectPath=http|3a|.

中文: Possible Joomla Com_joomlub部分 Union Select SQL注入
en-US: Possible Joomla Com_joomlub Component Union Select SQL Injection

中文: 检测请求行是否包含/index.php还有 option=com_joomlub&controller=auction&view=auction&task=edit&aid参数中是否带有SQL语句(UNION SELECT)。如果是，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains /index.php, and if the parameter "option=com_joomlub&controller=auction&view=auction&task=edit&aid" contains SQL statement (UNION SELECT). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Pragyan CMS是一个支持多用户的内容管理系统。Pragyan CMS 2.6.2的cms/modules/form.lib.php中存在PHP 远程文件包含漏洞。在register_globals被激活时, 远程攻击者通过(1) sourceFolder 或 (2) moduleFolder 参数中的一个URL来执行任意PHP代码
en-US: Pragyan CMS is a multi-user content management system. The cms/modules/form.lib.php in Pragyan CMS 2.6.2 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. When register_globals activated, remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the (1) sourceFolder or (2) moduleFolder parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/cms/modules/form.lib.php且存在sourceFolder参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /cms/modules/form.lib.php and contain the sourceFolder parameter.

中文: MAXcms存在远程文件捆绑尝试 (4)
en-US: MAXcms RFI attempt (4)

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含     /modul/mod.users.php?thCMS_root=http|3a|。 如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains /modul/mod.users.php?thCMS_root=http|3a|. If the rule is matched, the request would be blocked and relevant parameter would be set.

中文: AdaptBB 1.0版本的latestposts.php中存在PHP远处文件包含漏洞,当register_globals被激活时,远程攻击者可以借助forumspath参数中的一个URL，执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: The latestposts.php in AdaptBB 1.0 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. When register_globals is activated, Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the forumspath parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/latestposts.php，forumspath参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /latestposts.php and the forumspath parameter which with ../.

中文: Pragyan CMS form.lib.php sourceFolder 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Pragyan CMS form.lib.php sourceFolder Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含GET          /cms/modules/form.lib.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数sourceFolder。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /cms/modules/form.lib.php, and if the parameter "sourceFolder" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: AdaptBB 1.0版本的latestposts.php中存在PHP远处文件包含漏洞,当register_globals被激活时,远程攻击者可以借助forumspath参数中的一个URL，执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: The latestposts.php in AdaptBB 1.0 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. When register_globals is activated, Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the forumspath parameter.

中文: 更新到3.0.2版本
en-US: Update to version 3.0.2.

中文: AdaptBB latestposts.php forumspath 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: AdaptBB latestposts.php forumspath Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有    /latestposts.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数forumspath。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /latestposts.php, and if the parameter "forumspath" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: 未分类的NewsBoard (UNB) 1.6.4版本的forum.php中存在多个目录遍历漏洞,当register_globals被激活以及magic_quotes_gpc被中止时,远程攻击者(1)可以借助GLOBALS[filename]参数中的一个..(参数中包含'..')，读取任意近期修改的文件或(2)可以借助GLOBALS[UTE][__tplCollection][a][file]参数中的一个..(参数中包含'..')，包括和运行任意本地文件。
en-US: The forum.php in unclassified NewsBoard (UNB) 1.6.4 is prone to multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities. When register_globals is activated and magic_quotes_gpc is aborted, remote attackers can read any recently modified file via a ..(parameter contains ..) in the GLOBALS[filename] parameter or include and run arbitrary local files via a ..(parameter contains ..) in the GLOBALS[UTE][__tplCollection][a][file] parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/forum.php，GLOBALS[UTE][__tplCollection][a][file] 参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /forum.php and the GLOBALS[UTE][__tplCollection][a][file] parameter which with ../.

中文: AdaptBB latestposts.php forumspath参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: AdaptBB latestposts.php forumspath Parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /latestposts.php。 forumspath参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /latestposts.php, and if the parameter "forumspath" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla! DJ-Catalog (com_djcatalog)组件中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1)showItem操作中的id参数和(2)对index.php的一个展示操作的cid参数，执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: Joomla! DJ-Catalog (com_djcatalog) component is prone to multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands via (1)the id parameter to the showItem action and (2)the cid parameter to the show action in index.php.

中文:
已升级补丁    Epignosis eFront 3.5.4 
Epignosis Patch for 3.5.4  建议安装补丁     http://svn.efrontlearning.net/repos/efront/trunc/libraries/database.ph p
en-US:
Epignosis eFront 3.5.4 has been upgraded.
Epignosis Patch for 3.5.4. Recommended to install the patch: http://svn.efrontlearning.net/repos/efront/trunc/libraries/database.php

中文: Unclassified NewsBoard forum.php __tplCollection参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Unclassified NewsBoard forum.php __tplCollection Parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /forum.php和 GLOBALS[UTE][__tplCollection][a][file] 变量中包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /forum.php, and if the parameter "GLOBALS[UTE][__tplCollection][a][file]" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: joomla com_djcatalog component DELETE FROM SQL Injection

中文: 检测请求行是否包含/index.php还有 option=com_djcatalog&view=showItem&id参数中是否带有SQL语句(DELETE FROM)。如果是，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains /index.php, and if option=com_djcatalog&view=showItem&id contains SQL statement (DELETE FROM). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla! DJ-Catalog (com_djcatalog)组件中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1)showItem操作中的id参数和(2)对index.php的一个展示操作的cid参数，执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: Joomla! DJ-Catalog (com_djcatalog) component is prone to multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands via (1)the id parameter to the showItem action and (2)the cid parameter to the show action in index.php.

中文:
已升级补丁    Epignosis eFront 3.5.4 
Epignosis Patch for 3.5.4  建议安装补丁     http://svn.efrontlearning.net/repos/efront/trunc/libraries/database.ph p

Epignosis eFront 3.5.4 has been upgraded.
Epignosis Patch for 3.5.4. Recommended to install the patch: http://svn.efrontlearning.net/repos/efront/trunc/libraries/database.php

en-US: joomla com_djcatalog component UNION SELECT SQL Injection

中文: 检测请求行是否包含/index.php还有 option=com_djcatalog&view=showItem&id中是否包含SQL语句（UNION SELECT）。如果是，将会阻断并设置相关参数

中文: Foobla RSS Feed Creator组件存在SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者通过借助/index.php的参数id，执行任意的sql指令
en-US: Foobla RSS Feed Creator component is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id parameter in /index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php和并且option=com_jlord_rss&task=feed&id 参数带有SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO，UPDATE SET等关键词的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /index.php and the option=com_jlord_rss&task=feed&id parameter and SELECT FROM, DELETE FROM, UNION SELECT, INSERT INTO, UPDATE SET, and other keywords in uri.

中文: x10Media x10 Automatic MP3 Script 1.5.5中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以通过对(1) includes/function_core.php 和 (2) templates/layout_lyrics.php的web_root参数中的一个URL来执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: x10Media x10 Automatic MP3 Script 1.5.5 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the web_root parameter to (1) includes/function_core.php and (2) templates/layout_lyrics.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/includes/function_core.php，web_root参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /includes/function_core.php and the web_root parameter which with ../.

中文: x10Media x10 Automatic MP3 Script 1.5.5中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以通过对templates/layout_lyrics.php的web_root参数中的一个URL来执行任意PHP代码
en-US: x10Media x10 Automatic MP3 Script 1.5.5 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the web_root parameter to templates/layout_lyrics.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/mini.php且存在help_file参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /mini.php and contain the help_file parameter.

中文: SpiderLabs Research (SLR) Public Vulns:  x10自动的MP3脚本function_core.php web_root参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: x10 Automatic MP3 Script function_core.php web_root Parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /includes/function_core.php和web_root 变量中包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /includes/function_core.php, and if the variable "web_root" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: x10Media x10 Automatic MP3 Script 1.5.5中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以通过对(1) includes/function_core.php 和 (2) templates/layout_lyrics.php的web_root参数中的一个URL来执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: x10Media x10 Automatic MP3 Script 1.5.5 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the web_root parameter to (1) includes/function_core.php and (2) templates/layout_lyrics.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/templates/layout_lyrics.php，web_root参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /templates/layout_lyrics.php and the web_root parameter which with ../.

中文: x10自动的MP3脚本layout_lyrics.php web_root 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: x10 Automatic MP3 Script layout_lyrics.php web_root Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和   /templates/layout_lyrics.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数web_root。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /templates/layout_lyrics.php, and if the parameter "web_root" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla！ com_album组件存在目录遍历漏洞,远程攻击者可以借助index.php中target参数，读取文件
en-US: Joomla！ com_album component is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can read files via the target parameter in index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含 /index.php?option=com_album&和Itemid=128&并且包含target参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /index.php?option=com_album& and Itemid=128& and the target parameter.

中文: x10自动的MP3脚本layout_lyrics.php web_root参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: x10 Automatic MP3 Script layout_lyrics.php web_root Parameter Local file Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /templates/layout_lyrics.php和web_root变量中包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /templates/layout_lyrics.php, and if the variable "web_root" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla! Ideal MooFAQ (com_moofaq)组件includes/file_includer.php中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助文件参数中的一个..，读取任意文件。
en-US: The includes/file_includer.php in Joomla! Ideal MooFAQ (com_moofaq) component is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can read arbitrary files via a .. in the file parameter.

中文: 建议使用 (com_moofaq)组件1.0之后版本
en-US: It is recommended to use (com_moofaq) component after 1.0 version.

中文: Possible Joomla! com_album部分文件包含
en-US: Possible Joomla! com_album Component Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测ARGS_NAMES是否包含target，请求行 中是否包含 /index.php?option=com_album&和 Itemid=128&。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数

中文: Joomla! Ideal MooFAQ (com_moofaq)组件1.0版本的includes/file_includer.php中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助文件参数中的一个..，读取任意文件。

中文: CMScontrol Content Management System 7.x版本中的index.php存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助id_menu参数，任意的SQL指令。
en-US: CMScontrol Content Management System 7.x is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands via the id_menu parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php并带有id_menu参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /index.php and the id_menu parameter.

中文: 检测 CMScontrol 7.x (index.php id_menu) SQL注入计算机安全隐患
en-US: CMScontrol 7.x (index.php id_menu) SQL Injection Vulnerability Detection

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/index.php并带有可SQL注入的参数id_menu则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /index.php and the parameter "id_menu" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, the request would be blocked and parameter would be set.

中文: Lotus Connections的/profiles/html/simpleSearch.do模块没有正确地过滤对name参数所传送的输入便返回给了用户，这允许远程攻击者执行跨站脚本攻击，在用户浏览器会话中执行任意HTML和脚本代码。
en-US: The /profiles/html/simpleSearch.do module in Lotus Connections does not properly filter the input passed to the name parameter and is returned to the user, which allows remote attackers to perform cross site scripting attack, execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the user's browser sessions.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/profiles/html/simpleSearch.do且存在name参数等关键字的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /profiles/html/simpleSearch.do and contain the name parameter and other keywords.

中文: 检测 IBM Lotus Connections simpleSearch.do XSS攻击
en-US: IBM Lotus Connections simpleSearch.do Cross-Site Scripting Attempt Detection

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/profiles/html/simpleSearch.do且带有可XSS攻击的参数name则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数。
en-US: If the request contains /profiles/html/simpleSearch.do and the parameter "name" that is vulnerable to XSS attack, the request would be blocked and parameter would be set.

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含/index.php?option=com_gameserver和view=gamepanel，还有请求体中是否包含SQL语句（INSERT INTO)。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains /index.php?option=com_gameserver, view=gamepanel and SQL statement (INSERT INTO). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: LightOpenCMS 0.1版本的locms/smarty.php中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助cwd参数中的一个".."执行，包含和允许任意本地文件
en-US: The locms/smarty.php in LightOpenCMS 0.1 is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can include and allow arbitrary local files via a ".." in the cwd parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/locms/smarty.php，cwd参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /locms/smarty.php and the cwd parameter which with ../.

中文: LightOpenCMS smarty.php cwd参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: LightOpenCMS smarty.php cwd Parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /index.php和option=com_wgpicasa&。  controller 变量中包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php and option=com_wgpicasa&, and if the variable "controller" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: LightOpenCMS 0.1版本的locms/smarty.php中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助cwd参数中的一个".."执行，包含和允许任意本地文件。
en-US: The locms/smarty.php in LightOpenCMS 0.1 is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can include and allow arbitrary local files via a ".." in the cwd parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/locms/smarty.php，cwd参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /locms/smarty.php and the cwd parameter which with ../.

中文: LightOpenCMS smarty.php cwd 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: LightOpenCMS smarty.php cwd Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /locms/smarty.php。 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数cwd。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /locms/smarty.php, and if the parameter "cwd" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: DM FileManager 3.9.4的dm-albums/template/album.php 存在ＰＨＰ远程文件包含漏洞在register_globals被激活的情况下会允许远程攻击者通过SECURITY_FILE 参数中的一个URL来执行任意PHP代码
en-US: The dm-albums/template/album.php in DM FileManager 3.9.4 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. When register_globals is activated, remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the SECURITY_FILE parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/dm-albums/template/album.php，SECURITY_FILE参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /dm-albums/template/album.php and the SECURITY_FILE parameter which with ../.

中文: DM Albums album.php SECURITY_FILE参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: DM Albums album.php SECURITY_FILE Parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /block_center_top.php。 row_mysql_blocks_center_top[file]参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /block_center_top.php, and if the parameter "row_mysql_blocks_center_top[file]" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: 常被单机使用或用作文字处理插件程序的DM Albums 1.9.2的template/album.php中的ＰＨＰ远程文件包含漏洞，允许远程攻击者利用SECURITY_FILE参数中的一个ＵＲＬ来执行任意ＰＨＰ代码。
en-US: DM Albums often used alone or as a word processing plugin. The template/album.php in DM Albums 1.9.2 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the SECURITY_FILE parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/dm-albums/template/album.php，SECURITY_FILE参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /dm-albums/template/album.php and the SECURITY_FILE parameter which with ../.

中文: DM Albums album.php SECURITY_FILE 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: DM Albums album.php SECURITY_FILE Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /dm-albums/template/album.php。  是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数SECURITY_FILE。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /dm-albums/template/album.php, and if the parameter "SECURITY_FILE" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: 运行在Windows平台上的Novell eDirectory服务器的dhost模块存在基于堆栈的缓冲区溢出漏洞。远程认证用户可以借助/dhost/modules?I:的一个长字符串，导致拒绝服务(dhost.exe崩溃)或者可能导致任意代码执行。
en-US: The dhost module in Novell eDirectory server running on Windows is prone to stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability. Remote authentication users can cause denial of service(dhost.exe crash) or possibly arbitrary code execution via a long string of /dhost/modules?I:.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问dhost/modules且存在dconserv.dlm参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting dhost/modules and contain the dconserv.dlm parameter and other keywords.

中文: 检测Possible Novell eDirectory 'dconserv.dlm' XSS攻击
en-US: Possible Novell eDirectory \'dconserv.dlm\' Cross-Site Scripting Attempt Detection

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/dhost/modules且带有可SQL注入的参数dconserv.dlm则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /dhost/modules and the parameter "dconserv.dlm" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and parameter would be set.

中文: Joomla! JoomlaCache CB Resume Builder (com_cbresumebuilder)组件中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助对index.php的一个group_members操作的task参数，执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: Joomla! JoomlaCache CB Resume Builder (com_cbresumebuilder) component is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands via the task parameter to the group_members action in index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php?option=com_cbresumebuilder和含有参数task=group_members并带有SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO，UPDATE SET等关键词的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /index.php?option=com_cbresumebuilder and the task=group_members parameter and SELECT FROM, DELETE FROM, UNION SELECT, INSERT INTO, UPDATE SET, and other keywords.

中文: Joomla! CB Resume Builder 'group_id'参数 SELECT FROM SQL注入
en-US: Joomla! CB Resume Builder \'group_id\' parameter SELECT FROM SQL Injection

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含/index.php?option=com_cbresumebuilder和 task=group_members，还有请求体中是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains /index.php?option=com_cbresumebuilder, task=group_members and SQL statement (SELECT FROM). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Docebo的index.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助modname参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: The index.php in Docebo is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands via the modname parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php并带有modname参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /index.php and the modname parameter.

中文: 检测 Docebo UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: Possible Docebo UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt Detection

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/index.php和/docebo/docebo和UPDATE并带有可SQL注入的参数modname则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /index.php, /docebo/docebo, UPDATE and the parameter "modname" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and parameter would be set.

中文: Docebo的index.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助modname参数，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: The index.php in Docebo is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands via the modname parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php和/docebo/docebo和UPDATE和SET并带有modname参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /index.php,  /docebo/docebo, UPDATE, SET, and the modname parameter.

中文: 检测 Possible Docebo UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: Possible Docebo UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt Detection

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/index.php和/docebo/docebo和 UPDATE和SET并带有可SQL注入的参数modname则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /index.php, /docebo/docebo, UPDATE, SET and the parameter "modname" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and parameter would be set.

中文: All In One Control Panel (AIOCP)的脚本public/code/cp_html2xhtmlbasic.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助page参数的URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: The public/code/cp_html2xhtmlbasic.php script in All In One Control Panel (AIOCP) is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via the URL in the page parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含header，page参数带有url的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain header and the page parameter with the url request.

中文: Possible AIOCP cp_html2xhtmlbasic.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Possible AIOCP cp_html2xhtmlbasic.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有    /public/code/cp_html2xhtmlbasic.php。QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY参数的值是否包含.php?.{0,300}=(http:|ftp:|https:|ftps:)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, and /public/code/cp_html2xhtmlbasic.php, and if the parameter "QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY" contains .php?.{0,300}=(http:|ftp:|https:|ftps:). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: AWStats的awstats.pl脚本没有正确地过滤config请求参数，如果用户跟随了恶意链接的话就可能导致在浏览器会话中注入并执行任意web脚本或HTML代码。
en-US: The awstats.pl script in AWStats does not properly filter the config request parameter, which can cause the attackers to inject and execute arbitrary web scripts or HTML code in a browser session if the user follows a malicious link.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问awstats/awstats.pl且存在config参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting awstats/awstats.pl and contain the config parameter.

中文: 检测网页AWStats awstats.pl跨站点脚本攻击
en-US: Possible AWStats awstats.pl Cross-Site Scripting Attempt Detection

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /awstats/awstats.pl且带有可XSS攻击的参数config则规则匹配，拦截。
en-US: If the request contains /awstats/awstats.pl and the parameter "config" that is vulnerable to XSS attack, request would be blocked and parameter would be set.

中文: Webradev Download Protect存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助多个脚本的GLOBALS[RootPath]参数的URL，执行任意的PHP代码。这些脚本包含：Framework/EmailTemplates.class.php， 的Admin/ResellersManager.class.php
en-US: Webradev Download Protect is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via the URL in the GLOBALS[RootPath] parameter for multiple scripts. These scripts include: Admin/ResellersManager.class.php in Framework/EmailTemplates.class.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/Framework/EmailTemplates.class.php且存在GLOBALS[RootPath]参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /Framework/EmailTemplates.class.php and contain the GLOBALS[RootPath] parameter.

中文: Webradev Download Protect EmailTemplates.class.php存在参数与远程文件捆绑
en-US: Webradev Download Protect EmailTemplates.class.php Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和  /Framework/EmailTemplates.class.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数GLOBALS[RootPath]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /Framework/EmailTemplates.class.php, and if the parameter "GLOBALS[RootPath]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Webradev Download Protect存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助多个脚本的GLOBALS[RootPath]参数的URL，执行任意的PHP代码。这些脚本包含：Customers/PDPEmailReplaceConstants.class.php中的Admin/ResellersManager.class.php
en-US: Webradev Download Protect is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via the URL in the GLOBALS[RootPath] parameter for multiple scripts. These scripts include: Admin/ResellersManager.class.php in Customers/PDPEmailReplaceConstants.class.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/Customers/PDPEmailReplaceConstants.class.php且存在GLOBALS[RootPath]参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /Customers/PDPEmailReplaceConstants.class.php and contain the GLOBALS[RootPath] parameter.

中文: Webradev Download Protect PDPEmailReplaceConstants.class.php存在参数与远程文件捆绑
en-US: Webradev Download Protect PDPEmailReplaceConstants.class.php Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和   /Customers/PDPEmailReplaceConstants.class.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数GLOBALS[RootPath]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /Customers/PDPEmailReplaceConstants.class.php, and if the parameter "GLOBALS[RootPath]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Webradev Download Protect存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助多个脚本的GLOBALS[RootPath]参数的URL，执行任意的PHP代码。这些脚本包含： includes/DProtect/中的Admin/ResellersManager.class.php
en-US: Webradev Download Protect is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via the URL in the GLOBALS[RootPath] parameter for multiple scripts. These scripts include: Admin/ResellersManager.class.php in includes/DProtect/.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/Admin/ResellersManager.class.php且存在GLOBALS[RootPath]参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /Admin/ResellersManager.class.php and contain the GLOBALS[RootPath] parameter.

中文: Webradev Download Protect ResellersManager.class.php存在参数与远程文件捆绑
en-US: Webradev Download Protect ResellersManager.class.php Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和   /Admin/ResellersManager.class.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数GLOBALS[RootPath]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /Admin/ResellersManager.class.php, and if the parameter "GLOBALS[RootPath]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: PHPGenealogy 2.0版本的CoupleDB.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助数据目录参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: The CoupleDB.php in PHPGenealogy 2.0 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the data directory parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/CoupleDB.php且存在DataDirectory参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /CoupleDB.php and contain the DataDirectory parameter.

中文: PHPGenealogy CoupleDB.php DataDirectory 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: PHPGenealogy CoupleDB.php DataDirectory Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有         /CoupleDB.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数DataDirectory。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /CoupleDB.php, and if the parameter "DataDirectory" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: GROUP-E 1.6.41中的lib/head_auth.php中的PHP远程文件包含漏洞允许远程攻击者借助CFG[PREPEND_FILE]参数中的一个URL执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: The lib/head_auth.php in GROUP-E 1.6.41 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the CFG[PREPEND_FILE] parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含abspath，CFG[PREPEND_FILE]参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain abspath and the CFG[PREPEND_FILE] parameter which with ../.

中文: GROUP-E head_auth.php CFG 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: GROUP-E head_auth.php CFG Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /www/lib/head_auth.php。  是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数CFG[PREPEND_FILE]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /www/lib/head_auth.php, and if the parameter "CFG[PREPEND_FILE]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
Cacti的top_graph_header.php脚本中存在输入验证错误，允许攻击者包含远程站点的任意PHP代码，这可能导致以Web Server进程的权限执行任意命令。
        漏洞起因是脚本盲目信任用户提供的library_path变量。
en-US: The top_graph_header.php in Cacti is prone to input validation error, allows attackers to include arbitrary PHP code of the remote site, which causes an arbitrary command execution with Web Server process permissions.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/include/top_graph_header.php且存在config[library_path]参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /include/top_graph_header.php and contain the config[library_path] parameter.

中文: RaXnet Cacti top_graph_header.php config 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: RaXnet Cacti top_graph_header.php config Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有          /include/top_graph_header.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数config[library_path]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /include/top_graph_header.php, and if the parameter "config[library_path]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: News Manager 2.0版本中的ch_readalso.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助read_xml_include参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: The ch_readalso.php in News Manager 2.0 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the read_xml_include parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/ch_readalso.php，read_xml_include参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /ch_readalso.php and the read_xml_include parameter which with ../.

中文: News Manager ch_readalso.php read_xml_include 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: News Manager ch_readalso.php read_xml_include Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /ch_readalso.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数read_xml_include。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /ch_readalso.php, and if the parameter "read_xml_include" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: in SerWeb中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助load_lang.php的_SERWEB[configdir]参数的一个URL执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: SerWeb is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the _SERWEB[configdir] parameter of load_lang.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/load_lang.php且存在_SERWEB[configdir]参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /load_lang.php and contain the _SERWEB[configdir] parameter.

中文: SERWeb load_lang.php configdir 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: SERWeb load_lang.php configdir Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有          /load_lang.php 。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数_SERWEB[configdir]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /load_lang.php, and if the parameter "_SERWEB[configdir]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.
There are several PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in SerWeb that remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code with a URL to the _SERWEB [functionsdir] parameter in main_prepend.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/main_prepend.php且存在/main_prepend.php参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting /main_prepend.php and contain the /main_prepend parameter.

中文: SERWeb main_prepend.php functionsdir 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: SERWeb main_prepend.php functionsdir Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有          /main_prepend.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数_SERWEB[functionsdir]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /main_prepend.php, and if the parameter "_SERWEB[functionsdir]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Ultrize TimeSheet 1.2.2版本中的include/timesheet.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。当register_globals被激活时，远程攻击者可以借助config[include_dir]参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: The include/timesheet.php in Ultrize TimeSheet 1.2.2 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. When register_globals is activated, remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the config[include_dir] parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问include/timesheet.php且存在config[include_dir]参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting include/timesheet.php and contain the config[include_dir] parameter.

中文: Ultrize TimeSheet timesheet.php include_dir 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Ultrize TimeSheet timesheet.php include_dir Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和 /include/timesheet.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数config[include_dir]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /include/timesheet.php, and if the parameter "config[include_dir]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
TxtBlog是一个针对在线博客的 PHP 内容管理系统。 
        TxtBlog 1.0 Alpha的index.php中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助m参数中的一个..，读取任意文件。
en-US: TxtBlog is a PHP content management system for online blogs. The index.php in TxtBlog 1.0 Alpha is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can read arbitrary files via a .. in the m parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/include/timesheet.php，config[include_dir]参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /include/timesheet.php and the config[include_dir] parameter which with ../.

中文: Ultrize TimeSheet timesheet.php include_dir参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Ultrize TimeSheet timesheet.php include_dir Parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /include/timesheet.php和config[include_dir]变量中包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /include/timesheet.php, and if the variable "config[include_dir]" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Achievo 1.4.0之前版本的classweekreport.inc中的get_employee函数存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到dispatch.php的userid参数(又称用户id变量)，执行任意的SQL指令。
en-US: The classweekreport.inc in Achievo prior to 1.4.0 is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary SQL commands via the userid parameter(aka user id variable) submitted to dispatch.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/dispatch.php?atknodetype=reports.weekreport并带有userid参数和关键词UPDATE和SET的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that contain /dispatch.php?atknodetype=reports.weekreport and the userid parameter and the keywords UPDATE and SET.

中文: 检测 Possible Achievo userid= Variable UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: Possible Achievo userid= Variable UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt Detection

中文: 如果在ARGS_NAMES 查找到userid和请求行查找到/dispatch.php?atknodetype=reports.weekreport且满足于QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配 UPDATE和SET和SQL语句（UPDATE SET）则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If ARGS_NAMES contains userid, the request contains /dispatch.php?atknodetype=reports.weekreport and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matches UPDATE, SET and SQL statement（UPDATE SET）, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: IBM Rational RequisitePro是一个功能强大而又易于使用的需求管理产品。 Rational RequisitePro所使用的ReqWebHelp组件没有对提交给/ReqWebHelp/basic/searchView.jsp页面的searchWord、maxHits、scopedSearch和scope参数，以及提交给/ReqWebHelp/advanced/workingSet.jsp页面的operation参数进行正确地验证就直接返回给用户，远程攻击者可以通过恶意的HTTP请求在用户浏览器会话中执行任意HTML和脚本代码。
en-US: IBM Rational RequisitePro is a powerful and easy-to-use requirements management product. The ReqWebHelp used by Rational RequisitePro returns directly to the user without validating the searchWord, maxHits, scopedSearch, and scope parameter submitted to /ReqWebHelp/basic/searchView.jsp page, and the operation parameter submitted to /ReqWebHelp/advanced/workingSet.jsp page. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary HTML and script code in a user's browser session via malicious HTTP requests.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问ReqWebHelp/advanced/workingSet.jsp且存在operation参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting ReqWebHelp/advanced/workingSet.jsp and contain the operation parameter and other keywords.

中文: 检测网页IBM Rational RequisitePro ReqWebHelp XSS攻击
en-US: Possible IBM Rational RequisitePro ReqWebHelp Cross Site Scripting Attempt Detection

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/ReqWebHelp/advanced/workingSet.jsp和operation=add且满足于QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配(script|img|src|onmouse|onkey|onload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick)等关键则规则匹配，拦截。
en-US: If the request contains /ReqWebHelp/advanced/workingSet.jsp and operation=add, and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matches (script|img|src|onmouse|onkey|onload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick), request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Apache Tomcat的host-manager/html/add文件没有正确地过滤对name参数的输入便返回给了用户，远程攻击者可以通过跨站脚本攻击在登录用户浏览器会话中执行任意HTML和脚本代码。
en-US: The host-manager/html/add file in Apache Tomcat does not properly filter the input to the name parameter and returned to the user. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the logged-in user's browser session via a cross site scripting attack.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问host-manager/html/add且存在method参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting host-manager/html/add and contain the method parameter.

中文: 检测网页服务器主机管理跨站脚本攻击
en-US: Possible Apache Tomcat Host Manager Cross Site Scripting Attempt Detection

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/host-manager/html/add且带有可XSS攻击的参数method则规则匹配，拦截。
en-US: If the request contains /host-manager/html/add and the parameter "method" that is vulnerable to XSS attack, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: BloofoxCMS的search.5.html中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到index.php的搜索参数，注入任意的web脚本或HTML
en-US: The search.5.html in BloofoxCMS is prone to cross site scripting attack. Remote attackers can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the search parameter submitted to index.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问search.5.html且存在search参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting search.5.html and contain the search parameter.

中文: 检测网页bloofoxCMS 'search' 参数跨站脚本攻击
en-US: Possible bloofoxCMS \'search\' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt Detection

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/search.5.html且带有可XSS攻击的参数search则规则匹配，拦截。
en-US: If the request contains /search.5.html and the parameter "search" that is vulnerable to XSS attack, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
Websense Email Security是综合的邮件安全软件，对邮件和Web 2.0的混合威胁提供防护。
        Websense Email Security默认监听于TCP/8181端口上的Web Administrator管理前端没有正确地过滤某些变量便返回给了用户，远程攻击者可以通过提交恶意的HTTP请求执行跨站脚本攻击；此外没有正确地过滤邮件的Subject字段便在Web Administrator前端显示，远程攻击者可以在标题中注入类似于"的脚本代码在用户浏览器会话中执行。
en-US: Websense Email Security is comprehensive email security software that protects against mixed threats of email and Web 2.0. The Web Administrator management frontend is listened by Websense Email Security on the TCP/8181 port by default, it does not properly filter some variables and return to the user. Remote attackers can execute cross-site scripting attack by submitting malicious HTTP request; Furthermore, it does not properly filter the Subject field of email and display on the Web Administrator, remote attackers can inject script code like " into the header and execute in the user's browser session.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问web/msgList/viewmsg/viewHeaders.asp且存在Queue参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is recommended that web server should filter the requests that visiting web/msgList/viewmsg/viewHeaders.asp and contain the Queue parameter and other keywords.

中文: 检测WebSense Email security viewHeaders.asp Queue XSS攻击
en-US: WebSense Email security viewHeaders.asp Queue XSS Attempt Detection

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/web/msgList/viewmsg/viewHeaders.asp且带有可XSS攻击的参数Queue则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /web/msgList/viewmsg/viewHeaders.asp and the parameter "Queue" that is vulnerable to XSS attack, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: IBM Rational RequisitePro是一个功能强大而又易于使用的需求管理产品。 Rational RequisitePro所使用的ReqWebHelp组件没有对提交给/ReqWebHelp/basic/searchView.jsp页面的searchWord、maxHits、scopedSearch和scope参数，以及提交给/ReqWebHelp/advanced/workingSet.jsp页面的operation参数进行正确地验证就直接返回给用户，远程攻击者可以通过恶意的HTTP请求在用户浏览器会话中执行任意HTML和脚本代码。
en-US: IBM Rational RequisitePro is a powerful demands management product easy to use.The  Rational component that RequisitePro uses doesn't properly sanitize parameters such as searchWord、maxHits、scopedSearch and scope submitted to /ReqWebHelp/basic/searchView.jsp as well as operation parameter submitted to /ReqWebHelp/advanced/workingSet.jsp, remote attacker can execute arbitrary HTML and script via malicious HTTP requests to user browser session.

en-US: IBM Rational RequisitePro ReqWebHelp scopedSearch Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/ReqWebHelp/basic/searchView.jsp且带有可SQL注入的参数scopedSearch则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数。
en-US: If the request contains /ReqWebHelp/basic/searchView.jsp and the parameter "scopedSearch" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: IBM Rational RequisitePro是一个功能强大而又易于使用的需求管理产品。 Rational RequisitePro所使用的ReqWebHelp组件没有对提交给/ReqWebHelp/basic/searchView.jsp页面的searchWord、maxHits、scopedSearch和scope参数，以及提交给/ReqWebHelp/advanced/workingSet.jsp页面的operation参数进行正确地验证就直接返回给用户，远程攻击者可以通过恶意的HTTP请求在用户浏览器会话中执行任意HTML和脚本代码。
en-US: IBM Rational RequisitePro is a powerful demands management product easy to use.The  Rational component that RequisitePro uses doesn't properly sanitize parameters such as searchWord、maxHits、scopedSearch and scope submitted to /ReqWebHelp/basic/searchView.jsp as well as operation parameter submitted to /ReqWebHelp/advanced/workingSet.jsp, remote attacker can execute arbitrary HTML and script via malicious HTTP requests to user browser session.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/ReqWebHelp/basic/searchView.jsp且存在scope参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a scope parameter and accesses to /ReqWebHelp/basic/searchView.jsp at the web server.

中文: 检测网页IBMIBM Rational RequisitePro ReqWebHelp scope XSS攻击
en-US: IBM Rational RequisitePro ReqWebHelp scope Cross Site Scripting

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/ReqWebHelp/basic/searchView.jsp且带有可SQL注入的参数scope则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数。
en-US: If the request contains /ReqWebHelp/basic/searchView.jsp and the parameter "scope" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Philboard中/qte_result.php存在SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过title参数执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: /qte_result.php in Philboard is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via title parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/qte_result.php并带有title参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /qte_result.php and with a title parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测  QUICKTEAM qte_result.php title参数UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: QUICKTEAM qte_result.php title Parameter UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/qte_result.php和GET并带有可SQL注入的参数title则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /qte_result.php, GET and the parameter "title" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: justVisual 1.2版本中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到sites/test/pages/contact.php,的fs_jVroot参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码
en-US: justVisual 1.2 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of fs_jVroot parameter submitted to sites/test/pages/contact.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/system/pageTemplate.php且存在fs_jVroot参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a fs_jVroot parameter and accesses to /system/pageTemplate.php at the web server.

中文: justVisual contact.php fs_jVroot 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: justVisual contact.php fs_jVroot Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和        /test/pages/contact.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数fs_jVroot。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and/test/pages/contact.php, and if the parameter "fs_jVroot" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

There are multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in justVisual 1.2. A remote attacker could execute arbitrary PHP code with a URL from the fs_jVroot parameter submitted to sites / test / pages / contact.php

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/system/pageTemplate.php且存在fs_jVroot参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a fs_jVroot parameter and accesses to /system/pageTemplate.php at the web server.

en-US: justVisual pageTemplate.php fs_jVroot Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和        /system/pageTemplate.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数fs_jVroot。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /system/pageTemplate.php, and if the parameter "fs_jVroot" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

There are multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in justVisual 1.2. A remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code with a URL in the fs_jVroot parameter submitted to system / utilities.php

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/system/utilities.php且存在fs_jVroot参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a fs_jVroot parameter and accesses to /system/utilities.php at the web server.

中文: justVisual utilities.php fs_jVroot 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: justVisual utilities.php fs_jVroot Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         /system/utilities.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数fs_jVroot。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /system/utilities.php, and if the parameter "fs_jVroot" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: KingCMS 0.6.0版本中的include/engine/content/elements/menu.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助CONFIG[AdminPath]参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: include/engine/content/elements/menu.php in KingCMS 0.6.0 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of CONFIG[AdminPath] parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/include/engine/content/elements/menu.php，CONFIG[AdminPath]参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /include/engine/content/elements/menu.php and a CONFIG[AdminPath] parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: KingCMS menu.php CONFIG 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: KingCMS menu.php CONFIG Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /include/engine/content/elements/menu.php。&是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数CONFIG[AdminPath]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /include/engine/content/elements/menu.php, and if the parameter "CONFIG[AdminPath]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Autonomous LAN  中Party _bot.php的PHP远程执行文件存在安全漏洞，允许远程攻击者利用master[currentskin]参数执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: PHP remote executable file of Party _bot.php in Autonomous LAN is prone to security vulnerabiliey, exploiting it remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via master[currentskin] parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/include/_bot.php，ARGS:master[currentskin]参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /include/_bot.php and a ARGS:master[currentskin] parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Autonomous LAN Party _bot.php master 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Autonomous LAN Party _bot.php master Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /include/_bot.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数master[currentskin]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /include/_bot.php, and if the parameter "master[currentskin]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: CA (过去称Computer Associates) eTrust SiteMinder Agent的forms/smpwservices.fcc中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助SMAUTHREASON参数注入任意web脚本或HTML
en-US: forms/smpwservices.fcc in CA (was named Computer Associates) eTrust SiteMinder Agent WordPress eShop plugin is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via SMAUTHREASON parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问siteminderagent/forms/smpwservices.fcc且存在src、script、img、alert等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with keywords such as src、script、img and alert and accesses to siteminderagent/forms/smpwservices.fcc at the web server.

中文: 检测网页Computer Associates SiteMinder Web Agent Smpwservices.FCC XSS攻击
en-US:
Possible Computer Associates SiteMinder Web Agent Smpwservices.FCC Cross Site Scripting 
Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/siteminderagent/forms/smpwservices.fcc且满足于 QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配(script|img|src|alert|onmouse|onkey|onload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick)等关键则规则匹配，拦截。
en-US: If the request contains /siteminderagent/forms/smpwservices.fcc and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matches (script|img|src|alert|onmouse|onkey|onload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick), request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Mambo 4.6.4及其早期版本下的includes/Cache/Lite/Output.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞, 在 register_globals被激活时, 远程攻击者通过mosConfig_absolute_path参数的一个URL来执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: includes/Cache/Lite/Output.php in Mambo 4.6.4 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, when the 'register_globals'remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of mosConfig_absolute_path parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/includes/Cache/Lite/Output.php，mosConfig_absolute_path参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /includes/Cache/Lite/Output.php and a mosConfig_absolute_path parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Possible Mambo Cache_Lite Class mosConfig_absolute_path远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Possible Mambo Cache_Lite Class mosConfig_absolute_path Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /includes/Cache/Lite/Output.php。 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数mosConfig_absolute_path。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /includes/Cache/Lite/Output.php, and if the parameter "mosConfig_absolute_path" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: DataLife Engine (DLE) 8.2版本中的engine/api/api.class.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助dle_config_api参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: engine/api/api.class.php in DataLife Engine (DLE) 8.2 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of dle_config_api parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/engine/api/api.class.php，dle_config_api参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /engine/api/api.class.php and a dle_config_api parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Datalife Engine api.class.php dle_config_api 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Datalife Engine api.class.php dle_config_api Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /engine/api/api.class.php。  是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数dle_config_api。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /engine/api/api.class.php, and if the parameter "dle_config_api" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Ve-EDIT 0.1.4版本中的debugger/debug_php.php存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助_GET[filename]参数中的..，包含和运行任意的本地文件。
en-US: debugger/debug_php.php Ve-EDIT 0.1.4 is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. When the 'register_globals' is enabled, remote attacker can include and run arbitrary local file via a '../' of _GET[filename] parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/debugger/debug_php.php，_GET[filename]参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /debugger/debug_php.php and a _GET[filename] parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Ve-EDIT debug_php.php _GET参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Ve-EDIT debug_php.php _GET Parameter Local File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /debugger/debug_php.php和_GET[filename]变量中包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /debugger/debug_php.php, and if the variable "_GET[filename]" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla! Fiji Web Design Ajax Chat(com_ajaxchat)组件中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助tests/ajcuser.php的GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path]参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: Joomla! Fiji Web Design Ajax Chat(com_ajaxchat) component is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of tests/ajcuser.php的GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path] parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/components/com_ajaxchat/tests/ajcuser.php并带有GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path]参数带有一个url 的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /components/com_ajaxchat/tests/ajcuser.php and with a GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path] parameter at the web server.

中文: Joomla AjaxChat部分 ajcuser.php GLOBALS参数存在远程文件捆绑
en-US: Joomla AjaxChat Component ajcuser.php GLOBALS parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含/components/com_ajaxchat/tests/ajcuser.php，GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path]中是否含有GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path]=(https|ftps|php):/等，如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains /components/com_ajaxchat/tests/ajcuser.php, and if GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path] contains GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path]=(https|ftps|php):/. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
DedeCMS（织梦内容管理系统），是一个集内容发布、编辑、管理检索等于一体的开源网站内 容管理系统。 
        DedeCMS 5.1的feedback_js.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助arcurl参数，执 行任意SQL指令。
en-US: DedeCMS（Dream weaving content management system），is an open source web content management system for which content publishing, editing and management search are integrated.feedback_js.php in DedeCMS 5.1 is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via arcurl parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含 /plus/feedback_js.php并带有arcurl参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /plus/feedback_js.php and with a arcurl parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测 DEDECMS feedback_js.php arcurl参数UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US:
DEDECMS feedback_js.php arcurl Parameter UPDATE SET SQL Injection 
Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/plus/feedback_js.php和 GET并带有可SQL注入的参数arcurl则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /plus/feedback_js.php, GET and the parameter "arcurl" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: ProdLer 2.0及之前版本中的include/prodler.class.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助sPath参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: include/prodler.class.php in ProdLer 2.0 and earlier is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of sPath parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/include/prodler.class.php且存在sPath参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a sPath parameter and accesses to /include/prodler.class.php at the web server.

中文: ProdLer prodler.class.php sPath 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: ProdLer prodler.class.php sPath Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有          /include/prodler.class.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数sPath。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /include/prodler.class.php, and if the parameter "sPath" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla! 组件Photoblog (com_photoblog) 存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以通过脚本index.php的&category，执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: Joomla! Photoblog (com_photoblog) component is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via category parameter in index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含index.php?option=com_photoblog&和含有&category 参数并带有SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO，UPDATE SET等关键词的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include index.php?option=com_photoblog& and a &category parameter keywords such as SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO and UPDATE SET at the web server.

中文: Joomla com_photoblog部分 category参数 SELECT FROM SQL注入尝试
en-US: Joomla com_photoblog component category parameter SELECT FROM SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有index.php?option=com_photoblog&。 &category参数的值是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and index.php?option=com_photoblog&, and if the parameter "&category" contains SQL statement (SELECT FROM). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: Joomla com_photoblog component category parameter UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有index.php?option=com_photoblog&。 &category参数的值是否带有SQL语句(UPDATE SET)。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and index.php?option=com_photoblog&, and if the parameter "&category" contains SQL statement (UPDATE SET). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Achievo 1.4.0之前版本的debugger.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助config_atkroot参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: debugger.php in Achievo 1.4.0 and earlier is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of config_atkroot parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/debugger.php，config_atkroot参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /debugger.php and a config_atkroot parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Achievo debugger.php config_atkroot 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Achievo debugger.php config_atkroot parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含   /debugger.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数config_atkroot.如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains /debugger.php, and if the parameter "config_atkroot" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: OBOphiX fonctions_racine.php chemin_lib parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /fonctions_racine.php, and if the parameter "chemin_lib" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: js/wptable-tinymce.php in WordPress is prone to bypass vulnerability， attacker can attempt to bind remote file via ABSPATH parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似js/wptable-tinymce.php_speedy?ABSPATH=ABSPATH = php/http/ftp的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that contians uri like js/wptable-tinymce.php_speedy?ABSPATH=ABSPATH = php/http/ftp at the web server.

中文: p-Table for WordPress wptable-tinymce.php ABSPATH 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: p-Table for WordPress wptable-tinymce.php ABSPATH Parameter RFI Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和/js/wptable-tinymce.php和  ABSPATH中是否包含ABSPATH=(https?|ftps?|php):/。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /js/wptable-tinymce.php, and if ABSPATH contains ABSPATH=(https?|ftps?|php):/. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla! D4J eZine (com_ezine)模块2.1版本的class/php/d4m_ajax_pagenav.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path参数中的URL，执行任意的PHP代码。

en-US: Joomla eZine Component d4m_ajax_pagenav.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有 /components/com_ezine/class/php/d4m_ajax_pagenav.php。 GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path]参数的值是否包含GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path]https?|ftps?|php):/。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /components/com_ezine/class/php/d4m_ajax_pagenav.php, and if GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path] contains GLOBALS[mosConfig_absolute_path]https?|ftps?|php):/. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla!的Jshop(com_jshop)组件中的SQL注入漏洞允许远程攻击者借助对index.php的一个操作中的pid参数，执行任意SQL指令。
en-US: Joomla! Jshop(com_jshop) component is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via pid parameter in index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含index.php?option=com_jshop&和含有&pid参数并带有SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO，UPDATE SET等关键词的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri index.php?option=com_jshop& and a &pid parameter with keywords such as SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO and UPDATE SET at the web server.

中文: Joomla com_jshop pid参数 SELECT FROM SQL注入
en-US: Joomla com_jshop pid parameter SELECT FROM SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有 index.php?option=com_jshop&。 &pid参数的值是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and index.php?option=com_jshop&, and if the parameter "&pid" contains SQL statement (SELECT FROM). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: Joomla com_joaktree Component treeId parameter SELECT FROM SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有 /index.php?option=com_joaktree&和&view=joaktree。treeId参数的值是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php?option=com_joaktree& and &view=joaktree, and if the parameter "treeId" contains SQL statement (SELECT FROM). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla!的组件Joaktree (com_joaktree)存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助脚本index.php的treeId参数执行任意的SQL命令。
en-US: Joomla! Joaktree (com_joaktree) component is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via treeId parameter in index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含index.php?option=com_jshop&和含有&view=joaktree并且treeId参数带有SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO，UPDATE SET等关键词的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri index.php?option=com_jshop& as well as &view=joaktree and a treeId parameter with keywords such as SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO and UPDATE SET at the web server.

中文: Joomla com_joaktree部分 treeId参数 DELETE FROM SQL注入
