中文: OneClick CMS (又称Sisplet CMS)的main/forum/komentar.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助site_path参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: main/forum/komentar.php in OneClick CMS (又称Sisplet CMS is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of site_path parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/main/forum/komentar.php且存在site_path参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a site_path parameter and accesses to /main/forum/komentar.php at the web server.

中文: Sisplet CMS komentar.php site_path 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Sisplet CMS komentar.php site_path Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有          /main/forum/komentar.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数site_path。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /main/forum/komentar.php, and if the parameter "site_path" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: phpBMS 0.96版本中存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1)对modules/bms/invoices_discount_ajax.php的id参数和(2)对dbgraphic.php的f参数和(3)对advancedsearch.php的一个show操作中的tid参数，执行任意SQL指令。
en-US: phpBMS 0.96 is prone to multiple SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via id parameter in (1)modules/bms/invoices_discount_ajax.php, f parameter in (2)对dbgraphic.php and tid parameter of show operation in (3)对advancedsearch.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含modules/bms/invoices_discount_ajax.php并带有id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include modules/bms/invoices_discount_ajax.php and with a id parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测 phpBMS invoices_discount_ajax.php id参数UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: phpBMS invoices_discount_ajax.php id Parameter UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /modules/bms/invoices_discount_ajax.php并带有可SQL注入的参数id则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /modules/bms/invoices_discount_ajax.php and the parameter "id" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla! Fernando Soares Mamboleto(com_mamboleto)组件2.0 RC3的mamboleto.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助mosConfig_absolute_path参数中的URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: mamboleto.php in Joomla! Fernando Soares Mamboleto(com_mamboleto) 2.0 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of mosConfig_absolute_path parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/acomponents/com_mamboleto/mamboleto.php并带有mosConfig_absolute_path参数带有一个url 的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /acomponents/com_mamboleto/mamboleto.php and with a mosConfig_absolute_path parameter at the web server.

中文: Mamboleto Joomla部分 mamboleto.php存在远程文件捆绑
en-US: Mamboleto Joomla component mamboleto.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有 /acomponents/com_mamboleto/mamboleto.php 。mosConfig_absolute_path 参数的值是否包含mosConfig_absolute_path=(https?|ftps?|php):/。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /acomponents/com_mamboleto/mamboleto.php, and if mosConfig_absolute_path contains mosConfig_absolute_path=(https?|ftps?|php):/. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: MyForum中的admin/centre.php存在目录遍历漏洞，当全局注册(register_globals)被启用时，远程攻击者可以借助padmin参数中的目录遍历序列放入和运行任意的本地文件。
en-US: admin/centre.php in MyForum is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. When the 'register_globals' is enabled, remote attacker can include and run arbitrary local file via directory traversal sequence of padmin parameter in /index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/infusions/last_seen_users_panel/last_seen_users_panel.php，settings[locale] 参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /infusions/last_seen_users_panel/last_seen_users_panel.php and a settings[locale] parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: MyFusion last_seen_users_panel.php settings参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: MyFusion last_seen_users_panel.php settings Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /infusions/last_seen_users_panel/last_seen_users_panel.php和settings[locale] 变量中包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /infusions/last_seen_users_panel/last_seen_users_panel.php, and if the variable "settings[locale]" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Dros core.process_compiled_include.php smarty远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Dros core.process_compiled_include.php smarty Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /include/libs/internals/core.process_compiled_include.php。  是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数smarty。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /include/libs/internals/core.process_compiled_include.php, and if the parameter "smarty" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Dros中的DaFun Spirit中的function.config_load.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助_compile_file参数中的一个URL执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: function.config_load.php in Dros DaFun Spirit is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of _compile_file parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/include/libs/plugins/function.config_load.php，_compile_file参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /include/libs/plugins/function.config_load.php and a _compile_file parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Dros function.config_load.php _compile_file远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Dros function.config_load.php _compile_file Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /include/libs/plugins/function.config_load.php。 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数_compile_file。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /include/libs/plugins/function.config_load.php, and if the parameter "_compile_file" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla! foobla Suggestions (com_foobla_suggestions)组件1.5.11版本中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助对index.php的idea_id参数，执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: Joomla! foobla Suggestions (com_foobla_suggestions) component 1.5.11 is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via idea_id parameter in index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php?option=com_foobla_suggestions&和并且idea_id参数带有SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO，UPDATE SET等关键词的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /index.php?option=com_musicgallery& as well as &task=itempage and a cid parameter with keywords such as SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO and UPDATE SET at the web server.

中文: Joomla Foobla Suggestions部分 idea_id SELECT FROM SQL注入
en-US: Joomla Foobla Suggestions Component idea_id SELECT FROM SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有 /index.php?option=com_foobla_suggestions&。idea_id参数的值是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /index.php?option=com_foobla_suggestions&, and if the parameter "idea_id" contains SQL statement (SELECT FROM). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: WordPress的wp-admin/admin.php文件中存在RFI漏洞，攻击者可以同过ABSPATH参数进行绕过模块安全配置
en-US: wp-admin/admin.php in WordPress is prone to RFI vulnerability, attacker can bypass module security configuration via ABSPATH parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似/wp-admin/admin.php?page==/wp-admin/admin.php 的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that contians uri like /wp-admin/admin.php?page==/wp-admin/admin.php at the web server.

中文: WordPress wp-admin/admin.php 绕过模块安全配置尝试
en-US: p-Table for WordPress wptable-tinymce.php ABSPATH Parameter RFI Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含/wp-admin/admin.php。QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY中是否包含page=和/wp-admin/admin.php.+page=(/collapsing-archives/options.txt|akismet/readme.txt|related-ways-to-take-action/options.php|wp-security-scan/securityscan.php)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains /wp-admin/admin.php, and if QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY contains page= and /wp-admin/admin.php.+page=(/collapsing-archives/options.txt|akismet/readme.txt|related-ways-to-take-action/options.php|wp-security-scan/securityscan.php). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: HP System Management Homepage (SMH)的proxy/smhui/getuiinfo中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助servercert参数执行跨站脚本攻击，注入任意web脚本或HTML。
en-US: proxy/smhui/getuiinfo in HP System Management Homepage (SMH)is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via servercert parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问proxy/smhui/getuiinfo且存在servercert参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a servercert keyword and accesses to proxy/smhui/getuiinfo at the web server.

中文: 检测网页  HP System Management Homepage Input Validation XSS攻击
en-US: HP System Management Homepage Input Validation Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/smhui/getuiinfo和 JS且带有可SQL注入的参数servercert则规则匹配，拦截。
en-US: If the request contains /smhui/getuiinfo, JS and the parameter "servercert" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问 /downloads.php且存在row_y5_site_configuration[templates_folder]参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a row_y5_site_configuration[templates_folder] parameter and accesses to /downloads.php at the web server.

中文: asaher pro downloads.php row_y5_site_configuration远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: asaher pro downloads.php row_y5_site_configuration Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和     /downloads.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数row_y5_site_configuration[templates_folder]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /downloads.php, and if the parameter "row_y5_site_configuration[templates_folder]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: /components/com_mediaslide/viewer.php中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助文件参数path中的一个..，读取任意文件。
en-US: /components/com_mediaslide/viewer.php is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can read arbitrary file via a '..' of path parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/components/com_mediaslide/viewer.php并带有path参数带有..的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /components/com_mediaslide/viewer.php and a path parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Joomla mediaslide部分 viewer.php 本地文件捆绑
en-US: Joomla mediaslide component viewer.php path Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有 /components/com_mediaslide/viewer.php。path参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /components/com_mediaslide/viewer.php, and if the parameter "path" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
F5 ARX Data Manager是美国F5公司的一套用于管理文件存储环境的解决方案。该方案支持数据迁移、存储分层和存储容量均衡等。
F5 ARX Data Manager 3.0.0至3.1.0版本的Web服务中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可利用该漏洞执行任意SQL命令。
en-US:
F5 ARX Data Manager is a solution to manage file storage environment for F5 company. It support to data migration, storage tiering, and storage capacity balance.
F5 ARX Data Manager 3.0.0 to 3.1.0 is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Exploiting it attacker can execute SQL commmand.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/acopia/manager/DiagLogListActionBody.do，logFile参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /acopia/manager/DiagLogListActionBody.do and a logFile parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: F5 Data Manager DiagLogListActionBody.do 尝试与本地文件捆绑
en-US: F5 Data Manager DiagLogListActionBody.do Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有     /acopia/manager/DiagLogListActionBody.do。 logFile参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /acopia/manager/DiagLogListActionBody.do, and if the parameter "logFile" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla com_yelp组件中SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者借助index.php中的参数cid，执行SQL指令。
en-US: Joomla com_yelp component is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via cid parameter in index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php和option=com_yelp&并且cid参数带有SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO，UPDATE SET等关键词的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /index.php as well as option=com_yelp& and a cid parameter with keywords such as SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO and UPDATE SET at the web server.

中文: Joomla com_yelp部分 cid参数 SELECT FROM SQL注入
en-US: Joomla com_yelp Component cid parameter SELECT FROM SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有 /index.php和option=com_yelp&。cid参数的值是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php and option=com_yelp&, and if the parameter "cid" contains SQL statement (SELECT FROM). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla com_yelp组件中SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者借助index.php中的参数cid，执行SQL指令。

中文: Joomla com_avosbillets部分 id参数 UNION SELECT SQL注入
en-US: Joomla com_avosbillets Component id parameter UNION SELECT SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有 /index.php和option=com_avosbillets&。id参数的值是否包含SQL语句（UNION SELECT）。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php and option=com_avosbillets&, and if the parameter "id" contains SQL statement (UNION SELECT). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla com_avosbilletsy组件中SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者借助index.php中的参数id，执行SQL指令。
en-US: Joomla com_avosbilletsy component is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via id parameter in index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php和option=com_avosbillets&并且id参数带有SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO，UPDATE SET等关键词的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /index.php as well as option=com_avosbillets& and a id parameter with keywords such as SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO and UPDATE SET at the web server.

中文: Joomla com_avosbillets部分 id参数 INSERT INTO SQL注入
en-US: Joomla com_avosbillets Component id parameter INSERT INTO SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有 /index.php和option=com_avosbillets&。id参数的值是否包含SQL语句（INSERT INTO)。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php and option=com_avosbillets&, and if the parameter "id" contains SQL statement (INSERT INTO). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
Joomla!是一款开放源码的内容管理系统（CMS）。 
        Joomla!的组件inertialFATE iF Portfolio Nexus (com_if_nexus)存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助脚本index.php的controller参数(该参数中包含 ..)，包含和读取任意的本地文件
en-US:
Joomla! is an open source content management system.
inertialFATE iF Portfolio Nexus (com_if_nexus) in Joomla! component is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can include and read arbitrary file via a '..' of controller parameter in /index.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/index.php且存在controller、option=com_if_nexus&参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a controller as well as option=com_if_nexus& parameter and accesses to /index.php at the web server.

中文: com_if_nexus controller 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: com_if_nexus controller Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和     /index.php是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数controller。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /index.php, and if the parameter "controller" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
Joomla morfeoshow中的/components/com_morfeoshow/morfeoshow.html.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助user_id参数中的
一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: /components/com_morfeoshow/morfeoshow.html.php in Joomla morfeoshow is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of user_id parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/components/com_morfeoshow/morfeoshow.html.php并带有user_id参数带有一个url 的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /components/com_morfeoshow/morfeoshow.html.php and with a user_id parameter at the web server.

中文: Joomla morfeoshow morfeoshow.html.php远程文件捆绑
en-US: Joomla morfeoshow morfeoshow.html.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有  /components/com_morfeoshow/morfeoshow.html.php和user_id 参数的值是否包含user_id=(https?|ftps?|php):/。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /components/com_morfeoshow/morfeoshow.html.php, and if the parameter "user_id" contains user_id=(https?|ftps?|php):/. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

There are several cross-site scripting vulnerabilities in the Network Management Card (NMC) in the American Power Conversion (APC) Switched Rack PDU (aka Rack Mount Power Distribution) driver and other installed device drivers that remote attackers can inject with arbitrary vectors web script or html.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问Forms/login1且存在login_username参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a login_username parameter and accesses to Forms/login1 at the web server.

中文: 检测网页WEB特定应用网络管理卡跨站脚本攻击
en-US: Possible APC Network Management Card Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/Forms/login且带有可XSS攻击的参数login_username则规则匹配，拦截。
en-US: If the request contains /Forms/login and the parameter "login_username" that is vulnerable to XSS attack, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Lotus Domino没有正确的过滤提交给readme.nsf帮助页面的输入参数便返回给了用户，远程攻击者可以通过提交恶意参数请求执行跨站脚本攻击，导致在用户浏览器会话中执行任意HTML和脚本代码。
en-US: Lotus Domino returns to user without correctly sanitize input parameter submitted to readme.nsfb, remote attacker can execute cross site scripting  via submitting malicious parameter, lead to executing HTML and script in browser session of user.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问help/readme.nsf/Header且存在BaseTarget参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a BaseTarget parameter and accesses to help/readme.nsf/Header at the web server.

中文: 检测网页IBMIBM Possible Lotus Domino readme.nsf XSS攻击
en-US: IBM Possible Lotus Domino readme.nsf Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/help/readme.nsf/Header且带有可SQL注入的参数BaseTarget则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数。
en-US: If the request contains /help/readme.nsf/Header and the parameter "BaseTarget" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: SaurusCMS中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助class.writeexcel_workbook.inc.php的class_path参数的一个URL执行任意PHP代码。

en-US: SaurusCMS class.writeexcel_workbook.inc.php class_path Remote File Inclusion Attempt

en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /classes/excel/class.writeexcel_workbook.inc.php, and if the parameter "class_path" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla!的Jcollection(com_jcollection)组件存在目录遍历漏洞，远程攻击者通过index.php中的controller参数(该参数中包含一个“..”)，读取任意文件。
en-US: Joomla! Jcollection(com_jcollection) component is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can read arbitrary file via a '..' of view controller in /index.php.

中文: 建议使用 Joomla 3.0.1 Released及之后版本
en-US: It is suggested to use the version Joomla 3.0.1 Released and later.

中文: Joomla部分 com_jcollection controller参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Joomla Component com_jcollection controller parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有 /index.php和option=com_jcollection&。controller参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php and option=com_jcollection&, and if the parameter "controller" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /index.php as well as option=com_hdflvplayer& and a Id parameter with keywords such as SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO and UPDATE SET at the web server.

en-US: Joomla com_hdflvplayer Component id parameter SELECT FROM SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有 /index.php和option=com_hdflvplayer&。id参数的值是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php and option=com_hdflvplayer&, and if the parameter "id" contains SQL statement (SELECT FROM). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: epay中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助/e-pay/src/a_affil.php的net2ftp_globals[application_skinsdir]参数的一个URL执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: epay is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of net2ftp_globals[application_skinsdir] parameter in /e-pay/src/a_affil.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/tools/filemanager/skins/mobile/admin1.template.php且存在net2ftp_globals[application_skinsdir]t参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a net2ftp_globals[application_skinsdir]t parameter and accesses to/tools/filemanager/skins/mobile/admin1.template.php at the web server.

中文: ispCP Omega admin1.template.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: ispCP Omega admin1.template.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和        /tools/filemanager/skins/mobile/admin1.template.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数net2ftp_globals[application_skinsdir]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /tools/filemanager/skins/mobile/admin1.template.php, and if the parameter "net2ftp_globals[application_skinsdir]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: ENOVIA SmarTeam没有正确地过滤用户提交给WebEditor/Authentication/LoginPage.aspx页面的errMsg参数便返回给了用户，远程攻击者可以通过提交恶意参数请求，执行跨站脚本攻击。
en-US: ENOVIA SmarTeam returns to the user without correctly sanitizing the errMsg parameter submitted to WebEditor/Authentication/LoginPage.aspx, remote attacker can execute cross site scripting via submitting malicious parameter request.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问WebEditor/Authentication/LoginPage.aspx且存在errMsg参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a errMsg parameter and accesses to WebEditor/Authentication/LoginPage.aspx at the web server.

中文: 检测网页IBM ENOVIA SmarTeam v5 LoginPage.aspx XSS攻击
en-US: IBM ENOVIA SmarTeam v5 LoginPage.aspx Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/WebEditor/Authentication/LoginPage.aspx且带有可SQL注入的参数errMsg则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数。
en-US: If the request contains /WebEditor/Authentication/LoginPage.aspx and the parameter "errMsg" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla!的Quick News （com_quicknews）组件存在SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者可通过index.php中view_item操作的newsid参数执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: Joomla! Quick News （com_quicknews) component is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via newsid parameter of view_item operation in index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php和含有option=com_quicknews&和&task=view_item并且newsid参数带有SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO，UPDATE SET等关键词的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /index.php, option=com_quicknews& and &task=view_item and a newsid parameter with keywords such as SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO and UPDATE SET at the web server.

中文: Joomla com_quicknews部分 newsid参数 DELETE FROM SQL注入
en-US: Joomla com_quicknews Component newsid Parameter DELETE FROM SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有 /index.php和option=com_quicknews&和&task=view_item。newsid参数的值是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php, option=com_quicknews& and &task=view_item, and if the parameter "newsid" contains SQL statement (SELECT FROM). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla!所用的ccNewsletter (com_ccnewsletter)组件中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助index.php脚本中ccnewsletter操作的controller参数(参数中包含..)，读取任意的文件。
en-US: Joomla! ccNewsletter (com_ccnewsletter) component is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can read arbitrary file via a '..' of controller parameter in ccnewsletter operation of index.php.

中文: 建议使用1.0.5之后的版本
en-US: It is suggested to use the version after 1.0.5.

中文: Joomla部分 com_ccnewsletter controller参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Joomla Component com_ccnewsletter controller Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有 /index.php?option=com_ccnewsletter&。controller参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /index.php?option=com_ccnewsletter&, and if the parameter "controller" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: WordPress的NextGEN Gallery插件中的脚本xml/media-rss.php存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助mode参数注入任意的web脚本和HTM
en-US: xml/media-rss.php in WordPress NextGEN Gallery plugin is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via mode parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似xml/media-rss.php?mode=script/onmouse /onkey等的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that contians uri like xml/media-rss.php?mode=script/onmouse /onkey at the web server.

中文: Wordpress NextGEN Gallery 插件跨站脚本攻击尝试
en-US: Wordpress NextGEN Gallery Plugin Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有  wp-content/plugins/nextgen-gallery/xml/media-rss.php。 mode中是否包含(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and wp-content/plugins/nextgen-gallery/xml/media-rss.php, and if mode contains (script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla!的Anything Digital Development JCal Pro (又称com_jcalpro或JCP)组件的cal_popup.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助mosConfig_absolute_path参数中的一个URL执行任意PHP代码。

Anything Digital Development JCal Pro (also named com_jcalpro or JCP) component is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of mosConfig_absolute_path parameter in /e107_handlers/secure_img_handler.php.

en-US: It is suggested to use the version after com_jcalpro1.5.3.6.

en-US: Joomla com_jcalpro cal_popup.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /components/com_jcalpro/cal_popup.php, and if mosConfig_absolute_path contains mosConfig_absolute_path=(https?|ftps?|php):/. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: CactuShop '_invoice.asp' 多个跨站脚本攻击漏洞--CactuShop是一款基于ASP的电子商务系统。 CactuShop的in_invoice.asp存在多个跨站脚本攻击漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过（1）账单地址或（2）购物地址注入任意网页脚本或HTML
en-US:
CactuShop '_invoice.asp' multiple cross site scripting vulnerability--CactuShop is an e-commerce system based on ASP.
CactuShop的in_invoice.asp is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via (1)billing address and (2)shopping address.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问_invoice.asp且存在script>、alert、onmouse等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with keywords such as script>、alert and onmouse and accesses to _invoice.asp at the web server.

中文: 检测网页CactuShop用户发票持久XSS 跨站点脚本攻击
en-US: Possible CactuShop User Invoices Persistent XSS Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到_invoice.asp且满足于匹配在请求行 form[同时 QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配(alert|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange)等关键则规则匹配，拦截。
en-US: If the request contains _invoice.asp and form, and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matches (alert|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange), request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.
Cross-site scripting vulnerabilities exist in the _invoice.asp page of the CactuShop web page that an attacker could exploit to gain system or sensitive information.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含jtfwcpnt.jsp并带有query参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is recommended that the web server filter requests that uri contains _invoice.asp and have malicious cross-site parameters.

中文: 检测 Oracle E-Business Suite Financials jtfwcpnt.jsp UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: Oracle E-Business Suite Financials jtfwcpnt.jsp UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/jtfwcpnt.jsp并带有可SQL注入的参数query则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /jtfwcpnt.jsp and the parameter "query" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
AssistantTools是一款简单易用的MP3 tag编辑器。 
        Music Tag Editor 1.61 build 212版本中存在一个栈溢出漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助具有超长ID3标签的一个MP3来文件执行任意代码。
en-US:
AssistantTools is a MP3 tag editor easy to use.
Music Tag Editor 1.61 build 212 is prone to stack overflow vulnerability. Remote attacker can execute arbitrary code via a MP3 file with a long ID3 tag.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/velid3/getid3.php，determined_format[include]参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /velid3/getid3.php and a determined_format[include] parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Mp3 Online Id Tag Editor getid3.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Mp3 Online Id Tag Editor getid3.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /velid3/getid3.php。 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数determined_format[include]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /velid3/getid3.php, and if the parameter "determined_format[include]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

        Music Tag Editor 1.61 build 212版本中存在一个栈溢出漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助具有超长ID3标签的一个MP3来文件执行任意代码。

en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /velid3/module.archive.gzip.php and a determined_format[include] parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Mp3 Online Id Tag Editor module.archive.gzip.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Mp3 Online Id Tag Editor module.archive.gzip.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /velid3/module.archive.gzip.php。 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数determined_format[include]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /velid3/module.archive.gzip.php, and if the parameter "determined_format[include]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: NetWin SurgeFTP 2.3a6的surgeftpmgr.cgi中存在多个跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助一个class功能中的 domainid 参数classid 参数，执行跨站脚本攻击，注入任意的web脚本和HTML。
en-US: surgeftpmgr.cgi in NetWin SurgeFTP 2.3a6 is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via domainid parameter in class function.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问cgi/surgeftpmgr.cgi且存在classid参数与cmd=class等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a classid parameter as well as cmd=class keyword and accesses to cgi/surgeftpmgr.cgi at the web server.

中文: 检测SurgeFTP surgeftpmgr.cgi classid参数XSS攻击
en-US: SurgeFTP surgeftpmgr.cgi classid Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/cgi/surgeftpmgr.cgi且带有可SQL注入的参数classid则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /cgi/surgeftpmgr.cgi and the parameter "classid" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla!com_wgpicasa存在目录遍历漏洞，远程攻击者通过index.php中的controller参数(该参数中包含一个“..”)，读取任意文件。
en-US: Joomla!com_wgpicasa is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can read arbitrary file via a '..' of controller parameter in /index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php并带有controller参数带有..的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /index.php and a controller parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Joomla wgPicasa部分 controller参数与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Joomla wgPicasa Component controller Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有  /index.php和option=com_wgpicasa&。 controller参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php and option=com_wgpicasa&, and if the parameter "controller" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: WordPress中的wp-content/plugins/cpl/cplphoto.php文件中存在sql注入漏洞，攻击者可利用postid参数注入任意的sql指令
en-US: wp-content/plugins/cpl/cplphoto.php in WordPress is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via postid parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似wp-content/plugins/cpl/cplphoto.php?postid=UNION SELECT的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that contians uri like wp-content/plugins/cpl/cplphoto.php?postid=UNION SELECT at the web server.

中文: WordPress Copperleaf Photolog postid参数  UNION SELECT SQL注入尝试
en-US: WordPress Copperleaf Photolog postid Parameter UNION SELECT SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有   /wp-content/plugins/cpl/cplphoto.php。 postid中是否包含:SQL语句（UNION SELECT）。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /wp-content/plugins/cpl/cplphoto.php, and if the parameter "postid" contains SQL statement (UNION SELECT). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a errmsg parameter and accesses to /Aris/wflogin.jsp at the web server.

中文: 检测网页ARISg ERRMSG参数跨站脚本攻击
en-US: ARISg errmsg Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /Aris/wflogin.jsp且带有可XSS攻击的参数errmsg则规则匹配，拦截。
en-US: If the request contains /Aris/wflogin.jsp and the parameter "errmsg" that is vulnerable to XSS attack, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.
There is a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in cPanel's frontend / x3 / files / fileop.html that allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary page scripts or HTML via the fileop parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问frontend/x3/files/fileop.html且存在fileop参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a fileop parameter and accesses to frontend/x3/files/fileop.html at the web server.

中文: 检测 cPanel fileop参数XSS攻击
en-US: cPanel fileop Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/frontend/x3/files/fileop.html且带有可SQL注入的参数fileop则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /frontend/x3/files/fileop.html and the parameter "fileop" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Gallo的core/includes/gfw_smarty.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞，当magic_quotes_gpc被禁用时，远程攻击者可通过config[gfwroot]参数的URL执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: core/includes/gfw_smarty.php in Gallo is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, when the 'magic_quotes_gpc' is disabled, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of config[gfwroot] parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含 /core/includes/gfw_smarty.php，config[gfwroot]参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /core/includes/gfw_smarty.php and a config[gfwroot] parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Gallo gfw_smarty.php gfwroot 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Gallo gfw_smarty.php gfwroot Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /core/includes/gfw_smarty.php。  是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数config[gfwroot]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /core/includes/gfw_smarty.php, and if the parameter "config[gfwroot]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: PowerEasy和PowerEasy SiteWeaver的User/User_ChkLogin.asp存在跨站脚本攻击(XSS)漏洞，远程攻击者可通过ComeUrl参数注入任意web脚本或HTML。
en-US: User/User_ChkLogin.asp in PowerEasy as well as PowerEasy SiteWeaver is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via ComeUrl parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问user/User_ChkLogin.asp且存在ComeUrl参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a ComeUrl parameter and accesses to user/User_ChkLogin.asp at the web server.

中文: 检测PowerEasy ComeUrl参数XSS攻击
en-US: PowerEasy ComeUrl Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/user/User_ChkLogin.asp且带有可SQL注入的参数ComeUrl则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /user/User_ChkLogin.asp and the parameter "ComeUrl" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla jwmmxtd 组件中的/administrator/components/com_jwmmxtd/admin.jwmmxtd.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助mosConfig_absolute_path参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: /administrator/components/com_jwmmxtd/admin.jwmmxtd.php in Joomla jwmmxtd is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of mosConfig_absolute_path parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/administrator/components/com_jwmmxtd/admin.jwmmxtd.php并带有mosConfig_absolute_path参数带有一个url 的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /administrator/components/com_jwmmxtd/admin.jwmmxtd.php and with a mosConfig_absolute_path parameter at the web server.

中文: Joomla jwmmxtd部分 mosConfig_absolute_path 存在参数与远程文件捆绑
en-US: Joomla jwmmxtd Component mosConfig_absolute_path Parameter Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有  /administrator/components/com_jwmmxtd/admin.jwmmxtd.php。 mosConfig_absolute_path 参数的值是否包含mosConfig_absolute_path=(ftps?|https?|php):/。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /administrator/components/com_jwmmxtd/admin.jwmmxtd.php, and if the parameter "mosConfig_absolute_path" contains mosConfig_absolute_path=(ftps?|https?|php):/. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: /administrator/components/com_universal/includes/config/config.html.php in Joomla com_universa is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of mosConfig_absolute_path parameter in /e107_handlers/secure_img_handler.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/administrator/components/com_universal/includes/config/config.html.php并带有mosConfig_absolute_path参数带有一个url 的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /administrator/components/com_universal/includes/config/config.html.php and with a mosConfig_absolute_path parameter at the web server.

中文: Joomla com_universal部分远程文件捆绑
en-US: Joomla com_universal Component Remote File Inclusion

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有  /administrator/components/com_jwmmxtd/admin.jwmmxtd.php。 mosConfig_absolute_path 参数的值是否包含mosConfig_absolute_path=(ftps?|https?|php):/。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /administrator/components/com_jwmmxtd/admin.jwmmxtd.php, and if the parameter "mosConfig_absolute_path" contains mosConfig_absolute_path=(ftps?|https?|php):/. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: PHP-Nuke的/links.php存在多个SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助sid参数执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: /links.php in PHP-Nuke is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via sid parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/links.php并带有op=viewslink&sid参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /links.php and with a op=viewslink&sid parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测 PHP-Nuke viewslink module sid参数UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: PHP-Nuke viewslink module sid Parameter UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/links.php和GET和op=viewslink&并带有可SQL注入的参数sid则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /links.php, GET, op=viewslink& and the parameter "sid" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
Free Directory Script是一个基于PHP开发的功能丰富的免费目录脚本。 
        Free Directory Script 1.1.1版本的init.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞,当register_globals被激活时,远程攻击者可以借助API_HOME_DIR参数中的一个URL,执行任意PHP代码。
en-US:
Free Directory Script is feature-rich free directory script developed on PHP.
init.php in Free Directory Script 1.1.1 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, when the 'register_globals' is activated,  remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of API_HOME_DIR parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/index.php和option=com_jeajaxeventcalendar，view参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /index.php and option=com_jeajaxeventcalendar and a view parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: JE Ajax Event Calendar view参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: JE Ajax Event Calendar view Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /index.php和@contains option=com_jeajaxeventcalendar&o。 view参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php and @contains option=com_jeajaxeventcalendar&o, and if the parameter "view" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Dynamic Security Agent (DSA)是一个主机防护软件。它无需特征码，是桌面级的恶意软件防护程序。Consona Live Assistance、 Dynamic Agent和Subscriber Assistance存在多个跨站脚本攻击(XSS)漏洞，远程攻击者可通过特制ASP网页输入注入任意web脚本或HTML。比如，利用sdccommon/verify/asp/n6plugindestructor.asp的backurl参数
en-US: Dynamic Security Agent (DSA) is host protection software. It requires no signatures and is a desktop-level malicious defensive program.Consona Live Assistance、 Dynamic Agent and Subscriber Assistance is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted ASP web. For example, use the backurl parameter in sdccommon/verify/asp/n6plugindestructor.asp.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问sdccommon/verify/asp/n6plugindestructor.asp且存在backurl等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a backurl keyword and accesses to sdccommon/verify/asp/n6plugindestructor.asp at the web server.

中文: 检测网页Consona Products n6plugindestructor.asp XSS攻击
en-US: Consona Products n6plugindestructor.asp Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/verify/asp/n6plugindestructor.asp且带有可XSS攻击的参数backurl则规则匹配，拦截。
en-US: If the request contains /verify/asp/n6plugindestructor.asp and the parameter "backurl"  that is vulnerable to XSS attack, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
HotNews是一款基于WEB的新闻发布系统。
        HotNews存在多个文件包含问题，远程攻击者可以利用这个漏洞以WEB权限在系统上执行任意命令。
        问题存在于hotnews-engine.inc.php3和hnmain.inc.php3中，这两个脚本对用户提交给"config[header]"和"config[incdir]"的URI参数缺少充分过滤，提交包含远程服务器上的恶意文件，可能以WEB进程权限执行恶意PHP脚本上的任意命令。
en-US:
HotNews is a news release system based on WEB.
HotNews is proe to multiple file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary command on the system with WEB privilege. The issue is because of an improper sanitization for URI parameter submitted to "config[header]" and "config[incdir]" in hotnews-engine.inc.php3 and hnmain.inc.php3. User can submit malicious file including remote server and execute arbitrary command of PHP scripts as WEB process privilege.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/includes/hnmain.inc.php3，config[incdir]参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /includes/hnmain.inc.php3 and a config[incdir] parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: HotNews hnmain.inc.php3 incdir 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: HotNews hnmain.inc.php3 incdir Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /includes/hnmain.inc.php3。  是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数config[incdir]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /includes/hnmain.inc.php3, and if the parameter "config[incdir]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: 29o3 CMS存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可通过(1) lib/page/pageDescriptionObject.php, 和(2) layoutHeaderFuncs.php, (3) layoutManager.php, 和(4) layoutParser.php in lib/layout/的LibDir参数的URL执行任意PHP代码

en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /lib/page/pageDescriptionObject.php, and if the parameter "LibDir" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: 具有高级管理模块(AMM)固件BPET48L，可能还有4.7之前版本以及5.0版本的IBM BladeCenter存在多个跨站脚本攻击漏洞(XSS)。远程攻击者可以借助(1)INDEX或者(2)private/cindefn.php中IPADDR参数，(3)private/power_management_policy_options.php中domain参数，(4)private/pm_temp.php或者(5)private/power_module.php中的slot参数，(6)private/blade_leds.php中WEBINDEX参数，或者(7)private/ipmi_bladestatus.php中SLOT参数注入任意的web脚本或者HTML。
en-US: IBM BladeCenter in firmware BPET48L with advanced management module(AMM) before 4.7 and 5.0 is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via IPADDR parameter in (1)INDEX or (2)private/cindefn.php,domain parameter in (3)private/power_management_policy_options.php, slot parameter in (4)private/pm_temp.php or (5)private/power_module.php, WEBINDEX parameter in (6)private/blade_leds.php, and SLOT parameter in (7)private/ipmi_bladestatus.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问private/cindefn.php且存在INDEX参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a INDEX parameter and accesses to private/cindefn.php at the web server.

en-US: Possible IBM BladeCenter Management Module cindefn.php Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/private/cindefn.php且带有可SQL注入的参数INDEX则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数。
en-US: If the request contains /private/cindefn.php and the parameter "INDEX" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: 检测网页IBM  Management Module power_management_policy_options.php XSS攻击
en-US: Possible IBM BladeCenter Management Module power_management_policy_options.php Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/private/power_management_policy_options.php且带有可SQL注入的参数domain则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数。
en-US: If the request contains /private/power_management_policy_options.php and the parameter "domain" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: 具有高级管理模块(AMM)固件BPET48L，可能还有4.7之前版本以及5.0版本的IBM BladeCenter存在多个跨站脚本攻击漏洞(XSS)。远程攻击者可以借助(1)INDEX或者(2)private/cindefn.php中IPADDR参数，(3)private/power_management_policy_options.php中domain参数，(4)private/pm_temp.php或者(5)private/power_module.php中的slot参数，(6)private/blade_leds.php中WEBINDEX参数，或者(7)private/ipmi_bladestatus.php中SLOT参数注入任意的web脚本或者HTML。
en-US: IBM BladeCenter in firmware BPET48L with advanced management module(AMM) before 4.7 and 5.0 is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via IPADDR parameter in (1)INDEX or (2)private/cindefn.php,domain parameter in (3)private/power_management_policy_options.php, slot parameter in (4)private/pm_temp.php or (5)private/power_module.php, WEBINDEX parameter in (6)private/blade_leds.php, and SLOT parameter in (7)private/ipmi_bladestatus.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问private/pm_temp.php且存在slot参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a slot parameter and accesses to private/pm_temp.php at the web server.

en-US: Possible IBM BladeCenter Management Module pm_temp.php Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: ClearSite存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可利用include/admin/device_admin.php的cs_base_path参数的URL执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: ClearSite is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of cs_base_path parameter in include/admin/device_admin.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/include/admin/device_admin.php且存在cs_base_path参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a cs_base_path parameter and accesses to /include/admin/device_admin.php at the web server.

中文: ClearSite device_admin.php cs_base_path 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: ClearSite device_admin.php cs_base_path Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有          /include/admin/device_admin.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数cs_base_path。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /include/admin/device_admin.php, and if the parameter "cs_base_path" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: ardeaCore PHP Framework 2.2版本的ardeaCore/lib/core/ardeaInit.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可借助pathForArdeaCore参数中的URL执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: ardeaCore/lib/core/ardeaInit.php in ardeaCore PHP Framework 2.2 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of pathForArdeaCore parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含 /ardeaCore/lib/core/ardeaInit.php，pathForArdeaCore参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /ardeaCore/lib/core/ardeaInit.php and a pathForArdeaCore parameter with '../' at the web server.

en-US: ArdeaCore pathForArdeaCore Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有    /ardeaCore/lib/core/ardeaInit.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数pathForArdeaCore。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /ardeaCore/lib/core/ardeaInit.php, and if the parameter "pathForArdeaCore" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /plugins/campsiteattachment/attachments.php and with a v parameter at the web server.

中文: Openads(又称phpAdsNew)2.0.7版本中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助提交到libraries/lib-remotehost.inc的(1)phpAds_geoPlugin，到admin/report-index的参数(2)文件名参数或到admin/lib-gui.inc的(3)phpAds_config[my_footer]参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: Openads(also named phpAdsNew)2.0.7 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of (1)phpAds_geoPlugin parameter submitted to libraries/lib-remotehost.inc, (2)filename parameter submitted to admin/report-index and  (3)phpAds_config[my_footer] submitted to admin/lib-gui.inc.

en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a phpAds_geoPlugin parameter and accesses to /libraries/lib-remotehost.inc.php at the web server.

en-US: OpenX phpAdsNew phpAds_geoPlugin Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有        /libraries/lib-remotehost.inc.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数phpAds_geoPlugin。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /libraries/lib-remotehost.inc.php, and if the parameter "phpAds_geoPlugin" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: SaurusCMS com_del.php class_path Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         /com_del.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数class_path。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /com_del.php, and if the parameter "class_path" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: iScripts MultiCart的productdetails.php存在SQL注入漏洞。远程授权用户通过productid参数来执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: productdetails.php in iScripts MultiCart is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via productid parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含productdetails.php并带有productid参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include productdetails.php and with a productid parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测 iScripts MultiCart orderid参数UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: iScripts MultiCart orderid Parameter UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/refund_request.php和GET并带有可SQL注入的参数orderid则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /refund_request.php, GET, and the parameter "orderid" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: CSSTidy的plugins/csstidy/css_optimiser.php中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助url参数，注入任意的web脚本或HTML
en-US: plugins/csstidy/css_optimiser.php in CSSTidy is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via url parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问plugins/csstidy/css_optimiser.php且存在url参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a url parameter and accesses to plugins/csstidy/css_optimiser.php at the web server.

中文: 检测 CSSTidy css_optimiser.php url参数XSS攻击
en-US: CSSTidy css_optimiser.php url Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/plugins/csstidy/css_optimiser.php且带有可XSS攻击的参数url则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /plugins/csstidy/css_optimiser.php and the parameter "url" that is vulnerable to XSS attack, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Databay MaxCMS special.php代码注入漏洞--MaxCMS 3.11.20b版本的includes/file_manager/special.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者执行任意PHP代码

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/includes/file_manager/special.php且存在fm_includes_special参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a fm_includes_special parameter and accesses to /includes/file_manager/special.php at the web server.

中文: MAXcms fm_includes_special 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: MAXcms fm_includes_special Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和          /includes/file_manager/special.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数fm_includes_special。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /includes/file_manager/special.php, and if the parameter "fm_includes_special" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla!的Code-Garage NoticeBoard (com_noticeboard)组件存在目录遍历漏洞，远程攻击者可通过index.php控件参数的".."符读取任意文件，并可能导致其它未明影响。
en-US: Joomla Code-Garage NoticeBoard (com_noticeboard) component is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can read arbitrary file via a '..' of index.php parameter and cause other unknown effects.

中文: 建议使用1.3之后版本
en-US: It is suggested to use version after 1.3.

中文: Joomla NoticeBoard部分 controller参数本地文件注入
en-US: Joomla NoticeBoard Component controller Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有 /index.php和 option=com_jphone。 controllero参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php and option=com_jphone, and if the parameter "controller" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: If the request contains /cacti/utilities.php and the parameter "filter" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
PHP-Fusion是一个基于mysql数据库，用PHP语言编写的开源轻量级开源内容管理系统。 
        PHP-Fusion中的maincore.php中存在代码注入漏洞。远程攻击者可借助folder_level参数中的..(点 点)包含并执行任意本地文件。
en-US:
PHP-Fusion is an open source light content management system based on mysql database and written by PHP language.
maincore.php in PHP-Fusionf is prone to code injection vulnerability, remote attacker can include and execute arbitrary local file via '../' of folder_level parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/maincore.php，folder_level参数带有../的请求给过滤了。

en-US: PHP-Fusion maincore.php folder_level Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /maincore.php和 folder_level   变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /maincore.php, and if the variable "folder_level" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /global.php, and if the parameter "db_servertype" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla com_zoomportfolio组件中的/index.php存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助id参数，执行SQL指令。
en-US: /index.php in Joomla com_zoomportfolio component is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via id parameter.

中文: dompdf 0.6.0 beta1版本的dompdf.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可借助input_file参数的URL执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: dompdf.php in dompdf 0.6.0 beta1 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of input_file parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/dompdf.php且存在input_file参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a input_file parameter and accesses to /dompdf.php at the web server.

中文: Dompdf dompdf.php input_file 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Dompdf dompdf.php input_file Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         /dompdf.php。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数input_file。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /dompdf.php, and if the parameter "input_file" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Easypush Server Manager的addressbook.cgi中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助page参数，注入任意的web脚本或HTML
en-US: addressbook.cgi in Easypush Server Manager is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via page parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问addressbook.cgi且存在page参数与show=search等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a page parameter as well as show=search keyword and accesses to addressbook.cgi at the web server.

中文: 检测 Easypush Server Manager addressbook.cgi page参数XSS攻击
en-US: Easypush Server Manager addressbook.cgi page Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/addressbook.cgi且带有可XSS攻击的参数page则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /addressbook.cgi and the parameter "page" that is vulnerable to XSS attack, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

A SQL Injection Vulnerability exists in art_catalogo.php in the MyStore Xpress Tienda Virtual 2.0 release because the application-provided input to the user was not properly filtered before being used in SQL queries. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to manipulate the application, access or modify data, or exploit the vulnerability in an underlying database.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问catalogo.php且存在id_livello参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a id_livello parameter and accesses to catalogo.php at the web server.

中文: 检测 Euchia CMS catalogo.php id_livello参数XSS攻击
en-US: Euchia CMS catalogo.php id_livello Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /catalogo.php且带有可SQL注入的参数id_livello则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /catalogo.php and the parameter "id_livello" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: phpThumb()的phpThumb.php存在漏洞，当安装ImageMagick时，远程攻击者可以通过h参数执行任意命令。
en-US: phpThumb.php in phpThumb() is prone to vulnerability, when the ImagicMagick is installed, remote attacker can execute arbitrary command via h parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/plog-includes/lib/phpthumb/phpThumb.php，h参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /plog-includes/lib/phpthumb/phpThumb.php and a h parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Plogger phpThumb.php h参数尝试远程文件披露
en-US: Plogger phpThumb.php h Parameter Remote File Disclosure Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有      /plog-includes/lib/phpthumb/phpThumb.php和 h变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /plog-includes/lib/phpthumb/phpThumb.php, and if the variable "h" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
Anton Raharja PlaySMS是SMS网关应用处理用于处理单个或广播SMS消息。
        playSMS 0.9.3版本中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助
        (1)对plugin/gateway/gnokii/init.php的apps_path[plug]参数
        (2)对plugin/themes/default/init.php的apps_path[themes]参数
        (3)对lib/function.php的apps_path[libs]参数中的一个URL
        执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US:
Anton Raharja PlaySMS is used to process single or broadcast SMS message for SMS gateway.
playSMS 0.9.3 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of (1)apps_path[plug] to plugin/gateway/gnokii/init.php, (2)apps_path[themes] parameter to plugin/themes/default/init.php, (3)apps_path[libs] parameter to lib/function.php.

中文:
PHP-Fusion是一个基于mysql数据库，用PHP语言编写的开源轻量级开源内容管理系统。 
        PHP-Fusion的MG User-Fotoalbum(mg_user_fotoalbum_panel)模块1.0.1版本中存在SQL注入漏洞。当“album_user_id”设置为有效时，向infusions/mg_user_fotoalbum_panel/mg_user_fotoalbum.php文件输入的“album_id”参数还没有经过正确过滤就被用于SQL查询，远程攻击者可以利用该漏洞执行任意SQL命令。
en-US:
PHP-Fusion is an open source light content management system based on mysql database and PHP language.
MG User-Fotoalbum(mg_user_fotoalbum_panel) module 1.0.1 in PHP-Fusion is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. When the "album_user_id" is set to valid, the “album_id” parameter input into infusions/mg_user_fotoalbum_panel/mg_user_fotoalbum.php is used to SQL query before proper sanitization, exploiting it attacker can execute arbitrary SQL command.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含infusions/mg_user_fotoalbum_panel/mg_user_fotoalbum.php并带有album_id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include infusions/mg_user_fotoalbum_panel/mg_user_fotoalbum.php and with a album_id parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测 PHP-Fusion mguser fotoalbum album_id参数UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: PHP-Fusion mguser fotoalbum album_id Parameter UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/infusions/mg_user_fotoalbum_panel/mg_user_fotoalbum.php并带有可SQL注入的参数album_id则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /infusions/mg_user_fotoalbum_panel/mg_user_fotoalbum.php and the parameter "album_id" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: 检测 Lantern CMS intPassedLocationID参数XSS攻击
en-US: Lantern CMS intPassedLocationID Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/html/11-login.asp且带有可XSS攻击的参数intPassedLocationID则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /html/11-login.asp and the parameter "intPassedLocationID" that is vulnerable to XSS attack, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: OrangeHRM中的index.php存在目录遍历漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助uri参数中的目录遍历序列和uniqcode=KPI和menu_no_top=performance包含和运行任意的本地文件。
en-US: index.php in OrangeHRM is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can include and run arbitrary file via a directory traversal sequence of uri parameter and via uniqcode=KPI as well as menu_no_top=performance.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/index.php和uniqcode=KPI和menu_no_top=performance，menu_no_top=performance参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /index.php, uniqcode=KPI and menu_no_top=performance and a menu_no_top=performance parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: OrangeHRM uri参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: OrangeHRM uri Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /index.php和 uniqcode=KPI 和menu_no_top=performance。 uri 变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php, uniqcode=KPI and menu_no_top=performance and if the variable "uri" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
Joomla com_jomestate 中的/real_estate/index.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远
程攻击者可以借助task参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: /real_estate/index.php in Joomla com_jomestate is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of task parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/real_estate/index.php和option=com_jomestate并带有task参数带有一个url 的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /real_estate/index.php as well as option=com_jomestate and with a task parameter at the web server.

中文: Joomla com_jomestate参数远程文件捆绑
en-US: Joomla com_jomestate Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有  /real_estate/index.php和 option=com_jomestate。  task参数的值是否包含task=(ftps?|https?|php):/。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /real_estate/index.php and option=com_jomestate, and if the parameter "task" contains task=(ftps?|https?|php):/. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: W-Agora的search.php3中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助bn参数，注入任意的web脚本或HTML
en-US: search.php3 in W-Agora is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via bn parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问news/search.php3且存在bn参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a bn parameter and accesses to news/search.php3 at the web server.

中文: 检测 search.php bn参数XSS攻击
en-US: W-Agora search.php bn Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /news/search.php3且带有可SQL注入的参数bn则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /news/search.php3 and the parameter "bn" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
W-Agora是一款免费开放源代码的PHP论坛程序，可使用在Unix和Linux操作系统下。 
        W-Agora 4.2.1及之前版本中的search.php3（也称为search.php）中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可借助bn参数中..(点 点)包含和执行任意本地文件。
en-US:
W-Agora is a free open source PHP fourm program for UNIX and linux.
search.php3 in W-Agora 4.2.1 and earlier version are prone to directory traversal vulnerabilities. Remote attacker can execute arbitrary file via a '..' of bn parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/news/search.php3，bn参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /news/search.php3 and a bn parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: W-Agora search.php bn参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: W-Agora search.php bn Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /news/search.php3和是否包含带有目录遍历的参数bn。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /news/search.php3, and if the parameter "bn" containing directory traversal exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: DBHcms 1.1.4版本中的index.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可借助editmenu参数执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: index.php in DBHcms 1.1.4 is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via editmenu parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含index.php并带有editmenu参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include index.php and with a editmenu parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测 DBHcms editmenu参数UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: DBHcms editmenu Parameter UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/index.php和GET并带有可SQL注入的参数editmenu则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /index.php, GET and the parameter "editmenu" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: SmartISoft phpBazar 'picturelib.php' PHP远程文件包含漏洞--SmartISoft phpBazar 2.1.1的picturelib.php存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助cat参数的URL执行任意的PHP代码
en-US: SmartISoft phpBazar 'picturelib.php' PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability. picturelib.php in SmartISoft phpBazar 2.1.1 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of cat parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/bazar/picturelib.php且存在cat参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a cat parameter and accesses to /bazar/picturelib.php at the web server.

中文: phpBazar picturelib.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: phpBazar picturelib.php Remote File inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         /bazar/picturelib.php和是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数cat。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /bazar/picturelib.php, and if the parameter "cat" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

A PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability exists in mw_plugin.php in Open Web Analytics (OWA) version 1.2.3. When magic_quotes_gpc is disabled register_globals is enabled, remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code with the URL of the IP parameters

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/mw_plugin.php且存在IP参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a IP parameter and accesses to /mw_plugin.php at the web server.

中文: Open Web Analytics mw_plugin.php IP 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Open Web Analytics mw_plugin.php IP Parameter Remote File inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         /real_estate/index.php/mw_plugin.phpo是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数IP。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /real_estate/index.php/mw_plugin.php, and if the parameter "IP" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
Open Web Analytics（OWA）是 Open Web Analytics团队的一套基于PHP和MySQL的开源网站流量统计软件。该软件可用来追踪和分析用户访问的网站和应用程序，并能够与WordPress、MediaWiki集成使用。 
        OWA 1.5.4及之前的版本中存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于程序构造SQL查询语句之前没有充分过滤用户提交的数据。攻击者可利用该漏洞控制应用程序，访问或修改数据，或利用底层数据库中潜在的漏洞。
en-US:
Open Web Analytics（OWA）is a open source site traffic statistics softword based on PHP and MySQL . It is used to trace and analize the sites and application users access to, and can be integrated with WordPress and MediaWiki.
OWA 1.5.4 is prone to SQL injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含bn，owa_action参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include bn and a owa_action parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Open Web Analytics owa_action参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Open Web Analytics owa_action Parameter Local File inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /index.php和owa_action 变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /index.php, and if the variable "owa_action" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
Open Web Analytics（OWA）是 Open Web Analytics团队的一套基于PHP和MySQL的开源网站流量统计软件。该软件可用来追踪和分析用户访问的网站和应用程序，并能够与WordPress、MediaWiki集成使用。 
        OWA 1.5.4及之前的版本中存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于程序构造SQL查询语句之前没有充分过滤用户提交的数据。攻击者可利用该漏洞控制应用程序，访问或修改数据，或利用底层数据库中潜在的漏洞。
en-US:
Open Web Analytics（OWA）is a open source site traffic statistics softword based on PHP and MySQL provided by Open Web Analytics. It is used to trace and analize the sites and application users access to, and can be integrated with WordPress and MediaWiki.
OWA 1.5.4 is prone to SQL injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/index.php，owa_do参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /index.php and a /index.php parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Open Web Analytics owa_do参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Open Web Analytics owa_do Parameter Local File inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /index.php和 owa_do  变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /index.php, and if the variable "owa_do" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

OneCMS is a content management system designed for network game site.
OneCMS implementation is prone to input validation vulnerability. Remote attacker can submit malicious HTTP request including arbitrary file of local source to lead to leak sensitive information.

中文:
Joomla com_banners组件中的/components/com_banners/banners.class.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远
程攻击者可以借助mosConfig_absolute_path参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: /components/com_banners/banners.class.php in Joomla com_banners component is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of mosConfig_absolute_path parameter.

Geeklog是一个开源门户系统，可作为一种讲故事的软件，新闻系统或在线社区。 
        Geeklog 1.3.8版本中的filemgmt/singlefile.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可借助lid参数执行任意SQL命令。

filemgmt/singlefile.php in Geeklog 1.3.8 is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via lid parameter.
