en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /filemgmt/singlefile.php and with a lid parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测 GeekLog filemgt UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: GeekLog filemgt UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/filemgmt/singlefile.php和GET并带有可SQL注入的参数lid则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /filemgmt/singlefile.php, GET and the parameter "lid" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: AR Web Content Manager (AWCM) 2.1最终版中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可借助向includes/window_top.php和header.php发送的theme_file参数，向control/common.php发送的lang_file参数中的URL执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: AR Web Content Manager (AWCM) 2.1 latest version is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of theme_file parameter sent to includes/window_top.php and header.php. and lang_file sent to control/common.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/awcm/header.php且存在theme_file参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a theme_file parameter and accesses to /awcm/header.php at the web server.

中文: AWCM window_top.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: AWCM window_top.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         /awcm/includes/window_top.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数theme_file。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /awcm/includes/window_top.php, and if the parameter "theme_file" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: AR Web Content Manager (AWCM) 2.1最终版中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可借助向includes/window_top.php和header.php发送的theme_file参数，向control/common.php发送的lang_file参数中的URL执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: AR Web Content Manager (AWCM) 2.1 latest version is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of lang_file parameter sent to control/common.php and theme_file sent to includes/window_top.php as well as header.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/awcm/control/common.php且存在lang_file参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a lang_file parameter and accesses to /awcm/control/common.php at the web server.

中文: AWCM common.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: AWCM common.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         /awcm/control/common.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数lang_file。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /awcm/control/common.php, and if the parameter "lang_file" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: AR Web Content Manager (AWCM) 2.1最终版中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可借助向includes/window_top.php和header.php发送的theme_file参数，向control/common.php发送的lang_file参数中的URL执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: AR Web Content Manager (AWCM) 2.1 latest version is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of lang_file parameter sent to control/common.php and theme_file sent to includes/window_top.php as well as header.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/awcm/header.php且存在theme_file参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a theme_file parameter and accesses to /awcm/header.php at the web server.

中文: AWCM header.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: AWCM header.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和          /awcm/header.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数theme_file。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /awcm/header.php, and if the parameter "theme_file" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
Geeklog是一个开源门户系统，可作为一种讲故事的软件，新闻系统或在线社区。 
        Geeklog 1.3.8版本中的filemgmt/singlefile.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可借助lid参数执行任意SQL命令。
en-US:
Geeklog is an open source system, it can be a storytelling softwore, news system or online community.
filemgmt/singlefile.php in Geeklog 1.3.8 is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via id parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含cart.php并带有id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include cart.php and with a id parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测 digiSHOP cart.php UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: digiSHOP cart.php UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/cart.php和 GET 和 m=features并带有可SQL注入的参数id则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /cart.php, GET, m=features and the parameter "id" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: MassMirror中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助Base/example_1.php的GLOBALS[MM_ROOT_DIRECTORY]参数的一个URL执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: MassMirror is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of GLOBALS[MM_ROOT_DIRECTORY] parameter in Base/example_1.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/Base/example_1.php且存在GLOBALS[MM_ROOT_DIRECTORY]参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a GLOBALS[MM_ROOT_DIRECTORY] parameter and accesses to /Base/example_1.php at the web server.

中文: MassMirror Uploader example_1.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: MassMirror Uploader example_1.php Remote File Inclusion attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         /Base/example_1.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数GLOBALS[MM_ROOT_DIRECTORY]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /Base/example_1.php, and if the parameter "GLOBALS[MM_ROOT_DIRECTORY]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: PHPCow未明漏洞允许远程攻击者通过未知向量，涉及到“文件包含漏洞，”在2008年11月在野外利用执行任意代码
en-US: PHPCow unknown vulnerability allow remote attacker execute arbitrary code in the wild involving "file inclusion vulnerability" via unknown vector in November 2008.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/plugins/templateie/lib/templateie_install.class.php且存在skin_file参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a skin_file parameter and accesses to /plugins/templateie/lib/templateie_install.class.php at the web server.

中文: phpCow skin_file 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: phpCow skin_file Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和          /plugins/templateie/lib/templateie_install.class.php和是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数skin_file。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /plugins/templateie/lib/templateie_install.class.php, and if the parameter "skin_file" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: phpCow中的templateie_install.class.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者借助skin_file参数中的一个URL执行任意PHP代码
en-US: templateie_install.class.php in phpCow is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of skin_file parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/plugins/templateie/lib/templateie_install.class.php，skin_file参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /plugins/templateie/lib/templateie_install.class.php and a skin_file parameter  with '../' at the web server.

中文: phpCow skin_file参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: phpCow skin_file Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /plugins/templateie/lib/templateie_install.class.php和 skin_file 变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /plugins/templateie/lib/templateie_install.class.php, and if the variable "skin_file" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: WordPress的FeedList插件2.61.01版本中的feedlist/handler_image.php文件中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助i参数注入任意web脚本或者HTML
en-US: feedlist/handler_image.php in WordPress FeedList plugin 2.61.01 is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via i parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似plugins/feedlist/handler_image.php?i=i= script/onmouse /onkey等的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that contians uri like plugins/feedlist/handler_image.php?i=i= script/onmouse /onkey at the web server.

中文: WordPress FeedList 插件i参数  跨站脚本攻击尝试
en-US: WordPress FeedList Plugin i Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有   /plugins/feedlist/handler_image.php。 i中是否包含i=.+(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange|style=)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /plugins/feedlist/handler_image.php, and if "i" contains i=.+(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange|style=). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: 当.htaccess不被支持时，Zen Cart 1.3.8和1.3.8a版本下的admin/includes/initsystem.php中的目录遍历漏洞，允许远程攻击者借助loader_file参数中的".."放入和运行任意的本地文件。注意：厂商对此漏洞存有争议，称"最坏情况下，该漏洞会显示一些本地文件的路径。"
en-US: When the .htaccess is unsupported, admin/includes/initsystem.php in Zen Cart 1.3.8 and earlier are prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can include and run arbitrary file via a '..' of loader_file parameter. Note: Vendor argue about the vulnerability saying that "In the worst case, the vulnerability will show the path of certain local file."

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/includes/initsystem.php，loader_file参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /includes/initsystem.php and a loader_file parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Zen Cart loader_file参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Zen Cart loader_file Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /includes/initsystem.php和 loader_file 变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /includes/initsystem.php, and if the variable "loader_file" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
Horde是个以PHP为基础的架构，用来创建网络应用程序。 
        Horde IMP 4.3.8之前版本，以及Horde Groupware Webmail Edition 1.2.7之前版本的fetchmailprefs.php中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助fetchmail_prefs_save操作中的fm_id参数，注入任意web脚本或者HTML。该漏洞与Fetchmail配置有关。
en-US:
Horde is an basic framework used to create network application based on PHP.
fetchmailprefs.php in Horde IMP before 4.3.8 and Horde Groupware Webmail Edition before 1.2.7 is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via fm_id parameter in fetchmail_prefs_save operation. It is related to Fetchmail configuration.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问fetchmailprefs.php且存在fm_id参数与actionID=fetchmail_prefs_save fm_driver=imap等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with actionID=fetchmail_prefs_save fm_driver=imap keyword as well as fm_id parameter and accesses to fetchmailprefs.php at the web server.

中文: 检测 Horde IMP fetchmailprefs.php XSS攻击
en-US: Horde IMP fetchmailprefs.php Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/fetchmailprefs.php和actionID=fetchmail_prefs_save和fm_driver=imap且带有可SQL注入的参数fm_id则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /fetchmailprefs.php, actionID=fetchmail_prefs_save, fm_driver=imap and the parameter "fm_id" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: The Uploader中的download_launch.php 存在目录遍历漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助filename参数中的目录遍历序列包含和运行任意的本地文件。
en-US: download_launch.php in The Uploader is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can inclue and run arbitrary file via directory traversal sequence of filename parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/api/download_launch.php，filename参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /api/download_launch.php and a filename parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: The Uploader download_launch.php 尝试披露远程文件
en-US: The Uploader download_launch.php Remote File Disclosure Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /api/download_launch.php和 filename 变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /api/download_launch.php, and if the variable "filename" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

There is a PHP Remote File Inclusion vulnerability for smf.php in Joomla! And the SMF-Forum 1.3.1.3 Bridge component (com_smf) for Mambo 4.5.3+. Remote attackers can execute arbitrary PHP code with the URL in the mosConfig_absolute_path parameter

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/components/com_smf/smf.php且存在mosConfig_absolute_path参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a mosConfig_absolute_path parameter and accesses to /components/com_smf/smf.php at the web server

中文: Mambo部分 com_smf smf.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Mambo Component com_smf smf.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和          /components/com_smf/smf.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数mosConfig_absolute_path。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /components/com_smf/smf.php, and if the parameter "mosConfig_absolute_path" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla!的 Jimtawl（com_jimtawl）组件1.0.2版本中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助向index.php传递的task参数中的“..”操作符，读取任意文件或者可能引起其他未明影响。
en-US: Jimtawl（com_jimtawl) component 1.0.2 in Joomla! is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can read arbitrary file via a '..' of task parameter passed to index.php or cause other unspecified effects.

中文: 建议更新到1.0.2之后版本
en-US: It is suggested to update to later than version 1.0.2.

中文: Joomla Jimtawl部分 task参数存在远程文件捆绑
en-US: Joomla Jimtawl Component task Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有   /index.php和 option=com_jimtawl参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /index.php, and if the parameter "option=com_jimtawl" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: WebRCSdiff中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助viewver.php的doc_root参数的一个URL执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: e107 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of doc_root parameter in viewver.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/viewver.php且存在doc_root参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a doc_root parameter and accesses to /viewver.php at the web server.

中文: WebRCSdiff viewver.php 文件捆绑尝试
en-US: WebRCSdiff viewver.php File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和          /viewver.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数doc_root。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /viewver.php, and if the parameter "doc_root" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
CommodityRentals Books/eBooks Rentals 是一款开源的基于Windows、Unix、Linux 平台的书籍租赁软件。 
        CommodityRentals CD Rental Software的脚本index.php存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助目录操作中的cat_id参数，执行任意的SQL命令。
en-US:
CommodityRentals Books/eBooks Rentals is an open source book rental software for Windows、Unix and Linux.
index.php in CommodityRentals CD Rental Software is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via cat_id parameter in directory operation.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含index.php并带有view=catalog、item_type=M、UPDATE SET参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include index.php and with a view=catalog、item_type=M、UPDATE SET parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测  DVD Rental Software cat_id参数UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: DVD Rental Software cat_id parameter UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/index.php和 GET 和 view=catalog和item_type=M且满足于QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配（UPDATE SET）则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /index.php, GET, view=catalog and item_type=M, and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matches（UPDATE SET),  request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
Joomla! 是一款开放源码的内容管理系统(CMS)。 
        Joomla!中的Community Builder Enhanced (CBE) (com_cbe)组件1.4.8，1.4.9以及1.4.10版本中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者利用该漏洞通过userProfile操作中的tabname参数中的‘..’传送到index.php脚本，包含并执行任意本地文件。注意：通过使用文件上传功能可被利用执行任意代码。
en-US:
Joomla! is a open source content management system.
Community Builder Enhanced (CBE) (com_cbe) component 1.4.8, 1.4.9 and 1.4.10 are prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can include and run arbitrary file via a '..' of view parameter in userProfile operation passing to index.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/index.php和option=com_cbe和task=userProfile，tabname参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /index.php, option=com_cbe and task=userProfile and a tabname parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Joomla Community Builder Enhenced部分本地文件捆绑
en-US: Joomla Community Builder Enhenced Component Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有   /index.php和option=com_cbe和task=userProfile。tabname参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php, option=com_cbe and task=userProfile, and if the parameter "tabname" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: ZyXEL P-660R-T1的Forms/home_1中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助HomeCurrent_Date参数，注入任意的web脚本或HTML
en-US: Forms/home_1 in ZyXEL P-660R-T1 is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via HomeCurrent_Date parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问Forms/home_1且存在HomeCurrent_Date参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a HomeCurrent_Date parameter and accesses to Forms/home_1 at the web server.

中文: 检测 ZyXEL P-660R-T1 HomeCurrent_Date参数XSS攻击
en-US: ZyXEL P-660R-T1 HomeCurrent_Date Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/Forms/home_1且带有可SQL注入的参数HomeCurrent_Date则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /Forms/home_1 and the parameter "HomeCurrent_Date" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Gbook MX中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助gbookmx/gbook.php的newlangsel参数的一个URL执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: Gbook MX is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of newlangsel parameter in gbookmx/gbook.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/gbookmx/gbook.php且存在newlangsel参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a newlangsel parameter and accesses to /gbookmx/gbook.php at the web server.

中文: Gbook MX newlangsel 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Gbook MX newlangsel Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         /gbookmx/gbook.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数newlangsel。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /gbookmx/gbook.php, and if the parameter "newlangsel" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Seo Panel中的download.php 存在目录遍历漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助file参数中的目录遍历序列和filesec=sitemap和filetype=text包含和运行任意的本地文件。
en-US: download.php in Seo Panel is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can include and run arbitrary local file via a directory traversal sequence of file parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/download.php和filesec=sitemap和filetype=text，file参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /download.php，filesec=sitemap and filetype=text and a field with '../' parameter at the web server.

中文: Seo Panel file参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Seo Panel file Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /download.php和filesec=sitemap和filetype=text。 file 变量的中是否包含..//。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /download.php, filesec=sitemap and filetype=text, and if the variable "file" contains ..//. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: PreProjects Pre Online Tests Generator Pro中的takefreestart.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助tid2参数执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: takefreestart.php in PreProjects Pre Online Tests Generator Pro is prone to SQL injection. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via tid2 parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含takefreestart.php并带有tid2参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include takefreestart.php and with a tid2 parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测 Pre Online Tests Generator Pro UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: Pre Online Tests Generator Pro UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/takefreestart.php和 GET 并带有可SQL注入的参数tid2则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /takefreestart.php, GET and the parameter "tid2" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Abtp Portal中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助includes/esqueletos/skel_null.php的ABTPV_BLOQUE_CENTRAL参数的一个URL执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: Abtp Portal is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of ABTPV_BLOQUE_CENTRAL parameter in includes/esqueletos/skel_null.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/includes/esqueletos/skel_null.php且存在ABTPV_BLOQUE_CENTRAL参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a ABTPV_BLOQUE_CENTRAL parameter and accesses to /includes/esqueletos/skel_null.php at the web server.

中文: Abtp Portal Project skel_null.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Abtp Portal Project skel_null.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         /includes/esqueletos/skel_null.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数ABTPV_BLOQUE_CENTRAL。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /includes/esqueletos/skel_null.php, and if the parameter "ABTPV_BLOQUE_CENTRAL" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Abtp Portal Project 中的skel_null.php在目录遍历漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助ABTPV_BLOQUE_CENTRAL参数中的目录遍历序列运行任意的本地文件。
en-US: skel_null.php in Abtp Portal Project is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can run arbitrary file via directory traversal sequence of ABTPV_BLOQUE_CENTRAL parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/includes/esqueletos/skel_null.php，ABTPV_BLOQUE_CENTRAL参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /includes/esqueletos/skel_null.php and a field parameter with ABTPV_BLOQUE_CENTRAL at the web server.

中文: Abtp Portal Project skel_null.php 尝试与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Abtp Portal Project skel_null.php Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /includes/esqueletos/skel_null.php和 ABTPV_BLOQUE_CENTRAL变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /includes/esqueletos/skel_null.php, and if the variable "ABTPV_BLOQUE_CENTRAL" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: N-13 News 1.2的login.php中存在SQL注入漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过default_login_language参数执行任意SQL指令。
en-US: login.php in N-13 News 1.2 is prone to SQL injection. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via default_login_language parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/modules/login.php，default_login_language参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /modules/login.php and a default_login_language with parameter at the web server.

中文: N-13 News default_login_language参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: N-13 News default_login_language Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /modules/login.php和 option=com_cbe和task=userProfile。default_login_language变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /modules/login.php, option=com_cbe and task=userProfile, and if the variable "default_login_language" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
eNdonesia 是一款基于PHP的内容管理系统。 
        eNdonesia 8.4版本中的Publisher模块中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助mod.php文件的printarticle操作中的artid参数执行任意SQL命令。
en-US:
eNdonesia is a content management system based on PHP.
Publisher module in eNdonesia 8.4 is prone to SQL injection. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via artid parameter in printarticle operation of mod.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含mod.php并带有artid参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include mod.php and with a artid parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测 eNdonesia artid参数UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: eNdonesia artid Parameter UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/mod.php和 GET 和 mod=publisher和op=printarticle并带有可SQL注入的参数artid则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /mod.php, GET, mod=publisher, op=printarticle and the parameter "artid" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Contenido 4.9.5及之前版本的cms/front_content.php脚本中存在跨站脚本漏洞。当程序禁用advanced mod rewrite(AMR)时，远程攻击者可借助‘idart’、‘lang’或‘idcat’参数利用该漏洞注入任意Web脚本或HTML。
en-US: Contenido 4.9.5b and earlier version is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. When the advanced mod rewrite(AMR) is disabled, Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via ‘idart',‘lang’or‘idcat’parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问en/front_content.php且存在idart参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a idart parameter and accesses to en/front_content.php at the web server.

中文: 检测 Contenido idart参数XSS攻击
en-US: Contenido idart Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/en/front_content.php且带有可XSS攻击的参数idart则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /en/front_content.php and the parameter "idart" that is vulnerable to XSS attack, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: MantisBT中的upgrade_unattended.php存在目录遍历漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助db_type参数中的目录遍历序列包含和运行任意的本地文件。
en-US: upgrade_unattended.php in MantisBT is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can include and run arbitrary file via directory traversal sequence of db_type parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/admin/upgrade_unattended.php，db_type参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /admin/upgrade_unattended.php and a db_type parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: MantisBT db_type参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: MantisBT db_type Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       /admin/upgrade_unattended.php和  db_type 变量的中是否包含..\x2f。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /admin/upgrade_unattended.php, and if the variable "db_type" contains ..\x2f. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: MantisBT 1.2.4之前版本中的admin/upgrade_unattended.php文件中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助db_type参数注入任意web脚本或者HTML。
en-US: admin/upgrade_unattended.php in MantisBT before 1.2.4 is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via db_type parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问admin/upgrade_unattended.php且存在db_type参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a db_type parameter and accesses to admin/upgrade_unattended.php at the web server.

中文: 检测 MantisBT db_type参数XSS攻击
en-US: MantisBT db_type Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/admin/upgrade_unattended.php且带有可SQL注入的参数db_type则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /admin/upgrade_unattended.php and the parameter "db_type" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Google Urchin中的app=urchin.cgi存在目录遍历漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助gfid参数中的目录遍历序列包含和运行任意的本地文件。
en-US: app=urchin.cgi in Google Urchin is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can include and run arbitrary file via directory traversal sequence of gfid parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含app=urchin.cgi和action=prop，gfid参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include app=urchin.cgi as well as action=prop and a field parameter with at the web server.

中文: Google Urchin session.cgi 尝试与本地文件捆绑
en-US: Google Urchin session.cgi Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有       action=prop和app=urchin.cgi。gfid变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, action=prop and app=urchin.cgi, and if the variable "gfid" contains../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: WordPress的Safe Search插件0.7版本中的safe-search/wp-safe-search-jx.php文件中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助v1参数注入任意web脚本或者HTML
en-US: safe-search/wp-safe-search-jx.php in WordPress Safe Search plugin 0.7 is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via v1 parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似wp-content/plugins/wp-safe-search/wp-safe-search-jx.php?v1=v1= script/onmouse等的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that contians uri like wp-content/plugins/wp-safe-search/wp-safe-search-jx.php?v1=v1= script/onmouse at the web server.

中文: WordPress Safe Search 插件v1参数  跨站脚本攻击尝试
en-US: WordPress Safe Search Plugin v1 Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有   /wp-content/plugins/wp-safe-search/wp-safe-search-jx.php。  v1中是否包含v1=.+(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange|style=)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /wp-content/plugins/wp-safe-search/wp-safe-search-jx.php, and if "v1" contains v1=.+(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange|style=). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla Billy Portfolio组件中的/index.php存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助catid参数，执行SQL指令。
en-US: /index.php in Joomla Billy Portfolio is prone to SQL injection. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via catid parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含 /index.php和 option=com_billyportfolio和view=billyportfolio并带有catid参数带有and.*if(的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /index.php, option=com_billyportfolio and view=billyportfolio and a modulename parameter with 'and.*if' at the web server.

中文: Joomla部分 Billy Portfolio catid参数 Blind SQL注入
en-US: Joomla Component Billy Portfolio catid Parameter Blind SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有   /index.php和option=com_billyportfolio和 view=billyportfolio。catid参数的值是否包含and  if()。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php, option=com_billyportfolio and view=billyportfolio, and if the parameter "catid" contains and  if(). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: MyBloggie 2.1.1及更早版本中的远程文件包含漏洞，允许远程攻击者通过传给(1)admin.php或(2)scode.php的contenido_path的mybloggie_root_path参数中的URL来执行任意PHP代码。注：后续有多个第三方对此问题提出争议，指出MyBloggie源码并没有显露这个问题，可能是其他模块的问题导致。自20060605起CVE分析认同此争议。此外，scode.php不是MyBloggie发布包的组成部分。注，据报告'scode.php'脚本对2.1.3版本无影响。
en-US: MyBloggie 2.1.1 and earlier is prone to remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of mybloggie_root_path passed to (1)admin.php or contenido_path of (2)scode.php.Note:Later there are several the third party argue that the MyBloggie source code doesn't expose this issue, it may be caused by other module. Besides, scode.php is not the component of MyBloggie released packet.Note:It is reported that the 'scode.php' script has no effect on version 2.1.3.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/pingsvr.php且存在mybloggie_root_path参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a mybloggie_root_path parameter and accesses to /pingsvr.php at the web server.

中文: myBloggie mybloggie_root_path 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: myBloggie mybloggie_root_path Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和          /pingsvr.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数mybloggie_root_path。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /pingsvr.php, and if the parameter "mybloggie_root_path" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla Seyret Video com_seyret组件中的/index.php存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助id参数，执行SQL指令。
en-US: /index.php in Joomla Seyret Video com_seyret component is prone to SQL injection. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via secid parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php和含有option=com_zoomportfolio和view=portfolio并且id参数带有SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO，UPDATE SET等关键词的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /index.php, option=com_zoomportfolio and view=portfolio and a field parameter with keywords SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO and UPDATE SET at the web server.

中文: Joomla Seyret Video com_seyret部分 Blind SQL注入
en-US: Joomla Seyret Video com_seyret Component Blind SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有   /index.php和 option=com_seyret和  task=videodirectlink。id参数的值是否带有SQL语句(ASCII SELECT)。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php, option=com_seyret and task=videodirectlink, and if the parameter "id" contains SQL statement (ASCII SELECT). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Informacion General 的 /informacion_general.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可借助id参数执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: /informacion_general.php in Informacion General is prone to SQL injection vulnerability. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via id parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/informacion_general.php并带有id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /informacion_general.php and with a id parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测 Informacion General informacion_general.php UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: Informacion General informacion_general.php UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/informacion_general.php 和GET且带有可SQL注入的参数id则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /informacion_general.php, GET and the parameter "id" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: WordPress插件存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助email参数注入任意web脚本或者HTML
en-US: WordPress plugin is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via email parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似/plugins/accept-signups/accept-signups_submit.php?email=email = script、onmouse等的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that contians uri like /plugins/accept-signups/accept-signups_submit.php?email=email = script、onmouse at the web server.

中文: WORDPRESS 插件Accept Signups email参数  跨站脚本攻击尝试
en-US: WORDPRESS Plugin Accept Signups email Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有   /plugins/accept-signups/accept-signups_submit.php。email中是否包含email=.+(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange|style=)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /plugins/accept-signups/accept-signups_submit.php, and if "email" contains email=.+(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange|style=). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: GForge 3.3及更早版本中存在目录遍历漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过一个在传递给controller.php的(1)dir参数，或传递给controlleroo.php的(2)dir_name参数内的一个..(点点)来列示任意目录
en-US: Forge 3.3 and earlier is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can show arbitrary directory  via a '..' of (2)dir_name parameter passed to controlleroo.php or (1)dir parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/blocks/file/controller.php且存在DIR_FILES_BLOCK_TYPES_CORE参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a DIR_FILES_BLOCK_TYPES_CORE parameter and accesses to /blocks/file/controller.php at the web server.

中文: Concrete DIR_FILES_BLOCK_TYPES_CORE 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Concrete DIR_FILES_BLOCK_TYPES_CORE Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         /blocks/file/controller.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数DIR_FILES_BLOCK_TYPES_CORE。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /blocks/file/controller.php, and if the parameter "DIR_FILES_BLOCK_TYPES_CORE" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
Joomla com_xmovie 组件中存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助对/com_xmovie/helpers/img.php的file参数中的一
个..，读取任意文件。
en-US: Joomla com_xmovie component is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can read arbitrary file via a '..' of file parameter in /com_xmovie/helpers/img.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含 /com_xmovie/helpers/img.php并带有file参数带有..的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /com_xmovie/helpers/img.php and a file parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Joomla部分 com_xmovie file参数文件捆绑
en-US: Joomla Component com_xmovie file Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有   /com_xmovie/helpers/img.php和 option=com_seyret和  file参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /com_xmovie/helpers/img.php and option=com_seyret, and if the parameter "file" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Tiki Wiki CMS Groupware 存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助向tiki-jsplugin.php传递的language参数中的“..”操作符，读取任意文件或者可能引起其他未明影响。
en-US: Tiki Wiki CMS Groupware is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can read arbitrary file via a '..' of language parameter passed to tiki-jsplugin.php or cause other unspecified effects.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/tiki-jsplugin.php，language参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /tiki-jsplugin.php and a language parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Tiki Wiki 内容管理系统 Groupware language参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Tiki Wiki CMS Groupware language Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有        /tiki-jsplugin.php和language变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /tiki-jsplugin.php, and if the variable "language" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Nucleus 3.23存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1) path/action.php中, 以及对包括 (2) media.php, (3) /xmlrpc/server.php和(4) /xmlrpc/api_metaweblog.inc.php的path/nucleus中的文件的DIR_LIBS参数中的URL，执行任意PHP代码。 注：此漏洞类似于CVE-2006-2583。注：第三方对此提出反驳，声称DIR_LIBS 参数在被使用前已在include文件中定义
en-US: Nucleus 3.23 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of DIR_LIBS parameter in (1) path/action.php, (2) media.php,(3) /xmlrpc/server.php and (4) /xmlrpc/api_metaweblog.inc.php and in path/nucleus.Note: This vulnerability is similar to CVE-2006-2583. The third party argue that the DIR_LIBS parameter is defined in include before used.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/action.php且存在DIR_LIBS参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a DIR_LIBS parameter and accesses to /action.php at the web server.

中文: Nucleus action.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Nucleus action.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         /action.php和是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数DIR_LIBS。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /action.php, and if the parameter "DIR_LIBS" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Nucleus 3.23存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1) path/action.php中, 以及对包括 (2) media.php, (3) /xmlrpc/server.php和(4) /xmlrpc/api_metaweblog.inc.php的path/nucleus中的文件的DIR_LIBS参数中的URL，执行任意PHP代码。 注：此漏洞类似于CVE-2006-2583。注：第三方对此提出反驳，声称DIR_LIBS 参数在被使用前已在include文件中定义
en-US: Nucleus 3.23 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of DIR_LIBS parameter in (1) path/action.php, (2) media.php,(3) /xmlrpc/server.php and (4) /xmlrpc/api_metaweblog.inc.php and in path/nucleus.Note: This vulnerability is similar to CVE-2006-2583. The third party argue that the DIR_LIBS parameter is defined in include before used.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/nucleus/media.php且存在DIR_LIBS参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a DIR_LIBS parameter and accesses to /nucleus/media.php at the web server.

中文: Nucleus media.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Nucleus media.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         /nucleus/media.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数DIR_LIBS。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /nucleus/media.php, and if the parameter "DIR_LIBS" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Nucleus 3.23存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1) path/action.php中, 以及对包括 (2) media.php, (3) /xmlrpc/server.php和(4) /xmlrpc/api_metaweblog.inc.php的path/nucleus中的文件的DIR_LIBS参数中的URL，执行任意PHP代码。 注：此漏洞类似于CVE-2006-2583。注：第三方对此提出反驳，声称DIR_LIBS 参数在被使用前已在include文件中定义
en-US: Nucleus 3.23 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of DIR_LIBS parameter in (1) path/action.php, (2) media.php,(3) /xmlrpc/server.php and (4) /xmlrpc/api_metaweblog.inc.php and in path/nucleus.Note: This vulnerability is similar to CVE-2006-2583. The third party argue that the DIR_LIBS parameter is defined in include before used.

en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a DIR_LIBS parameter and accesses to /nucleus/xmlrpc/server.php at the web server.

中文: Nucleus server.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Nucleus server.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         /nucleus/xmlrpc/server.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数DIR_LIBS。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /nucleus/xmlrpc/server.php, and if the parameter "DIR_LIBS" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Nucleus 3.23存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1) path/action.php中, 以及对包括 (2) media.php, (3) /xmlrpc/server.php和(4) /xmlrpc/api_metaweblog.inc.php的path/nucleus中的文件的DIR_LIBS参数中的URL，执行任意PHP代码。 注：此漏洞类似于CVE-2006-2583。注：第三方对此提出反驳，声称DIR_LIBS 参数在被使用前已在include文件中定义
en-US: Nucleus 3.23 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of DIR_LIBS parameter in (1) path/action.php, (2) media.php,(3) /xmlrpc/server.php and (4) /xmlrpc/api_metaweblog.inc.php and in path/nucleus.Note: This vulnerability is similar to CVE-2006-2583. The third party argue that the DIR_LIBS parameter is defined in include before used.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/nucleus/libs/PLUGINADMIN.php且存在DIR_LIBS参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a DIR_LIBS parameter and accesses to /nucleus/libs/PLUGINADMIN.php at the web server.

中文: Nucleus PLUGINADMIN.php远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Nucleus PLUGINADMIN.php Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和          /nucleus/libs/PLUGINADMIN.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数DIR_LIBS。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /nucleus/libs/PLUGINADMIN.php, and if the parameter "DIR_LIBS" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: axdcms存在目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助向/modules/profile/user.php传递的aXconf[default_language] 参数中的“..”操作符，读取任意文件或者可能引起其他未明影响。
en-US: axdcms is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can read arbitrary file via a '..' of aXconf[default_language] parameter in /modules/profile/user.php.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/modules/profile/user.php，aXconf[default_language] 参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /modules/profile/user.php and with a aXconf[default_language] parameter at the web server.

中文: axdcms aXconf参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: axdcms aXconf Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有        /modules/profile/user.php和aXconf[default_language] 变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /modules/profile/user.php, and if the variable "aXconf[default_language]" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: bizdir的bizdir.cgi中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助f_srch参数，注入任意的web脚本或HTML
en-US: bizdir.cgi in bizdir is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via f_srch parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问bizdir/bizdir.cgi且存在f_srch参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a f_srch parameter and accesses to bizdir/bizdir.cgi at the web server.

中文: 检测 bizdir.cgi f_srch参数XSS攻击
en-US: bizdir.cgi f_srch Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/bizdir/bizdir.cgi且带有可SQL注入的参数f_srch则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /bizdir/bizdir.cgi and the parameter "f_srch" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Zimplit CMS 3.0也可能在之前版本中存在多个跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1)对zimplit.php文件的load操作中的file参数，以及(2)向English_manual_version_2.php文件传递的client参数注入任意web脚本或者HTML。
en-US: Zimplit CMS 3.0 and earlier is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via file in load operation to zimplit.php and client parameter passed to English_manual_version_2.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问English_manual_version_2.php且存在client参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a client parameter and accesses to English_manual_version_2.php at the web server.

中文: 检测 Zimplit CMS client参数XSS攻击
en-US: Zimplit CMS client Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /English_manual_version_2.php且带有可SQL注入的参数client则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /English_manual_version_2.php and the parameter "client" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Zimplit CMS 3.0也可能在之前版本中存在多个跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1)对zimplit.php文件的load操作中的file参数，以及(2)向English_manual_version_2.php文件传递的client参数注入任意web脚本或者HTML。
en-US: Zimplit CMS 3.0 and earlier is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via file in load operation to zimplit.php and client parameter passed to English_manual_version_2.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问zimplit.php且存在file参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a file parameter and accesses to zimplit.php at the web server.

中文: 检测 Zimplit CMS file参数XSS攻击
en-US: Zimplit CMS file Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到 /zimplit.php和 action=load且带有可SQL注入的参数file则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /zimplit.php, action=load and the parameter "file" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: CMS Mundo 1.0 build 008以及可能的其他版本存在多个SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1)(a) news 模块中的news_id 参数，(2)(b)search 模块中的 searchstring 参数， (3)(c)webshop 模块中的 id 参数，(4) (d) index.php中的username 参数， 以及(e) 用户配置文件更新过程中的(5) Name， (6) Address， (7) Zip，(8) City， (9) Country和(10) Email字段，执行任意SQL指令。
en-US: CMS Mundo 1.0 build 008 other version is prone to multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities. Attacker can execute arbitrary SQL commmand via news_id parameter in news module,searchstring parameter in (b)search, id parameter in (c)webshop module, username in (d) index.php and (5) Name， (6) Address， (7) Zip，(8) City， (9) Country and (10) Email fileds in (e) user configure file when doing update.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/program/moduler_banner_aabn.php并带有id参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /program/moduler_banner_aabn.php and with a id parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测 Tunngavik CMS id参数UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: Tunngavik CMS id Parameter UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/program/moduler_banner_aabn.php和 GET 并带有可SQL注入的参数id则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /program/moduler_banner_aabn.php, GET and the parameter "id" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: B-Cumulus的tagcloud.swf中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助tagcloud参数，注入任意的web脚本或HTML
en-US: tagcloud.swf in B-Cumulus is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via tagcloud parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问tagcloud.swf且存在tagcloud参数与mode=tags等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a tagcloud parameter as well as mode=tags keyword and accesses to tagcloud.swf at the web server.

中文: 检测 B-Cumulus tagcloud.swf XSS攻击
en-US: B-Cumulus tagcloud.swf Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/tagcloud.swf和mode=tags且带有可SQL注入的参数tagcloud则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /tagcloud.swf, mode=tags and the parameter "tagcloud" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

There is a directory traversal vulnerability in op / op.Login.php for LetoDMS (formerly MyDMS), which allows remote authentication users to include and execute arbitrary local files with the ".." character of the lang parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/op/op.Login.php，lang参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /op/op.Login.php and a lang parameter with at the web server.

中文: LetoDMS lang参数与本地文件捆绑尝试

如果在请求行 查找到/modules/boonex/custom_rss/post_mod_crss.php且满足于 QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY 匹配(?i:relocate\x3d.+(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange|style\x3D)
)关键则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US:
If the request contains /modules/boonex/custom_rss/post_mod_crss.php and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matches (?i:relocate\x3d.+(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange|style\x3D)
), request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Horde的barcode.php存在目录遍历漏洞，远程认证用户可以通过type参数的".."符包含并执行任意本地文件。
en-US: barcode.php in Horde is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can execute arbitrary local file via a '..' of type parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含/util/barcode.php，type参数带有../的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /util/barcode.php and a type parameter with '../' at the web server.

中文: Horde type参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Horde type Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有        /util/barcode.php和type 变量的中是否包含../。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /util/barcode.php, and if the variable "type" contains ../. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Woltlab Burning Board 的 /hilfsmittel.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可借助katid参数执行任意SQL命令。
en-US: /hilfsmittel.php in Woltlab Burning Board is prone to SQL injection. Attacker can execute arbitrary SQL commmand via katid parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/hilfsmittel.php并带有katid参数的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /hilfsmittel.php and with a katid parameter at the web server.

中文: 检测 Woltlab Burning Board katid参数UPDATE SET SQL注入攻击
en-US: Woltlab Burning Board katid Parameter UPDATE SET SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/hilfsmittel.php和 GET 和action=read并带有可SQL注入的参数katid则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /hilfsmittel.php, GET, action=read and the parameter "katid" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: core/themes.php in Podcast Generator is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via L_failedopentheme parameter.

中文: IBM Lotus Sametime 8.0.1版本的服务器中的stconf.nsf中存在多个跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助（1）WebMessage操作中的messageString参数，或者（2）PATH_INFO注入任意web脚本或者HTML。
en-US: stconf.nsf in BM Lotus Sametime 8.0.1 server is prone to multiple cross-site scripting. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via messageStrin in WebMessage operation or PATH_INFO.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问stconf.nsf/WebMessage且存在messageString参数与OpenView等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a OpenView keyword and accesses to stconf.nsf/WebMessage at the web server.

en-US: IBM Lotus Sametime Server stconf.nsf Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到stconf.nsf/WebMessage且带有可SQL注入的参数messageString则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains stconf.nsf/WebMessage and the parameter "messageString" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: IBM Lotus Sametime 8.0.1版本的服务器中的stconf.nsf中存在多个跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助（1）WebMessage操作中的messageString参数，或者（2）PATH_INFO注入任意web脚本或者HTML。
en-US: stconf.nsf in BM Lotus Sametime 8.0.1 server is prone to multiple cross-site scripting. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via messageStrin in WebMessage operation or PATH_INFO.

中文: 检测 IBM Lotus Sametime Server stconf.nsf XSS攻击
en-US: IBM Lotus Sametime Server stconf.nsf Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文:
如果在请求行 查找到  stconf.nsf且满足于QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY匹配(?i:stconf.nsf.+(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange|style\x3D).+
unescape)等关键则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US:
If the request contains stconf.nsf and QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY matches (?i:stconf.nsf.+(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange|style\x3D).+
unescape), request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: WordPress中的BackWPup插件1.4.1之前版本中存在多个目录遍历漏洞。远程攻击者可利用这些漏洞通过wpabs参数传送到(1)app/options-view_log-iframe.php或(2)app/options-runnow-iframe.php脚本中的..（点点），读取任意文件
en-US: WordPress BackWPup plugin before 1.4.1 is prone to multiple directory traversal vulnerability. Remote attacker can read arbitrary file via a wpabs parameter passed to (1)app/options-view_log-iframe.php or (2)app/options-runnow-iframe.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似/options-runnow-iframe.php?wpabs=null的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that contians uri like /options-runnow-iframe.php?wpabs=null at the web server.

中文: Potential Wordpress披露本地文件漏洞
en-US: Potential Wordpress local file disclosure vulnerability

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有        /options-runnow-iframe.php?wpabs=/和 QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY变量的中是否包含\x00&。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /options-runnow-iframe.php?wpabs=/, and if the variable "QUERY_STRING|REQUEST_BODY" contains \x00&. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: WordPress Lazyest Gallery 插件image参数  跨站脚本攻击尝试
en-US: WordPress Lazyest Gallery Plugin image Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有   /wp-content/plugins/lazyest-gallery/lazyest-popup.php。image是否包含:image=.+(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange|style=)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /wp-content/plugins/lazyest-gallery/lazyest-popup.php; and if "image" contains image=.+(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange|style=). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Interleave的basicstats.php中存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助AjaxHandler参数，注入任意的web脚本或HTML
en-US: basicstats.php in Interleave is prone to cross-site scripting. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via AjaxHandler parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问basicstats.php且存在AjaxHandler参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a AjaxHandler parameter and accesses to basicstats.php at the web server.

中文: 检测 Interleave basicstats.php AjaxHandler参数XSS攻击
en-US: Interleave basicstats.php AjaxHandler Parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/basicstats.php且带有可SQL注入的参数AjaxHandler则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /basicstats.php  and parameter "AjaxHandler" that is vulnerable to SQL injection, the request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: ardeaCore PHP Framework 2.2版本的ardeaCore/lib/core/ardeaInit.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可借助pathForArdeaCore参数中的URL执行任意PHP代码。

en-US: ardeaCore PHP Framework appMVCPath Parameter Remote File Inclusion Attempt

中文:
QooxDoo是一个全面和创新的AJAX应用程序框架。 
        在eyeOS 2.2，2.3及其他产品中使用的QooxDoo 1.3及其他版本中存在目录遍历漏洞。向framework/source/resource/qx/test/part/delay.php中输入的file参数还没有经过正确验证就被用于显示文件，远程攻击者可以借助file参数中的“..%2f”序列，读取任意文件
en-US:
QooxDoo is a comprehensive and innovative AJAX application framework.
QooxDoo 1.3 and other version used in eyeOS 2.2，2.3 as well as other products is prone to directory traversal vulnerability. The file parameter input into framework/source/resource/qx/test/part/delay.php is used to show file before a valid verification, and the attacker can read arbitrary file via "..%2f" sequence in file parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把包含 /devtools/qooxdoo-sdk/framework/source/resource/qx/test/part/delay.php，sleep参数带有../和file=的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that contians/devtools/qooxdoo-sdk/framework/source/resource/qx/test/part/delay.php and the sleep with '../' as well as 'file=' at the web server.

中文: eyeOS file参数与本地文件捆绑尝试
en-US: eyeOS file Parameter Local File Inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有        /devtools/qooxdoo-sdk/framework/source/resource/qx/test/part/delay.php和 sleep变量的中是否包含..\x2f。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /devtools/qooxdoo-sdk/framework/source/resource/qx/test/part/delay.php; and if variable "sleep" contains ..\x2f. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文:
Andy's PHP Knowledgebase是一款使用MySQL驱动的知识库管理系统。 
        Andy's PHP Knowledgebase（Aphpkb）0.95.4版本的plugins/pdfClasses/pdfgen.php中存在SQL注入漏洞。由于pdfa参数还没有经过正确过滤就被用于SQL查询，远程攻击者可以通过注入任意SQL代码，操作SQL查询。
en-US:
Andy's PHP Knowledgebase is a MySQL driven KBMS(knowledge base management system).
plugins/pdfClasses/pdfgen.php in Andy's PHP Knowledgebase（Aphpkb）0.95.4 version is prone to SQL injection because of the pdfa parameter is used to a SQL query without properly filter. Remote attacker can operate SQL query via inject arbitrary SQL code.

en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri contains plugins/pdfClasses/pdfgen.php and with a pdfa parameter at the web server.

中文:
Joomla mod_virtuemart_latestprod模块中的/modules/mod_virtuemart_latestprod/mod_virtuemart_latestprod.php存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远
程攻击者可以借助mosConfig_absolute_path参数中的一个URL，执行任意的PHP代码。
en-US: /modules/mod_virtuemart_latestprod/mod_virtuemart_latestprod.php in Joomla mod_virtuemart_latestprod is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL of mosConfig_absolute_path parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/modules/mod_virtuemart_latestprod/mod_virtuemart_latestprod.php并带有mosConfig_absolute_path参数带有一个url 的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri contains /modules/mod_virtuemart_latestprod/mod_virtuemart_latestprod.php and with a mosConfig_absolute_path parameter at the web server.

中文: Joomla mod_virtuemart_latestprod module远程文件捆绑
en-US: Joomla mod_virtuemart_latestprod module Remote File inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有    /modules/mod_virtuemart_latestprod/mod_virtuemart_latestprod.php和 mosConfig_absolute_path参数的值是否包含mosConfig_absolute_path=(ftps?|https?|php):/。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /modules/mod_virtuemart_latestprod/mod_virtuemart_latestprod.php; and if the parameter "mosConfig_absolute_path" contains mosConfig_absolute_path=(ftps?|https?|php):/. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: WordPress SocialGrid插件中存在跨站脚本漏洞。远程攻击者可借助default_services参数利用该漏洞注入任意Web脚本或HTML。
en-US: WordPress SocialGrid plugin is prone to cross-site scripting. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via default_services parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把含有类似/plugins/socialgrid/static/js/inline-admin.js.php?default_services=default_services= script/onmouse等的uri的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the requests whose uri include /plugins/socialgrid/static/js/inline-admin.js.php?default_services=default_services= script/onmouse at the web server.

中文: WordPress SocialGrid 插件default_services 跨站脚本攻击
en-US: WordPress SocialGrid Plugin default_services Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有   /plugins/socialgrid/static/js/inline-admin.js.php。default_services是否包含:default_services=.+(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange|style=)。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /plugins/socialgrid/static/js/inline-admin.js.php, and if the "default_services" contains default_services=.+(script|onmouse[a-z]+|onkey[a-z]+|onload|onunload|ondragdrop|onblur|onfocus|onclick|ondblclick|onsubmit|onreset|onselect|onchange|style=). If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: BlueShoes Framework 4.6存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可通过在传给(a) Bs_Faq.class.php的(1)APP[path][applications]参数，传给(b)fileBrowserInner.php，(c)file.php和(d)viewer.php和(e)Bs_ImageArchive.class.php的(2)APP[path][core]参数，传给(f)Bs_Ml_User.class.php的(3)GLOBALS[APP][path][core]参数或者传给(g) Bs_Wse_Profile.class.php的(4)APP[path][plugins]参数中的URL来执行任意PHP代码。
en-US: BlueShoes Framework 4.6 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities. Attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via URL in (1)APP[path][applications] parameter, which is passed to (a) Bs_Faq.class.php, to (b)fileBrowserInner.php, to (c)file.php and to (d)viewer.php, in (2)APP[path][core] parameter passed to (e)Bs_ImageArchive.class.php, in (3)GLOBALS[APP][path][core] passed to (f)Bs_Ml_User.class.php and in APP[path][plugins] parameter passed to (g) Bs_Wse_Profile.class.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/include/classes/file.class.php且存在filePath参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a filePath parameter and accesses to /include/classes/file.class.php at the web server.

en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /include/classes/file.class.php, and if the parameter "filePath" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Legrinder Drunken:Golem Gaming Portal 'admin_news_bot.php'PHP远程文件包含漏洞--Drunken:Golem Gaming Portal 0.5.1 alpha 2中的admin/admin_news_bot.php中存在PHP远程文件包含漏洞，远程攻击者可以借助root_path参数中的一个URL执行任意PHP代码
en-US: Legrinder Drunken:Golem Gaming Portal 'admin_news_bot.php' PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability.--Drunken: admin/admin_news_bot.php in Golem Gaming Portal 0.5.1 alpha 2 is prone to PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability, remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via a url of root_path parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/admin/admin_news_bot.php且存在root_path参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a root_path parameter and accesses to /admin/admin_news_bot.php at the web server.

中文: Golem Gaming Portal root_path 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Golem Gaming Portal root_path Parameter Remote File inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数root_path/'和 adminlangfile参数的值是否包含../。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and  parameter "root_path/'" that contains remote file inclusion; and if the value of parameter "adminlangfile" contains ../.  If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: WebAuction中的lib/jscalendar/test.php存在跨站脚本攻击漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助lang参数，注入任意的web脚本或HTML
en-US: lib/jscalendar/test.php in WebAuction is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability. Remote attacker can inject arbitrary web script or HTML via lang parameter.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/lib/jscalendar/test.php且存在lang参数等关键字都请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a lang parameter and accesses to /lib/jscalendar/test.php at the web server.

中文: 检测 WebAuction lang参数XSS攻击
en-US: WebAuction lang parameter Cross Site Scripting Attempt

中文: 如果在请求行 查找到/lib/jscalendar/test.php且带有可XSS攻击的参数lang则规则匹配，拦截并设置参数
en-US: If the request contains /lib/jscalendar/test.php and parameter "lang" that is vulnerable to XSS attack, the request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: Joomla com_hello 组件中的/index.php存在SQL注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助secid参数，执行SQL指令。
en-US: /index.php in Joomla com_hello component is prone to SQL injection. Attacker can execute SQL commmand via secid parameter.

中文: 建议web服务器把uri中包含/index.php和含有ption=com_hello并且secid参数带有SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO，UPDATE SET等关键词的请求给过滤了。
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request whose url contains /index.php as well as ption=com_hello the secid parameter contians keywords like SELECT FROM，DELETE FROM，UNION SELECT，INSERT INTO，UPDATE SET at the web server.

中文: Joomla部分 com_hello SELECT FROM SQL注入
en-US: Joomla Component com_hello SELECT FROM SQL Injection Attempt

中文: 检测请求是否为GET，和在请求行中带有    /index.php和 option=com_hello。secid参数的值是否包含SQL语句（SELECT FROM）。如果规则匹配将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET, /index.php and option=com_hello ; and if the value of parameter "secid" contains SQL statement （SELECT FROM）.  If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /authenticate/sessions.php; and if the variable "globalIncludeFilePath" contains ../ . If all the rules are matched, the request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

When register_globals is enabled, because of an insufficient filter to url of multiple scripts' path_om parameter, an remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via the url of path_om parameter in multiple scripts.These scripts include droit.class.php.

中文: Openscrutin droit.class.php path_om  存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Openscrutin droit.class.php path_om  Parameter Remote File inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         droit.class.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数path_om。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and         droit.class.php, and if  the parameter "path_om" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: openMairie openCimetiere存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞，当register_globals被启用时，由于没有充分过滤多个脚本path_om参数的URL，远程攻击者可以通过多个脚本的path_om参数的URL执行任意PHP代码。这些脚本包含：collectivite.class.php
en-US: openMairie openCimetiere is prone to multiple file inclusion vulnerabilities. When register_globals is enabled, because of an insufficient filter to url of multiple scripts' path_om parameter, an remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via the url of path_om parameter in multiple scripts.These scripts include collectivite.class.php.

中文: 建议在web服务器把访问/collectivite.class.php且存在path_om参数的请求给过滤了
en-US: It is suggested to filter the request that with a path_om parameter and accesses to /collectivite.class.php at the web server.

中文: Openscrutin collectivite.class.php path_om 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: Openscrutin collectivite.class.php path_om Parameter Remote File inclusion Attempt

en-US: Check if the request contains GET and /collectivite.class.php, and if  the parameter "path_om" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.

中文: DiY-CMS lang 存在参数与远程文件捆绑尝试
en-US: DiY-CMS lang Parameter Remote File inclusion Attempt

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和          /modules/guestbook/blocks/control.block.php和 是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数lang。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数

中文:
DiY-CMS 是一款基于php+mysql的、简单的CMS系统。 
        DiY-CMS 1.0版本中存在多个PHP远程文件包含漏洞。远程攻击者可以借助(1)modules/guestbook/blocks/control.block.php中的lang参数，(2)index.php中的main_module参数和(3)includes/general.functions.php中的getFile参数中的URL地址执行任意PHP代码
en-US:
DiY-CMS is a simple CMS system based on PHP+mysql. 
DiY-CMS 1.0 is prone to multiple PHP remote file inclusion. Remote attacker can execute arbitrary PHP code via (1)lang parameter in modules/guestbook/blocks/control.block.php,(2)the main_module parameter in index.php and (3)the URL of getFile parameter in includes/general.functions.php.

中文: GPL WEB_SPECIFIC_APPS Geeklog functions.inc存在参数与远程文件捆绑
en-US: Geeklog functions.inc remote file include

中文: 检测请求行中是否包含 GET和         plugins/polls/functions.inc。是否存在带有远程文件包含的参数$_CONF[path]。如果规则匹配，将会阻断并设置相关参数
en-US: Check if the request contains GET and plugins/polls/functions.inc, and if  the parameter "$_CONF[path]" containing remote file inclusion exists. If all the rules are matched, request would be blocked and relevant parameters would be set.
